88b4(nyi khri): zhes bya bar yongs su mi rtog go/ / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa dang / ming dang gzugs dang / skye mched dang / reg pa dang / tshor ba dang / sred pa dang / len pa dang / srid pa dang / skye ba dang / rga shi rtag
88b5(nyi khri): ces bya ba dang / mi rtag ces bya bar yongs su mi rtog go/ bde zhes bya ba dang / sdug bsngal zhes bya bar yongs su mi rtog go/ bdag ces bya ba dang / bdag med ces bya bar yongs su mi rtog go//
88b6(nyi khri): sdug ces bya ba dang / mi sdug ces bya bar yongs su mi rtog go// stong zhes bya ba dang / mi stong zhes bya bar yongs su mi rtog go/ mtshan ma yod ces bya ba dang / mtshan ma med ces bya bar yongs su mi

89a1(nyi khri): yongs su mi rtog go/ / sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa rtag ces bya ba dang / mi rtag ces bya bar yongs su mi rtog go// bde zhes bya ba dang / sdug bsngal zhes bya bar yongs su//
89a2(nyi khri): mi rtog go// bdag ces bya ba dang / bdag med ces bya bar yongs su mi rtog go// sdug ces bya ba dang / mi sdug ces bya bar yongs su mi rtog go// stong zhes bya ba dang / mi stong zhes bya bar yongs

89a4(nyi khri): zhes bya bar yongs su mi rtog go/ / dben zhes bya ba dang / mi dben zhes bya bar yongs su mi rtog go/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha
89a5(nyi khri): rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rtag ces bya ba dang / mi rtag ces bya bar yongs su mi rtog go/ bde zhes bya ba dang / sdug bsngal
89a6(nyi khri): zhes bya bar yongs su mi rtog go/ bdag ces bya ba dang / bdag med ces bya bar yongs su mi rtog go/ sdug ces bya ba dang / mi sdug ces bya bar yongs su mi rtog go/ stong zhes bya ba dang

89b1(nyi khri): go/ zhi zhes bya ba dang / ma zhi zhes bya bar yongs su mi rtog go// dben zhes bya ba dang / mi dben zhes bya bar yongs su mi rtog go/ nang stong pa nyid rtag ces bya ba dang / mi rtag ces bya bar yongs su// /
89b2(nyi khri): mi rtog go/ bde zhes bya ba dang / sdug bsngal zhes bya bar yongs su mi rtog go// bdag ces bya ba dang / bdag med ces bya bar yongs su mi rtog go/ sdug ces bya ba dang / mi sdug ces bya bar yongs su

89b5(nyi khri): rtag ces bya ba dang / mi rtag ces bya bar yongs su mi rtog go/ bde zhes bya ba dang / sdug bsngal zhes bya bar yongs su mi rtog go/ bdag ces bya ba dang / bdag med ces bya bar yongs su mi rtog
89b6(nyi khri): go/ sdug ces bya ba dang / mi sdug ces bya bar yongs su mi rtog go/ stong zhes bya ba dang / mi stong zhes bya bar yongs su mi rtog go// mtshan ma yod ces bya ba dang / mtshan ma med ces bya bar yongs
89b7(nyi khri): su mi rtog go/ / smon pa yod ces bya ba dang / smon pa med ces bya bar yongs su mi rtog go// zhi zhes bya ba dang / ma zhi zhes bya bar yongs su mi rtog go// dben zhes bya ba dang / mi dben zhes bya
90a1(nyi khri): bar yongs su mi rtog go/ / dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams rtag ces bya ba dang / mi rtag ces bya bar yongs su mi rtog go/ bde zhes bya ba dang / sdug bsngal zhes
90a2(nyi khri): bya bar yongs su mi rtog go/ bdag ces bya ba dang / bdag med ces bya bar yongs su mi rtog go// sdug ces bya ba dang / mi sdug ces bya bar yongs su mi rtog go/ stong zhes bya ba dang / mi
90a3(nyi khri): stong zhes bya bar yongs su mi rtog go/ / mtshan ma yod ces bya ba dang / mtshan ma med ces bya bar yongs su mi rtog go/ smon pa yod ces bya ba dang / smon pa med ces bya bar yongs su mi rtog go//
90a4(nyi khri): zhi zhes bya ba dang / ma zhi zhes bya bar yongs su mi rtog go/ dben zhes bya ba dang / mi dben zhes bya bar yongs su mi rtog go// yang dag par spong ba rnams dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams dang /
90a5(nyi khri): dbang po rnams dang / stobs rnams dang / byang chub kyi yan lag rnams dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa rtag ces bya ba dang / mi rtag ces bya bar yongs su mi rtog go// bde zhes
90a6(nyi khri): bya ba dang / sdug bsngal zhes bya bar yongs su mi rtog go/ bdag ces bya ba dang / bdag med ces bya bar yongs su mi rtog go/ sdug ces bya ba dang / mi sdug ces bya bar yongs su mi rtog go/
90a7(nyi khri): stong zhes bya ba dang / mi stong zhes bya bar yongs su mi rtog go// mtshan ma yod ces bya ba dang / mtshan ma med ces bya bar yongs su mi rtog go/ smon pa yod ces bya ba dang / smon pa med ces bya bar
90b1(nyi khri): yongs su mi rtog go/ zhi zhes bya ba dang / ma zhi zhes bya bar yongs su mi rtog go// dben zhes bya ba dang / mi dben zhes bya bar yongs su mi rtog go// 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams dang / bsam
90b2(nyi khri): gtan rnams dang / tshad med pa rnams dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dang / rnam par thar pa rnams dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dang / rnam
90b3(nyi khri): par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / mngon par shes pa rnams dang / ting nge 'dzin rnams dang / gzungs kyi sgo rnams dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i
90b4(nyi khri): stobs rnams dang / mi 'jigs pa rnams dang / so so yang dag par rig pa rnams dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams rtag ces bya ba dang / mi rtag ces bya bar yongs su mi rtog
90b5(nyi khri): go bde zhes bya ba dang / sdug bsngal zhes bya bar yongs su mi rtog go/ bdag ces bya ba dang / bdag med ces bya bar yongs su mi rtog go// sdug ces bya ba dang / mi sdug ces bya bar yongs
90b6(nyi khri): su mi rtog go/ stong zhes bya ba dang / mi stong zhes bya bar yongs su mi rtog go// mtshan ma yod ces bya ba dang / mtshan ma med ces bya bar yongs su mi rtog go// smon pa yod ces bya ba dang / smon
90b7(nyi khri): pa med ces bya bar yongs su mi rtog go/ / zhi zhes bya ba dang / ma zhi zhes bya bar yongs su mi rtog go// dben zhes bya ba dang / mi dben zhes bya bar yongs su mi rtog go/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa
91a1(nyi khri): nyid kyi bar du rtag ces bya ba dang / mi rtag ces bya bar yongs su mi rtog go// bde zhes bya ba dang / sdug bsngal zhes bya bar yongs su mi rtog go/ bdag ces bya ba dang /
91a2(nyi khri): bdag med ces bya bar yongs su mi rtog go/ sdug ces bya ba dang / mi sdug ces bya bar yongs su mi rtog go/ stong zhes bya ba dang / mi stong zhes bya bar yongs su mi rtog go// mtshan ma yod ces
91a3(nyi khri): bya ba dang / mtshon ma med ces bya bar yongs su mi rtog go// smon pa yod ces bya ba dang / smon pa med ces bya bar yongs su mi rtog go// zhi zhes bya ba dang / ma zhi zhes bya bar yongs su mi rtog go//
91a4(nyi khri): dben zhes bya ba dang / mi dben zhes bya bar yongs su mi rtog go// 'di lta ste/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i
91a5(nyi khri): tshe/ chos 'di dag la yongs su rtog pa med pa'i tshul gyis/ de ltar yongs su rtog go// smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor ci'i phyir na/ de skad du gzugs kyi ma skyes pa gang
91a6(nyi khri): yin pa de ni gzugs ma yin/ tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa'i ma skyes pa gang yin pa de ni/ rnam par shes pa ma yin zhes zer/ tshe dang ldan pa rab
91a7(nyi khri): 'byor ci'i phyir na/ de skad du skye mched dang / khams dang / rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba dang / pha rol tu phyin pa rnams dang / stong pa nyid thams cad dang / byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos
91b1(nyi khri): thams cad dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams dang / bsam gtan rnams dang / tshad med pa rnams dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dang / rnam par thar pa rnams// /
91b2(nyi khri): dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / mngon par shes pa rnams dang / ting nge
91b3(nyi khri): 'dzin rnams dang / gzungs kyi sgo rnams dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams dang / mi 'jigs pa rnams dang / so so yang dag par rig pa rnams dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma
91b4(nyi khri): 'dres pa rnams dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi ma skyes pa gang yin pa de ni/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma yin zhes zer// rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ tshe dang
91b5(nyi khri): ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ gzugs ni gzugs kyis stong ste/ gang stong pa de ni gzugs ma yin te/ skye ba med do// tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ rnam grangs des na/ gzugs kyi ma skyes pa
91b6(nyi khri): gang yin pa de ni gzugs ma yin no/ / tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa ni rnam par shes pas stong ste/ gang stong pa de ni rnam par
91b7(nyi khri): shes pa ma yin te/ skye ba med do// tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ rnam grangs des na/ rnam par shes pa'i ma skyes pa gang yin pa de ni rnam par shes pa ma yin no// tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa
92a1(nyi khri): ti'i bu/ skye mched dang / khams dang / rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba ni rten cing 'brel par 'byung bas stong ste/ gang stong pa de ni rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba ma yin//
92a2(nyi khri): te/ skye ba med do// tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ rnam grangs des na/ rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba'i ma skyes pa gang yin pa de ni rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba ma yin no// tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa
92a3(nyi khri): ti'i bu/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ni sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pas stong ste/ gang stong pa de ni sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin te/ skye ba med do// tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ rnam grangs
92a4(nyi khri): des na/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i ma skyes pa gang yin pa de ni sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin no// tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod
92a5(nyi khri): ba'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtam gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pas stong ste/ gang
92a6(nyi khri): stong pa de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin te/ skye ba med do// tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ rnam grangs des na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i ma skyes pa gang yin pa de ni shes rab kyi
92a7(nyi khri): pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin no/ / tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ nang stong pa nyid ni nang stong pa nyid kyis stong ste/ gang stong pa de ni nang stong pa nyid ma yin te/ skye ba med do//
92b1(nyi khri): / tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ rnam grangs des na/ nang stong pa nyid kyi ma skyes pa gang yin pa de ni nang stong pa nyid ma yin no// tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ phyi stong pa nyid ni phyi stong pa nyid kyis
92b2(nyi khri): stong ste/ gang stong pa de ni phyi stong pa nyid ma yin te/ skye ba med do// tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ rnam grangs des na/ phyi stong pa nyid kyi ma skyes pa gang yin pa de ni phyi stong pa nyid ma yin no//
92b3(nyi khri): tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ phyi nang stong pa nyid ni phyi nang stong pa nyid kyis stong ste/ gang stong pa de ni phyi nang stong pa nyid ma yin te/ skye ba med do// tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ rnam grangs
92b4(nyi khri): des na/ phyi nang stong pa nyid kyi ma skyes pa gang yin pa de ni phyi nang stong pa nyid ma yin no// tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar ni dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid
92b5(nyi khri): stong pa nyid kyis stong ste/ gang stong pa de ni dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ma yin te/ skye ba med do// tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ rnam grangs des na/ dngos po med pa'i ngo bo
92b6(nyi khri): nyid stong pa nyid kyi ma skyes pa gang yin pa de ni dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ma yin no/ / tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams ni dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams kyis
92b7(nyi khri): stong ste/ gang stong pa de ni dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams ma yin te/ skye ba med do// tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ rnam grangs des na/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams kyi ma skyes pa gang yin/
93a1(nyi khri): pa de ni dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams ma yin no// tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ yang dag par spong ba rnams dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams dang / dbang po rnams/
93a2(nyi khri): dang / stobs rnams dang / byang chub kyi yan lag rnams dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa ni 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pas stong ste/ gang stong pa de ni 'phags pa'i lam
93a3(nyi khri): yan lag brgyad pa ma yin te/ skye ba med do// tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ rnam grangs des na/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'i ma skyes pa gang yin pa de ni 'phags pa'i lam yan lag
93a4(nyi khri): brgyad pa ma yin no/ / tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams dang / bsam gtan rnams dang / tshad med pa rnams dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dang /
93a5(nyi khri): rnam par thar pa rnams dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dang / rnam par thar sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / mngon par shes pa rnams
93a6(nyi khri): dang / ting nge 'dzin rnams dang / gzungs kyi sgo rnams dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams dang / mi 'jigs pa rnams dang / so so yang dag par rig pa rnams dang / sangs rgyas kyi
93a7(nyi khri): chos ma 'dres pa rnams ni sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams kyis stong ste/ gang stong pa de ni sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams ma yin te/ skye ba med do// tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ rnam
93b1(nyi khri): grangs des na/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams kyi ma skyes pa gang yin pa de ni sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams ma yin no// tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi/
93b2(nyi khri): bar du rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyis stong ste/ gang stong pa de ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma yin te/ skye ba med do// tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ rnam grangs des na/ rnam pa thams cad
93b3(nyi khri): mkhyen pa nyid kyi ma skyes pa gang yin pa de ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma yin no/ / smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ rab 'byor ci'i phyir na/ de skad du gzugs kyi 'grib/
93b4(nyi khri): ba gang yin pa de ni gzugs ma yin/ tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa'i 'grib pa gang yin pa de ni rnam par shes pa ma yin// skye mched dang / khams dang / rten
93b5(nyi khri): cing 'brel par 'byung ba dang / pha rol tu phyin pa rnams dang / stong pa nyid thams cad dang / byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa dang / bsam gtan dang / tshad med
93b6(nyi khri): ba dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang / rnam par thar pa dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa
93b7(nyi khri): dang / smon pa med pa dang / mngon par shes pa dang / ting nge 'dzin dang / gzungs kyi sgo dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs dang / mi 'jigs pa dang / so so yang dag par rig pa dang /
94a1(nyi khri): sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams kyi 'grib pa gang yin pa de ni/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams ma yin/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar gyi 'grib pa/
94a2(nyi khri): gang yin pa de ni/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma yin zhes zer// rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ 'di ltar 'grib pa gang yin pa dang / gzugs gang
94a3(nyi khri): yin pa dang / gnyis su byar med pa gang yin pa dang / 'grib pa gang yin pa dang / tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa gang yin pa dang / gnyis su byar med pa gang yin
94a4(nyi khri): pa'i chos de dag thams cad kyang ldan pa'ang ma yin/ mi ldan pa'ang ma yin/ gzugs med pa/ bltar med pa/ thogs pa med pa ste/ 'di ltar mtshan nyid med par mtshan nyid gcig pa'o// 'grib
94a5(nyi khri): pa gang yin pa dang / skye mched dang / khams dang / rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba gang yin pa dang / gnyis su byar med pa gang yin pa'i chos de dag thams cad kyang ldan pa'ang ma yin/ mi ldan pa'ang/
94a6(nyi khri): ma yin/ gzugs med pa/ bltar med pa/ thogs pa med pa ste/ 'di ltar mtshan nyid med par mtshan nyid gcig pa'o// 'grib pa gang yin pa dang / pha rol tu phyin pa rnams dang / stong pa nyid
94a7(nyi khri): thams cad dang / byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams dang / bsam gtan rnams dang / tshad med pa rnams dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug
94b1(nyi khri): pa rnams dang / rnam par thar pa rnams dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang /
94b2(nyi khri): mngon par shes pa rnams dang / ting nge 'dzin rnams dang / gzungs kyi sgo rnams dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams dang / mi 'jigs pa rnams dang / so so yang dag par rig
94b3(nyi khri): pa rnams dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar gang yin pa dang / gnyis su byar med pa'i chos gang yin pa de dag thams cad kyang ldan pa'ang
94b4(nyi khri): ma yin/ mi ldan pa'ang ma yin/ gzugs med pa/ bltar med pa/ thogs pa med pa ste/ 'di ltar mtshan nyid med par mtshan nyid gcig pa'o// tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu//
94b5(nyi khri): rnam grangs des na/ gzugs kyi 'grib pa gang yin pa de'ang gzugs ma yin/ tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa'i 'grib pa gang yin pa de'ang rnam par shes
94b6(nyi khri): pa ma yin/ skye mched dang / khams dang / rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba'i 'grib pa gang yin pa de'ang rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba ma yin/ pha rol tu phyin pa rnams dang / stong pa nyid thams cad
94b7(nyi khri): dang / byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams dang / bsam gtan rnams dang / tshad med pa rnams dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams
95a1(nyi khri): dang / rnam par thar pa rnams dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang /
95a2(nyi khri): smon pa med pa dang / mngon par shes pa rnams dang / ting nge 'dzin rnams dang / gzungs kyi sgo rnams dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams dang / mi 'jigs pa rnams
95a3(nyi khri): dang so so yang dag par rig pa rnams dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar gyi 'grib pa gang yin pa de'ang rnam pa thams cad mkhye
95a4(nyi khri): pa nyid ma yin no/ / smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor ci'i phyir na de skad du/ gang 'di gzugs shes bya ba de ni gnyis su med pa'i grangs su byas pa'o// gang 'di tshor ba dang /
95a5(nyi khri): 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa zhes bya ba de ni gnyis su med pa'i grangs su byas pa'o// gang 'di rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar zhes bya ba de ni gnyis su med pa'i
95a6(nyi khri): grangs su byas pa'o zhes zer/ rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ 'di ltar gzugs kyang gzhan ma yin// ma skyes pa'ang gzhan ma yin te/ ma skyes pa nyid kyang
95a7(nyi khri): gzugs/ gzugs nyid kyang ma skyes pa ste/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ rnam grangs des na/ gang 'di gzugs shes bya ba de ni gnyis su med pa'i grangs su byas pa'o// 'di ltar tshor ba dang /
95b1(nyi khri): 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa'ang gzhan ma yin/ ma skyes pa'ang gzhan ma yin te/ ma skyes pa nyid kyang rnam par shes pa/ rnam par shes pa nyid kyang ma skyes pa ste/ tshe
95b2(nyi khri): dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ rnam grangs des na/ gang 'di rnam par shes pa zhes bya ba de ni gnyis su med pa'i grangs su byas pa'o// 'di ltar skye mched dang / khams dang / rten cing 'brel
95b3(nyi khri): par 'byung ba dang / pha rol tu phyin pa rnams dang / stong pa nyid thams cad dang / byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams dang / bsam gtan rnams dang / tshad
95b4(nyi khri): med pa rnams dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dang / rnam par thar pa rnams dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong
95b5(nyi khri): pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / mngon par shes pa rnams dang / ting nge 'dzin rnams dang / gzungs kyi sgo rnams dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams dang / mi
95b6(nyi khri): 'jigs pa rnams dang / so so yang dag par rig pa rnams dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams kyang gzhan ma yin/ ma skyes pa'ang gzhan ma yin te/ ma skyes pa nyid kyang sangs rgyas
95b7(nyi khri): kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa nyid kyang ma skyes pa ste/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ rnam grangs des na/ gang 'di sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams shes
96a1(nyi khri): bya ba de ni gnyis su med pa'i grangs su byas pa'o/ / 'di ltar rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar yang gzhan ma yin/ ma skyes pa'ang gzhan ma yin te/ ma skyes pa nyid
96a2(nyi khri): kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang ma skyes pa ste/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ rnam grangs des na/ gang 'di rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ces bya
96a3(nyi khri): ba de ni gnyis su med pa'i grangs su byas pa'o/ / de nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das gang gi tshe byang chub
96a4(nyi khri): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing / chos de dag la de ltar yongs su rtogs pa de'i tshe/ shin tu rnam par dag pa'i slad du/ gzugs kyi ma skyes pa mthong
96a5(nyi khri): bar 'gyur/ shin tu rnam par dag pa'i slad du/ tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa'i ma skyes pa mthong bar 'gyur/ shin tu rnam par dag pa'i slad du/ skye mched
96a6(nyi khri): rnams dang / khams rnams dang / rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba rnams kyi ma skyes pa mthong bar 'gyur/ shin tu rnam par dag pa'i slad du/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i ma skyes pa mthong
96a7(nyi khri): bar 'gyur/ shin tu rnam par dag pa'i slad du/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi
96b1(nyi khri): pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i ma skyes pa mthong bar 'gyur/ shin tu rnam par dag pa'i slad du/ nang stong pa nyid kyi ma skyes pa mthong bar 'gyur/ shin tu rnam par dag/
96b2(nyi khri): pa'i slad du/ dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar gyi ma skyes pa mthong bar 'gyur/ shin tu rnam dag pa'i srad du/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams kyi ma skyes pa mthong bar 'gyur//
96b3(nyi khri): shin tu rnam par dag pa'i slad du/ yang dag par spong ba rnams dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams dang / dbang po rnams dang / stobs rnams dang / byang chub kyi yan lag rnams dang /
96b4(nyi khri): 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'i ma skyes pa mthong bar 'gyur/ shin tu rnam par dag pa'i slad du/ 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams dang / bsam gtan rnams dang / tshad med pa
96b5(nyi khri): rnams dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dang / rnam par thar pa rnams dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa
96b6(nyi khri): nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / mngon par shes pa rnams dang / ting nge 'dzin rnams dang / gzungs kyi sgo rnams dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams
96b7(nyi khri): dang mi 'jigs pa rnams dang / so so yang dag par rig pa rnams dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi ma skyes pa mthong bar 'gyur/ shin tu rnam par dag pa'i slad
97a1(nyi khri): du/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar gyi ma skyes pa mthong bar 'gyur/ shin tu rnam par dag pa'i slad du/ so so'i skye bo'i ma skyes pa mthong bar 'gyur/ shin
97a2(nyi khri): tu rnam par dag pa'i slad du/ so so'i skye bo'i chos rnams kyi ma skyes pa mthong bar 'gyur/ shin tu rnam par dag pa'i slad du/ rgyun du zhugs pa dang / rgyun du zhugs pa'i chos
97a3(nyi khri): kyi ma skyes pa mthong bar 'gyur/ shin tu rnam par dag pa'i slad du/ lan cig phyir 'ong ba dang / lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i chos rnams dang / phyir mi 'ong ba dang / phyir mi 'ong ba'i chos
97a4(nyi khri): rnams dang / dgra bcom pa dang / dgra bcom pa'i chos rnams dang / rang sangs rgyas dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams dang / byang chub sems dpa' dang / byang chub sems dpa'i
97a5(nyi khri): chos rnams dang / sangs rgyas kyi ma skyes pa mthong bar 'gyur/ shin tu rnam par dag pa'i slad du/ sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams kyi ma skyes pa mthong bar 'gyur ro// de nas
97a6(nyi khri): tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bus/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces smras so// tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis smras pa'i don bdag gis shes pa ltar na/ gzugs kyang ma skyes la
97a7(nyi khri): tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa'ang ma skyes/ skye mched rnams kyang ma skyes/ khams rnams kyang ma skyes/ rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba rnams
97b1(nyi khri): kyang ma skyes/ pha rol tu phyin pa rnams kyang ma skyes/ stong pa nyid thams cad kyang ma skyes/ byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun yang ma skyes/ 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams dang /
97b2(nyi khri): bsam gtan rnams dang / tshad med pa rnams dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyang ma skyes/ rnam par thar pa rnams dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms
97b3(nyi khri): par 'jug pa rnams dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa'ang ma skyes/ mngon par shes pa rnams dang / ting nge 'dzin rnams
97b4(nyi khri): dang / gzungs kyi sgo rnams kyang ma skyes/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams dang / mi 'jigs pa rnams dang / so so yang dag par rig pa rnams dang / sangs rgyas kyi
97b5(nyi khri): chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyang ma skyes/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar yang ma skyes/ so so'i skye bo'ang ma skyes/ so so'i skye bo'i chos kyang ma skyes/ rgyun du zhugs
97b6(nyi khri): pa'ang ma skyes/ rgyun du zhugs pa'i chos kyang ma skyes/ lan cig phyir 'ong ba'ang ma skyes/ lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i chos kyang ma skyes/ phyir mi 'ong ba'ang ma skyes/ phyir mi 'ong ba'i chos
97b7(nyi khri): kyang ma skyes/ dgra bcom pa'ang ma skyes/ dgra bcom pa'i chos kyang ma skyes/ rang sangs rgyas kyang ma skyes/ rang sangs rgyas kyi chos kyang ma skyes/ byang chub sems dpa'
98a1(nyi khri): yang ma skyes/ byang chub sems dpa'i chos kyang ma skyes/ sangs rgyas kyang ma skyes/ sangs rgyas kyi chos kyang ma skyes pa yin na/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor/
98a2(nyi khri): ltar gal te gzugs kyang skye ba med/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi bar yang skye ba med/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar yang skye ba med/ so so'i skye bo'ang skye ba
98a3(nyi khri): med/ so so'i skye bo'i chos kyang skye ba med/ rgyun du zhugs pa dang / rgyun du zhugs pa'i chos kyang skye ba med/ lan cig phyir 'ong ba dang / lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i chos kyang skye ba med/
98a4(nyi khri): phyir mi 'ong ba dang / phyir mi 'ong ba'i chos kyang skye ba med/ dgra bcom pa dang / dgra bcom pa'i chos kyang skye ba med/ rang sangs rgyas kyang skye ba med/ rang sangs rgyas kyi chos kyang
98a5(nyi khri): skye ba med/ byang chub sems dpa' yang skye ba med/ byang chub sems dpa'i chos kyang skye ba med/ sangs rgyas kyang skye ba med/ sangs rgyas kyi chos kyang skye ba med na ni/ nyan thos kyi
98a6(nyi khri): theg pa pa rnams kyis kyang / rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu dang / lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / dgra bcom pa nyid thob zin par 'gyur ro// rang
98a7(nyi khri): sangs rgyas kyi theg pa pa rnams kyis kyang / rang sangs rgyas kyi byang chub thob zin par 'gyur ro// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid
98b1(nyi khri): thob zin par 'gyur ro/ / 'gro ba lnga rnams kyang tha mi dad par 'gyur ro// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos kyang / byang chub rnam lnga thob zin par 'gyur ro// tshe dang ldan pa
98b2(nyi khri): rab 'byor gal te chos thams cad ma skyes pa yin na/ ci'i phyir rgyun du zhugs pas ni/ kun tu sbyor ba gsum spang ba'i phyir/ lam bsgoms/ lan cig phyir 'ong bas ni/ 'dod
98b3(nyi khri): chags dang / zhe sdang dang / gti mug bsrab pa'i phyir/ lam bsgoms/ phyir mi 'ong bas ni/ dam pa ma yin pa'i cha can gyi kun tu sbyor ba lnga spang ba'i phyir/ lam bsgoms
98b4(nyi khri): dgra bcom pas ni/ bla ma'i cha can gyi kun tu sbyor ba kun spang ba'i phyir/ lam bsgoms/ rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa la zhugs pas ni/ rang byang chub kyi don du lam bsgoms/ ci'i phyir
98b5(nyi khri): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni/ sems can rnams kyi don du de ltar sdug bsngal nyams su myong bar byed cing / dka' ba'i spad pa spong / ci'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pas
98b6(nyi khri): ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas/ ci'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pas ni chos kyi 'khor lo bskor// de skad ces smras pa
98b7(nyi khri): dang / tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu la 'di skad ces smras so// tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ bdag ni chos ma skyes pa la 'thob pa yod pa dang / khong du chud
99a1(nyi khri): pa yod par mi 'dod de/ ma skyes pa la rgyun du zhugs pa yod par mi 'dod do// rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu yod par mi 'dod do// ma skyes pa la lan cig phyir 'ong
99a2(nyi khri): ba yod par mi 'dod do/ / lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu yod par mi 'dod do// ma skyes pa la phyir mi 'ong ba yod par mi 'dod do// phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu yod par mi 'dod do// ma skyes
99a3(nyi khri): pa la dgra bcom pa yod par mi 'dod do/ / dgra bcom pa nyid mngon du bya ba yod par mi 'dod do// mi skyes pa la rang sangs rgyas yod par mi 'dod do// rang byang chub yod par mi 'dod do//
99a4(nyi khri): tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ bdag ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dka' ba'i spyad pa spyod pa yod par yang mi 'dod de/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
99a5(nyi khri): po'ang dka' ba spod pa'i 'du shes kyis mi spong ngo / / de ci'i phyir zhe na/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ sdug bsngal gyi 'du shes bskyed na/ sems can tshad med grangs med pa'i
99a6(nyi khri): don bya bar mi nus kyi/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ sems can rnams la mar 'du shes bskyed pa dang / phar 'du shes paskyed pa dang / bdag tu 'du shes bskyed pa dang /
99a7(nyi khri): bur 'du shes bskyed pas/ sems can tshad med grangs med pa'i don du bya ba de'ang mi dmigs pa'i tshul du nus par 'gyur ro// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
99b1(nyi khri): ni 'di ltar sems bskyed de/ ji ltar bdag bdag ces bya yang de ni thams cad du thams cad rnam pa thams cad du thams cad med cing mi dmigs pa de bzhin du phyi nang gi chos rnams la'ang
99b2(nyi khri): 'du shes bskyed de/ de ltar na 'du shes bskyed kyang / dka' ba'i 'du shes mi bskyed do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar de ni chos gang yang mi len mi dmigs pa'i phyir ro// tshe dang ldan pa
99b3(nyi khri): shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ bdag ni ma skyes pa la de bzhin gshegs pa yod par mi 'dod do// bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyang yod par mi 'dod de/ de bzhin gshegs
99b4(nyi khri): pas chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba ltar na/ / ma skyes pa'i chos kyis thob pa 'am/ 'thob par bya ba med do// smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor khyod chos skyes pas 'thob par
99b5(nyi khri): 'dod dam/ 'on tam ma skyes pa'i chos kyis 'thob par 'dod/ rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ bdag ni skyes pa'i chos kyis kyang 'thob par mi 'dod do// ma
99b6(nyi khri): skyes pa'i chos kyis kyang 'thob par mi 'dod do/ / smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor 'o na 'thob pa med la/ mngon par rtogs pa med dam/ rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa
99b7(nyi khri): shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ 'thob pa'ang yod/ mngon par rtogs pa'ang yod de/ gnyis kyi ma yin gyi/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ 'thob pa 'am/ mngon par rtogs pa ni/ 'jig rten
100a1(nyi khri): gyi tha snyad kyis gdags pa'o/ / rgyun du zhugs pa 'am/ lan cig phyir 'ong ba 'am/ phyir mi 'ong ba 'am/ dgra bcom pa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas sam/
100a2(nyi khri): byang chub sems dpa' 'am/ sangs rgyas dag kyang 'jig rten gyi tha snyad kyis gdags pa ste/ don dam pas ni 'thob pa 'am/ mngon par rtogs pa 'am// rgyun du zhugs pa 'am/
100a3(nyi khri): lan cig phyir 'ong ba 'am/ phyir mi 'ong ba 'am/ dgra bcom pa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas sam/ byang chub sems dpa' 'am/ sangs rgyas su gdags pa med do// smras pa/ tshe dang
100a4(nyi khri): ldan pa rab 'byor 'thob pa dang / mngon par rtogs par bya ba 'jig rten gyi tha snyad du yod pa de bzhin du/ 'gro ba lnga dag kyang 'jig rten gyi tha snyad du tha dad kyi/ don dam par ni ma yin nam/
100a5(nyi khri): smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu de de bzhin te/ ji ltar 'thob pa dang / mngon par rtogs pa 'jig rten gyi tha snyad du yod pa de bzhin du 'gro ba lnga dag kyang 'jig rten gyi tha snyad du tha dad
100a6(nyi khri): kyi/ don dam par ni ma yin no// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ don dam par ni las kyang med/ las kyi rnam par smin pa'ang med/ skye ba'ang med/ 'gag pa'ang med/
100a7(nyi khri): kun nas nyon mongs pa'ang med/ rnam par byang ba'ang med do// smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor ma skyes pa'i chos skye bar 'gyur ram/ 'on tam skyes pa'i chos skye bar 'gyur/ rab 'byor
100b1(nyi khri): gyis smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ bdag ni ma skyes pa'i chos kyang skye bar mi 'dod/ skyes pa'i chos kyang skye bar mi 'dod do// // shes rab kyi
100b2(nyi khri): pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag nyi shu lnga pa bam po nyi shu drug pa/ / // smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor ma skyes pa'i chos skye bar mi 'dod pa gang yin/ rab 'byor gyis smras pa
100b3(nyi khri): tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ bdag ni gzugs ma skyes pa/ rang bzhin gyis stong pa skye bar mi 'dod do// tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ bdag ni tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed
100b4(nyi khri): dang / rnam par shes pa ma skyes pa/ rang bzhin gyis stong pa skye bar mi 'dod do// tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ bdag ni skye mched rnams dang / khams rnams dang / rten cing /
100b5(nyi khri): 'brel par 'byung ba rnams dang / pha rol tu phyin pa rnams dang / stong pa nyid thams cad dang / byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams dang / bsam
100b6(nyi khri): gtan rnams dang / tshad med pa rnams dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dang / rnam par thar pa rnams dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams
100b7(nyi khri): dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / mngon par shes pa rnams dang / ting nge 'dzin rnams dang / gzungs kyi sgo rnams dang
101a1(nyi khri): de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams dang / mi 'jigs pa rnams dang / so so yang dag par rig pa rnams dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams ma skyes pa rang bzhin gyis
101a2(nyi khri): stong pa skye bar mi 'dod do/ / tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ bdag ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du ma skyes pa rang bzhin gyis stong pa skye bar mi 'dod do// smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa
101a3(nyi khri): rab 'byor chos skyes pa skye la mi 'dod pa gang / smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ bdag ni gzugs skyes pa rang bzhin gyis stong pa skye bar mi 'dod do// tshe dang ldan pa
101a4(nyi khri): shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ bdag ni tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa skyes pa rang bzhin gyis stong pa skye bar mi 'dod do// tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i
101a5(nyi khri): du/ bdag ni skye mched dang / khams dang / rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba dang / pha rol tu phyin pa rnams dang / stong pa nyid thams cad dang / byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams dang
101a6(nyi khri): 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams dang / bsam gtan rnams dang / tshad med pa rnams dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dang / rnam par thar pa rnams dang / mthar
101a7(nyi khri): gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / mngon par shes pa rnams dang / ting nge 'dzin
101b1(nyi khri): rnams dang / gzungs kyi sgo rnams dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams dang / mi 'jigs pa rnams dang / so so yang dag par rig pa rnams dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma
101b2(nyi khri): 'dres pa rnams skyes pa rang bzhin gyis stong pa skye bar mi 'dod do/ / tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ bdag ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du skyes pa rang bzhin gyis stong pa skye bar mi 'dod do// /
101b3(nyi khri): smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor skye ba skye 'am/ 'on tam mi skye ba skye/ smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ skye ba'ang mi skye/ mi skye ba'ang mi skye'o// de ci'i phyir zhe
101b4(nyi khri): na/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ 'di ltar skye ba gang yin pa dang / skye ba med pa gang yin pa'i chos de gnyis ka'ang ldan pa'ang ma yin/ mi ldan pa'ang ma yin/ gzugs med pa
101b5(nyi khri): bltar med pa/ thogs pa med pa ste/ 'di ltar mtshan nyid med par mtshan nyid gcig pa'o// tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu// de ltar rnam grangs des na/ skye ba'ang mi skye/ mi skye
101b6(nyi khri): ba'ang mi skye'o/ / shA ra dwa ti'i bus smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor ma skyes pa'i chos ma skyes pa'i chos shes bya bar brjod par khyod kyis spobs na/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor chos ma skyes
101b7(nyi khri): pa rnams kyi skye ba med pa la'ang brjod du spobs par 'gyur ram/ rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu ma skyes pa'i chos ma skyes pa'i chos shes bya ba brjod par khyod
102a1(nyi khri): kyis spobs so zhes zer ba ni/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ ma skyes pa'i chos ma skyes pa'i chos shes bya ba brjod pa la/ bdag gis spobs pa med do//
102a2(nyi khri): dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ chos ma skyes pa rnams kyi skye ba med pa'ang bdag gis brjod par spobs pa med do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ 'di ltar ma skyes pa'i
102a3(nyi khri): chos gang yin pa dang / skye ba med pa gang yin pa dang / spobs pa med pa gang yin pa dang / brjod pa gang yin pa dang / mi skye ba gang yin pa'i chos de dag thams cad kyang ldan pa'ang ma yin/
102a4(nyi khri): mi ldan pa'ang ma yin/ gzugs med pa/ bltar med pa/ thogs pa med pa ste/ 'di ltar mtshan nyid med par mtshan nyid gcig pa dag go/ smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa ra
102a5(nyi khri): 'byor brjod pa ni skye ba med ces bya ba yin te/ spobs pa'ang skye ba med la/ chos kyang skye ba med de/ gang las brtsams shing brjod par spobs pa'i chos de dag kyang skye ba med pa yin
102a6(nyi khri): nam rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ de de bzhin te/ brjod pa ni ma skyes pa'o// spobs pa ni ma skyes pa'o// chos ni ma skyes pa'o// gang
102a7(nyi khri): las brtsams te smra bar spobs pa'i chos de dag kyang ma skyes pa'o/ / de ci'i phyir zhe na/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ de ni 'di ltar gzugs skye ba med do// tshor ba dang / 'du shes
102b1(nyi khri): dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa skye ba med do// mig skye ba med do// na ba dang / sna dang / lce dang / lus dang / yid skye ba med do// gzugs skye ba med do// sgra dang / dri ngang /
102b2(nyi khri): ro dang / reg dang / chos skye ba med do// mig gi rnam par shes pa skye ba med do// rna ba'i rnam par shes pa dang / sna'i rnam par shes pa dang / lce'i rnam par shes pa dang / lus kyi rnam par
102b3(nyi khri): shes pa dang / yid kyi rnam par shes pa skye ba med do// mig gi 'dus te reg pa skye ba med do// rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa dang sna'i 'dus te reg pa dang / lce'i 'dus te reg pa dang / lus
102b4(nyi khri): kyi 'dus te reg pa dang / yid kyi 'dus te reg pa skye ba med do// mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba skye ba med do// rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dang / sna'i 'dus te/
102b5(nyi khri): reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dang / lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dang / lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dang / yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba skye ba med
102b6(nyi khri): do/ sa'i khams skye ba med do// chu'i khams dang / me'i khams dang / rlung gi khams dang / nam mkha'i khams dang / rnam par shes pa'i khams skye ba med do// ma rig
102b7(nyi khri): ba skye ba med do/ / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa dang / ming dang gzugs dang / skye mched drug dang / reg pa dang / tshor ba dang / sred pa dang / len pa dang / srid pa dang / skye
103a1(nyi khri): ba dang / rga shi skye ba med do// sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin skye ba med do// tshul khrims kyi rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha
103a2(nyi khri): rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa skye ba med do// nang nying se ba med do// phyi stong pa nyid skye ba med do// phyi nang stong pa nyid skye ba med do//
103a3(nyi khri): dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar du skye ba med do// dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams skye ba med do// yang dag par spong ba rnams dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams dang / dbang po rnams dang / stobs
103a4(nyi khri): rnams dang / byang chub kyi yan lag rnams dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa skye ba med do// 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams dang / bsam gtan rnams dang / tshad
103a5(nyi khri): med pa rnams dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dang / rnam par thar pa rnams dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dang / rnam par
103a6(nyi khri): thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / mngon par shes pa rnams dang / ting nge 'dzin rnams dang / gzungs kyi sgo rnams
103a7(nyi khri): de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams dang / mi 'jigs pa rnams dang / so so yang dag par rig pa rnams dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams
103b1(nyi khri): sde ba med do/ / tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ rnam grangs des na/ brjod pa ni skye ba med pa ste/ spobs pa'ang skye ba med la/ chos kyang skye ba med de/ gang las brtsams shing
103b2(nyi khri): brjod par spobs pa'i chos de dag kyang skye ba med pa'o/ / smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor ni chos smra ba'i nang na mchog tu bya bar 'os pa ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar
103b3(nyi khri): gnas brtan rab 'byor ni gang dang gang yongs su dris pa de dang de la thogs pa med do/ / rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ de ni bcom ldan 'das kyi nyan thos chos
103b4(nyi khri): thams cad la gnas pa med pa dag gi chos nyid de/ de dag ni gang dang gang yongs su dris pa de dang de la thogs pa med do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar chos thams cad ni mi gnas pa'i phyir ro//
103b5(nyi khri): smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor ji ltar na chos thams cad stong pa nyid mi gnas pa yin/ rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ gzugs ni rang bzhin
103b6(nyi khri): gyis stong pa ste/ de ni nang na'ang mi gnas/ phyi rol na'ang mi gnas/ gnyis ka med par yang mi dmigs so// tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ tshor ba dang
103b7(nyi khri): 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa ni rang bzhin gyis stong pa ste/ de ni nang na'ang mi gnas/ phyi rol na'ang mi gnas/ gnyis ka med par yang mi dmigs so// tshe dang
104a1(nyi khri): @ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu mig ni rang bzhin gyis stong pa ste/ de ni nang na'ang mi gnas/ phyi rol na'ang mi gnas/ gnyis ka med par yang mi dmigs so// tshe dang /
104a2(nyi khri): ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ rna ba dang / sna dang / lce dang / lus dang / yid ni rang bzhin gyis stong pa ste/ de ni nang na'ang mi gnas/ phyi rol na'ang mi gnas/ gnyis ka med par yang mi dmigs
104a3(nyi khri): so/ / tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu gzugs ni rang bzhin gyis stong pa ste/ de ni nang na'ang mi gnas/ phyi rol na'ang mi gnas/ gnyis ka med par yang mi dmigs so// tshe dang ldan
104a4(nyi khri): ba shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ sgra dang / dri dang / ro dang / reg dang / chos ni rang bzhin gyis stong pa ste/ de ni nang na'ang mi gnas/ phyi rol na'ang mi gnas/ gnyis ka med par yang mi
104a5(nyi khri): dmigs so/ / tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ mig gi rnam par shes pa ni rang bzhin gyis stong pa ste/ de ni nang na'ang mi gnas/ phyi rol na'ang mi gnas/ gnyis ka med par yang mi
104a6(nyi khri): dmigs so/ / tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ rna ba'i rnam par shes pa dang / sna'i rnam par shes pa dang / lce'i rnam par shes pa dang / lus kyi rnam par shes pa dang / yid kyi rnam
104a7(nyi khri): par shes pa ni rang bzhin gyis stong pa ste/ de ni nang na'ang mi gnas/ phyi rol na'ang mi gnas/ gnyis ka med par yang mi dmigs so// tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ mig gi 'dus te
104b1(nyi khri): reg pa ni rang bzhin gyis stong pa ste/ de ni nang na'ang mi gnas phyi rol na'ang mi gnas/ gnyis ka med par yang mi dmigs so// tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ rna ba'i 'dus te
104b2(nyi khri): reg pa dang / sna'i 'dus te reg pa dang / lce'i 'dus te reg pa dang / lus kyi 'dus te reg pa dang / yid kyi 'dus te reg pa ni rang bzhin gyis stong pa ste/ de ni nang na'ang mi gnas/
104b3(nyi khri): rol na'ang mi gnas/ gnyis ka med par yang mi dmigs so// tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba ni rang bzhin gyis stong pa ste/ de ni nang na rang
104b4(nyi khri): mi gnas/ phyi rol na'ang mi gnas gnyis ka med par yang mi dmigs so// tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dang / sna'i 'dus
104b5(nyi khri): te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dang / lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dang / lus kyi 'dus de reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dang / yid kyi 'dus de reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba ni rang bzhin gyis
104b6(nyi khri): stong pa ste/ de ni nang na'ang mi gnas/ phyi rol na'ang mi gnas/ gnyis ka med par yang mi dmigs so// tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ sa'i khams ni rang bzhin gyis
104b7(nyi khri): stong pa ste/ de ni nang na'ang mi gnas/ phyi rol na'ang mi gnas/ gnyis ka med par yang mi dmigs so// tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ chu'i khams dang / me'i khams dang /
105a1(nyi khri): rlung gi khams dang / nam mkha'i khams dang / rnam par shes pa'i khams ni rang bzhin gyis stong pa ste/ de ni nang na'ang mi gnas/ phyi rol na'ang mi gnas/ gnyis/
105a2(nyi khri): med par yang mi dmigs so// tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ ma rig pa ni rang bzhin gyis stong pa ste/ de ni nang na'ang mi gnas/ phyi rol na'ang mi gnas/ gnyis ka med par yang mi
105a3(nyi khri): dmigs so/ / tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa dang / ming dang gzugs dang / skye mched drug dang / reg pa dang / tshor ba dang / sred pa dang /
105a4(nyi khri): len pa dang / srid pa dang / skye ba dang / rga shi ni rang bzhin gyis stong pa ste/ de ni nang na'ang mi gnas/ phyi rol na'ang mi gnas/ gnyis ka med par yang mi dmigs so//
105a5(nyi khri): tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ni rang bzhin gyis stong pa ste/ de ni nang na'ang mi gnas// phyi rol na'ang mi gnas// gnyis ka med par yang mi dmigs so// tshe dang ldan pa
105a6(nyi khri): shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol
105a7(nyi khri): tu phyin pa ni rang bzhin gyis stong pa ste/ de ni nang na'ang mi gnas/ phyi rol na'ang mi gnas/ gnyis ka med par yang mi dmigs so// tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ nang stong pa nyid ni
105b1(nyi khri): rang bzhin gyis stong pa / de ni nang na'ang mi gnas/ phyi rol na'ang mi gnas/ gnyis ka med par yang mi dmigs so// tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid
105b2(nyi khri): stong pa nyid kyi bar ni rang bzhin gyis stong pa ste/ de ni nang na'ang mi gnas/ phyi rol na'ang mi gnas/ gnyis ka med par yang mi dmigs so// tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ dran
105b3(nyi khri): pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams ni rang bzhin gyis stong pa ste/ de ni nang na'ang mi gnas/ phyi rol na'ang mi gnas/ gnyis ka med par yang mi dmigs so// tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ yang dag
105b4(nyi khri): par spong ba rnams dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams dang / dbang po rnams dang / stobs rnams dang / byang chub kyi yan lag rnams dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa ni rang bzhin
105b5(nyi khri): gyis stong pa ste/ de ni nang na'ang mi gnas/ phyi rol na'ang mi gnas/ gnyis ka med par yang mi dmigs so// tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ 'phags pa'i bden
105b6(nyi khri): pa rnams dang / bsam gtan rnams dang / tshad med pa rnams dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad dang / mthar gyis
105b7(nyi khri): gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / stong pa nyid dang / tshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / mngon par shes pa rnams dang / ting nge 'dzin rnams dang
106a1(nyi khri): / gzungs kyi sgro rnams dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / sangs rgyas kyi
106a2(nyi khri): chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad ni rang bzhin gyis stong pa ste/ de ni nang na'ang mi gnas phyi rol na'ang mi gnas/ gnyis ka med par yang mi dmigs so// tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu
106a3(nyi khri): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar ni rang bzhin gyis stong pa ste/ de ni nang na'ang mi gnas/ phyi rol na'ang mi gnas/ gnyis ka med par yang mi dmigs so// tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/
106a4(nyi khri): rnam grangs des na chos thams cad ni rang bzhin gyis stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi gnas pa'o// tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
106a5(nyi khri): po pha rol tu phyin pa drug la spyod pas/ de ltar gzugs yongs su sbyang bar bya'o// tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa yongs
106a6(nyi khri): su sbyang bar bya'o/ / skye mched dang / khams dang / rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba yongs su sbyang bar bya'o// pha rol tu phyin pa rnams dang / stong pa nyid thams cad dang
106a7(nyi khri): byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams dang / bsam gtan rnams dang / tshad med pa rnams dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par
106b1(nyi khri): 'jug pa rnams dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / mngon/
106b2(nyi khri): par shes pa rnams dang / ting nge 'dzin rnams dang / gzungs kyi sgo rnams dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi
106b3(nyi khri): dang byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad yongs su sbyang bar bya'o// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du yongs su sbyang bar
106b4(nyi khri): bya'o/ / de nas yang tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bus/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces smras so// tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
106b5(nyi khri): chen po pha rol tu phyin pa drug la spyod pa'i tshe/ byang chub kyi lam yongs su sbyong ba yin/ rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ sbyin pa'i pha
106b6(nyi khri): rol tu phyin pa ni 'jig rten pa'ang yod/ 'jig rten las 'das pa'ang yod/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha
106b7(nyi khri): rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni 'jig rten pa'ang yod/ 'jig rten las 'das pa'ang yod do// smras pa/ tshe dang
107a1(nyi khri): / ldan pa rab 'byor/ 'jig rten pa'i sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ni gang 'jig rten las 'das pa ni gang / rab 'byor gyis sbas pa/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/
107a2(nyi khri): 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sbyin pa byed cing / sbyin bdag tu gyur pa/ dge sbyong dang / bram ze dang / 'phongs pa dang / ltogs pa dang / 'gron pa dang /
107a3(nyi khri): slong ba zas 'dod pa la ni zas skom dang / theg pa dang / gos dang / me tog dang / 'phreng ba dang / spos dang / byug pa dang / gnas dang / mal stan dang / yo byad dang /
107a4(nyi khri): sman dang / mi'i yo byad gzhan ci'ang rung ba'i bar du yongs su gtong ste/ bu pho 'dod pa la ni bu po yongs su gtong / bu mo 'dod pa la ni bu mo/ chung ma 'dod pa la ni chung ma/ rgyal srid 'dod
107a5(nyi khri): pa la ni rgyal srid/ mgo 'dod pa la ni mgo/ yan lag dang nying lag 'dod pa la ni yan lag dang nying lag/ sha dang / khrag dang / rkang 'dod pa la ni sha dang / khrag dang / rkang yongs
107a6(nyi khri): su gtong ste/ de'ang gnas shing yongs su gtong la/ de 'di snyam du bdag ni yongs su gtong ba'o// 'di ni len pa'o// 'di ni sbyin pa'o// bdag ni ser sna med pa'o// bdag ni
107a7(nyi khri): sbyin pa'i bdag po'o/ / bdag ni bdog pa thams cad yongs su gtong ba'o// bdag ni sangs rgyas kyi bka' bzhin du byed pa'o// bdag ni sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'o zhes te/ sbyin pa
107b1(nyi khri): de byin nas kyang dmigs pa'i tshul gyis/ sems can thams cad dang thun mong du byas te/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sngo zhing / bdag gi sbyin pa'i 'bras bu 'dis sems can
107b2(nyi khri): 'di dag tshe 'di nyid la bde ba dang / nye bar len pa med par yongs su mya ngan las 'das par gyur cig ces yongs su sngo ste/ de chags pa gsum la chags shing / sbyin pa de yongs su gtong ngo //
107b3(nyi khri): gsum gang zhe na/ 'di ltar bdag tu 'du shes pa dang / gzhan du 'du shes pa dang / sbyin par 'du shes pa 'di gsum la chags nas/ sbyin pa de dag yongs su gtong ste/ 'di
107b4(nyi khri): ni 'jig rten pa'i sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa zhes bya'o/ / de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'jig rten pa'i sbyon pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa zhes bya zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar 'jig rten las mi g.yo mi 'phags
107b5(nyi khri): mi 'da' bas/ de'i phyir 'jig rten pa'i sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa zhes bya'o// de la 'jig rten las 'das pa'i sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa gang zhe na/ 'di ltar 'khor gsum yongs
107b6(nyi khri): su dag pa ste/ de la 'khor gsum yongs su dag pa gang zhe na/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sbyin pa gtong ba'i tshe/ bdag
107b7(nyi khri): mi dmigs len pa mi dmigs sbyin pa mi dmigs/ rnam par smin pa la'ang dga' bar mi byed cing / tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems
108a1(nyi khri): / dpa' chen po'i 'khor gsum yongs su dag pa'o// tshe dang ldan pa shA rArA ng+ka bu/ gzhan sang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sbyin pa yongs su gdong zhing sbyin pa/
108a2(nyi khri): desems can thams cad la gtong ste/ sems can de dag kyang mi dmigs par bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sngo zhing / mtshan ma cung zad kyang yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ba 'di ni
108a3(nyi khri): tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ 'jig rten las 'das pa'i sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa zhes bya'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'jig rten las 'das pa'i sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa zhes bya zhe na/ de ni
108a4(nyi khri): 'di ltar 'jig rten las g.yo zhing 'phags la 'da' bas/ de'i phyir 'jig rten las 'das pa'i sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa zhes bya'o// tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu
108a5(nyi khri): tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol
108a6(nyi khri): tu phyin pa ni 'jig rten pa'ang yod/ 'jig rten las 'das pa'ang yod/ de la 'jig rten pa'i tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gang zhe na/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu
108a7(nyi khri): 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshul khrims srung zhing / de'ang gnas pas srung ste/ de 'di snyam du bdag ni sems can thams cad kyi don du tshul khrims
108b1(nyi khri): srung nga / / 'di ni tshul khrims so// bdag ni sangs rgyas kyi bka' bzhin du byed do zhes bya ba nas/ de 'di ltar bdag tu 'du shes pa dang / gzhan du 'du shes pa dang
108b2(nyi khri): tshul khrims su 'du shes pa dang / chags pa 'di gsum zhes bya ba'i bar la chags shing tshul khrims srung ste/ 'di ni 'jig rten pa'i tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zhes bya'o//
108b3(nyi khri): de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'jig rten pa'i tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zhes bya zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar 'jig rten las mi g.yo mi 'phags mi 'da' bas/ de'i phyir 'ji rten pa zhes bya'o// de
108b4(nyi khri): la 'jig rten las 'das pa'i tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gang zhe na/ 'di ltar 'khor gsum yongs su dag pa ste/ de la 'khor gsum yongs su dag pa gang zhe na/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa
108b5(nyi khri): ti'i bu/ 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshul khrims srung ba'i tshe/ bdag mi dmigs/ sems can mi dmigs/ tshul khrims mi dmigs/ rnam par
108b6(nyi khri): smin pa la'ang dga' bar mi byed cing / tshul khrims de'ang sems can thams cad la gtong ste/ sems can de dag kyang mi dmigs par bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub
108b7(nyi khri): tu sngo zhing / mtshan ma cung zad kyang yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ba 'di ni/ 'jig rten las 'das pa'i tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zhes bya ste/ de ni 'di ltar 'jig

109a2(nyi khri): ya sa mas pa sa mas
109a3(nyi khri): mo/ na bye sa smra sadu
109a4(nyi khri): mang par 'du shes pa das pa 'digs pa shes da ba'i bang la chags shing bzod pa so / 'din 'jig rten pa'i 'thod pa'i ma rol tu phyin pa zhes bya/
