341b1(nyi khri): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / thabs mkhas pas yongs su bzung ba de dag gis/ rigs kyi bu dang / rigs kyi bu mo snga ma thabs mkhas pa dang /
341b2(nyi khri): mi ldan pa dmigs pa'i spyod pa can de dag gi dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag zil gyis mnan pa ngo mtshar che'o zhes sgrar bsgrags te dbyangs su brjod do// tshangs ris dang / tshangs lha nye phan dang /
341b3(nyi khri): tshangs pa kun 'khor dang / tshangs chen dang / snang ba dang / chung snang dang / tshad med snang ba dang / kun snang dang ba dang / che ba dang / chung che dang / dge ba dang / chung dge dang / tshad med
341b4(nyi khri): dge ba dang / dge rgyas dang / 'bras bu che ba dang / gnas gtsang ma'i ris kyi lha bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong du ma bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der lhags nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs
341b5(nyi khri): gnyis la spyi bos phyag 'tshal te/ bcom ldan 'das de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / thabs mkhas pas yongs su bzung ba de dag
341b6(nyi khri): gis/ rigs kyi bu dang / rigs kyi bu mo de dag snga ma thabs mkhas pa dang mi ldan pa dmigs pa'i spyod pa can de dag gis dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag zil gyis mnan pa ngo mtshar tsha'o zhes sgrar
341b7(nyi khri): bsgrags te dbyangs su brjod do/ / de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha rnams dang // gnas gtsang ma'i ris kyibar kyi lha rnams la bka' stsal pa/
342a1(nyi khri): lha'i bu dag gal te stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi sems can ji snyed pa de dag thams cad bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu zhugs
342a2(nyi khri): par gyur te/ phyogs bcu'i de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'das pa dang / ma byon pa dang / da ltar byung ba de dag thams cad dang / nyan thos
342a3(nyi khri): dang / rang sangs rgyas de dag gis sems dang po bskyed pa nas/ dam pa'i chos gnas pa'i bar gyi sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag dang / nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas de dag dang /
342a4(nyi khri): sems can rnams kyi sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa 'am/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'am/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa 'am/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'am/ bsam
342a5(nyi khri): gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'am/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'am/ sbyin pa 'am/ tshul khrims sam/ bzod pa 'am/ brtson 'grus sam/ bsam gtan nam/ shes rab
342a6(nyi khri): bam/ tshul khrims kyi phung po 'am/ ting nge 'dzin gyi phung po 'am/ shes rab kyi phung po 'am/ rnam par grol ba'i phung po 'am/ rnam par grol ba'i ye shes mthong ba'i phung po 'am
342a7(nyi khri): sangs rgyas kyi chos tshad med pa gzhan dag kyang rung ste/ de dag thams cad gcig tu bsdus nas rjes su yi rang bar byas la/ de ltar rjes su yi rang nas kyang / dmigs pa'i tshul gyis
342b1(nyi khri): bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngo ba pas/ rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yang dag par zhugs
342b2(nyi khri): pabar gyur te/ des 'das pa dang / ma byon pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das nyan thos sangs rgyas su bcas pa de dag gis sems dang po bskyed pa nas/ dam pa'i
342b3(nyi khri): chos gnas pa'i bar gyi sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa 'am/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'am/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa 'am/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'am/ bsam gtan gyi
342b4(nyi khri): pha rol tu phyin pa 'am/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'am/ gzhan yang sangs rgyas kyi chos tshad med pa'i bar de dag thams cad gcig tu bsdus te dmigs su med pa'i tshul dang / gnyis su
342b5(nyi khri): med pa'i tshul dang / mtshan ma med pa'i tshul dang / chags pa med pa'i tshul dang / byed pa med pa'i tshul du rjes su yi rang ba'i rab kyis rjes su yi rang ba dang / rjes su yi rang ba'i gtso bo
342b6(nyi khri): dang / dam pa dang / mchog dang / phul dang / gya nom pa dang / bla na med pa dang / gong na med pa dang / mnyam pa med pa dang / mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pas rjes su
342b7(nyi khri): yi rang nas/ rjes su yi rang ba dang ldan pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba de dmigs su med pa'i tshul dang / gnyis su med pa'i tshul dang / mtshan ma med pa'i tshul dang / chags pa med pa
343a1(nyi khri): tshul dang / byed pa med pa'i tshul gyis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngo na/ rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo de ni/ rigs
343a2(nyi khri): kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo snga ma de dag pas bsod nams ches yang du 'phel te/ dge ba'i rtsa ba 'di la ni dge ba'i rtsa ba snga ma nges brgya'i char yang nye bar mi 'gro'o// rgyu'i bar du'ang
343a3(nyi khri): mi bzod do/ / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dmigs pa med pa'i tshul gyi yongs su bsngo ba 'di ni mchog ces bya'o// mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'i bar zhes bya'o//
343a4(nyi khri): de nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das kyis gang de skad du rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu
343a5(nyi khri): mo gang gis dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag thams cad mngon par bsdus te/ gcig tu brtul nas tshad bzung ste/ rjes su yi rang ba dang ldan pa'i rab kyis rjes su yi rang ba dang / rjes su
343a6(nyi khri): yi rang ba mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'i bar gyis rjes su yi rang bar byed do zhes bka' stsal na/ bcom ldan 'das ji tsam gyis na rjes su yi rang ba'i dam par 'gyur/ ji tsam
343a7(nyi khri): gyis na rjes su yi rang ba'i mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'i bar du 'gyur ba lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ nam rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo de dag 'das
343b1(nyi khri): pa dang / ma byon pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa rnams dang / rang sangs rgyas de
343b2(nyi khri): dag dang / sems can thams cad kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag mi len mi gtong ba dang / mi rlom mi 'dzum zhing / dmigs pa'ang ma yin/ mi dmigs pa'ang ma yin la/ de 'di snyam du
343b3(nyi khri): 'di la chos gang yang skye ba'ang med/ 'gag pa'ang med/ nyon mongs par gyur pa'ang med// rnam par byang bar gyur pa'ang med/ chos de dag la 'grib pa'ang med/ 'phel ba'ang med
343b4(nyi khri): 'ong ba'ang med/ 'gro ba'ang med/ phung por gyur pa'ang med do zhes rnam grangs de lta bus 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i chos rnams kyi de bzhin nyid dang / ma nor ba de
343b5(nyi khri): bzhin nyid dang / gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin nyid dang / chos nyid dang / chos kyi gnas nyid dang / chos kyi dbyings dang / chos skyon med pa nyid ji lta ba de ltar bdag gis rjes su yi rang bar bgyi'o// rjes
343b6(nyi khri): su yi rang nas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngo'o/ / zhes de ltar yongs su bsngo ba'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i rjes su yi rang ba de ni dam par
343b7(nyi khri): 'gyur te/ rjes su yi rang ba de dag ni mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'i bar du 'gyur ro// rab 'byor rjes su yi rang ba 'di la ni de ma yin pa'i rjes su yi rang ba gzhan thams cad kyis brgya'i char yang nye
344a1(nyi khri): bar mi 'gyur/ / rgyu'i bar du'ang nye bar mi bzod do// rjes su yi rang ba 'di ni de ma yin pa'i rjes su yi rang ba gzhan dag pas rab ces bya'o// gtso bo zhes bya'o// dam pa
344a2(nyi khri): zhes bya'o/ / mchog ces bya'o// phul zhes bya'o// gya nom pa zhes bya'o// bla na med pa zhes bya'o// gong na med pa zhes bya'o// mnyam pa med pa zhes bya'o// mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa zhes bya'o//
344a3(nyi khri): rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mos 'das pa dang / ma byon pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs
344a4(nyi khri): rgyas de dag dang / nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas su bcas pa de dag gis sems dang po bskyed pa nas/ dam pa'i chos gnas pa'i bar gyi sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang
344a5(nyi khri): bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang ldan pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba dang / gzhan yang sangs rgyas
344a6(nyi khri): kyi chos tshad med pa'i bar dang / sems can thams cad kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba ji snyed pa de dag thams cad la rjes su yi rang bar 'dod na/ 'di ltar rjes su yi rang bar bya'o// rnam par grol ba ji lta ba de lta bu ni
344a7(nyi khri): gzugs so/ / rnam par grol ba ji lta ba de lta bu ni tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa rnams so// rnam par grol ba ji lta ba de lta bu ni skye mched rnams dang / khams rnams so//
344b1(nyi khri): rnam par grol ba ji lta ba de lta bu ni rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba rnams so// rnam par grol ba ji lta ba de lta bu ni sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o// rnam par grol ba ji lta ba de lta bu ni tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin
344b2(nyi khri): pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o// rnam par grol ba ji lta ba de lta bu ni nang stong pa nyid
344b3(nyi khri): dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar du'o// rnam par grol ba ji lta ba de lta bu ni byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams so// rnam par grol ba ji lta ba de lta bu ni 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams
344b4(nyi khri): dang / bsam gtan rnams dang / tshad med pa rnams dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams so// rnam par grol ba ji lta ba de lta bu ni rnam par thar pa brgyad dang / mthar gyis gnas
344b5(nyi khri): pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / mngon par shes pa rnams so// rnam par grol ba ji lta ba de lta bu ni ting nge
344b6(nyi khri): 'dzin rnams dang / gzungs kyi sgo rnams so// rnam par grol ba ji lta ba de lta bu ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang /
344b7(nyi khri): sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad do// rnam par grol ba ji lta ba de lta bu ni rnam par grol ba'i ye shes mthong ba'o// rnam par grol ba ji lta ba de lta bu ni rnam par grol ba'i ye shes
345a1(nyi khri): mthong ba'i phung po'o/ / rnam par grol ba ji lta ba de lta bu ni mos pa'o// rnam par grol ba ji lta ba de lta bu ni rjes su yi rang ba'o// rnam par grol ba ji lta ba de lta bu ni 'das/
345a2(nyi khri): pa dang / ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i chos rnams so// rnam par grol ba ji lta ba de lta bu ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag go/ rnam par grol ba ji lta ba de lta bu ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan
345a3(nyi khri): 'das de dag gi yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa'o/ / rnam par grol ba ji lta ba de lta bu ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gi nyan thos rnams dang / nyan thos de dag gi yongs su mya ngan las 'das
345a4(nyi khri): pa'o/ / rnam par grol ba ji lta ba de lta bu ni rang sangs rgyas rnams dang / rang sangs rgyas de dag gi yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa'o// rnam par grol ba ji lta ba de lta bu ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gi
345a5(nyi khri): chos nyid do/ / rnam par grol ba ji lta ba de lta bu ni nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas de dag gi chos nyid do// rnam par grol ba ji lta ba de lta bu ni chos rnams kyi chos nyid do zhes de ltar chos ma chags pa dang / ma bcings pa
345a6(nyi khri): dang / ma grol ba dang / ma zhen pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang / rnam par byang ba med pa rnams kyi ches nyid dang / chos ma skyes pa dang / yongs su ma skyes pa dang / ma byung ba dang / ma 'gags pa'i
345a7(nyi khri): chos nyid ji lta ba de bzhin du 'pho ba med pa dang / 'jigs pa med pa nye bar bzung ste/ bla ma med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngo ste/ rab 'byor 'di ni byang chub sems/
345b1(nyi khri): dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi rjes su yi rang ba'i rab bo// rjes su yi rang ba'i mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'i bar ro// rab 'byor rjes su yi rang ba de dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
345b2(nyi khri): po ni/ myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o// rab 'byor gzhan yang shar phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma
345b3(nyi khri): snyed dag na sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa gang ji snyed cig bzhugs pa dang / 'tsho skyong zhing chos ston pa dang / lho dang / nub dang / byang dang / byang shar dang /
345b4(nyi khri): shar lho dang / lho nub dang / nub byang dang / 'og dang / steng gi phyogs kyi phyogs re re zhing 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag nas sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das nyan thos kyi dge
345b5(nyi khri): 'dun dang bcas pa gang ji snyed cig bzhugs pa dang / 'tsho skyong zhing chos ston pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa de dag la/
345b6(nyi khri): byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo la la zhig gis nam 'tsho'i bar du na 'aza' dang / bsod snyoms dang / gzims cha dang / snyun gyi rkyen rtsi dang / yo
345b7(nyi khri): byang mang po dang / bde ba'i yo byad mang po thams cad kyis rim gror byas/ bkur stir byas/ bsti stang du byas/ mchod par byas pa dang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag yongs su mya ngan
346a1(nyi khri): las 'das nas kyang / / de dag gi ring bsrel la nyin mtshan du me tog dang / 'phreng ba dang / spos dang / byug pa dang / phye ma dang / na bza' dang / gdugs dang / rgyal
346a2(nyi khri): mtshan dang / ba dan mang pos rim gror bya ba dang / bkur stir bya ba dang / bsti stang du bya ba dang / mchod par bya ba'i don du nyams su len cing / de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis tshul khrims srung ba dang /
346a3(nyi khri): de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis bzod pa sgom pa dang / de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis brtson 'grus rtsom pa dang / de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis bsam gtan la snyoms par 'jug pa dang / de mi dmigs
346a4(nyi khri): pa'i tshul gyis shes rab sgom pa bas/ rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yang dag par zhugs pa gang sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la mi dmigs
346a5(nyi khri): pa'i tshul gyis spyod pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes
346a6(nyi khri): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mkhas pas dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngos na/ bsod nams//
346a7(nyi khri): mngon par 'du bya ba dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba mngon par 'du bya ba 'di la ni/ bsod nams mngon par 'du bya ba snga mas brgya'i char yang nye bar mi 'gro'o// rgyu'i bar du'ab/
346b1(nyi khri): mi bzod do// yongs su bsngo ba de ni rab ces bya'o// gong na med pa'i bar zhes bya'o// rab 'byor de ltar mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin
346b2(nyi khri): pa la spyod pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi/
346b3(nyi khri): pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mkhas pas dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngo bar bya'o// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong
346b4(nyi khri): phrag nyi shu lnga pa las/ yongs su bsngo ba'i le'u ste nyi shu bzhi pa'o// // de nas tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bus/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to//
346b5(nyi khri): bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni shin tu rnam par dag pa'i slad du snang bar bgyid pa'o// bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni phyag bgyi bar 'os pa'o// bcom
346b6(nyi khri): ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bdag phyag 'tshal lo/ / bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni khams gsum pa thams cad kyis ma gos pa'o// bcom ldan
346b7(nyi khri): 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni nyon mongs pa dang / lta ba'i mun pa thams cad gsal ba la rab rib ma mchis par bgyid pa'o// bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni
347a1(nyi khri): byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams kyi rang na mchog tu bgyid pa'o/ / bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni 'jigs pa dang / gnod pa dang / 'tshe ba
347a2(nyi khri): thams cad rab tu 'byin pa'i slad du bde bar bgyid pa'o/ / bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni sems can thams cad kyi mig lnga yongs su thob par bgyid pa lnga snang bar
347a3(nyi khri): bgyid pa'o/ / bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni sems can thams cad shul gol bar zhugs pa rnams mtha' las zlog pa'i slad du shul ston pa'o// bcom ldan
347a4(nyi khri): 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni bag chags kyi mtshams sbyor ba'i nyon mongs pa thams cad spang ba la thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du bgyid pa'o/ / bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha
347a5(nyi khri): rol tu phyin pa ni sangs rgyas kyi chos skyed pa ste/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi ma'o// bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid
347a6(nyi khri): kyi slad du ma skyes ma 'gags pa'o/ / bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni mi rtag mi 'jigs pa'i slad du 'khor ba'i gnyen po'o// bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
347a7(nyi khri): pa ni chos rin po che thams cad spobs pa'i slad du sems can mgon ma mchis pa rnams kyi mgon bgyid pa'o/ / bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni thub pa ma mchis pa'i
347b1(nyi khri): slad du stobs bcu bgyid pa'o/ / bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni 'gro ba dang ldog pa ma mchis pa'i slad du rnam pa bcu gnyis rgyud gsum du 'khor ba'i chos kyi 'khor lo bskur pa'o//
347b2(nyi khri): bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni dngos po la mchis pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi slad du chos thams cad kyi ngo bo nyid ston pa'o// bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa 'am/
347b3(nyi khri): nyan thos sam/ nyan thos kyi theg pa pa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas sam/ rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa pas ji ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas par bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das kyis
347b4(nyi khri): bka' stsal pa/ shA ra dwa ti'i bu ston pa la gnas pa ji lta ba de bzhin du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas par bya'o// ston pa la ji ltar phyag bya ba de bzhin du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
347b5(nyi khri): pa la phyag bya'o/ / de ci'i phyir zhe na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid ston pa yin te/ ston pa'ang gzhan ma yin/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'ang gzhan ma yin/ stong pa nyid kyang shes
347b6(nyi khri): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa nyid kyang ston pa'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di las de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs
347b7(nyi khri): rgyas rnams byung ngo / / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams dang / rang sangs rgyas rnams dang / dgra bcom pa dang / phyir mi 'ong ba dang / lan cig phyir 'ong ba dang
348a1(nyi khri): rgyun du zhugs rnams byung ngo / / de'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam rnams byung ngo // bsam gtan bzhi dang / tshad med pa bzhi dang
348a2(nyi khri): gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang / mngon par shes pa lnga dang / sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson
348a3(nyi khri): 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / nang stong pa nyid dang / phyi stong pa nyid dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo
348a4(nyi khri): nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar dang / byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi dang / bsam gtan bzhi dang / tshad med pa bzhi dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa
348a5(nyi khri): bzhi dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / mngon par shes pa rnams dang / ting nge 'dzin rnams
348a6(nyi khri): dang / gzungs kyi sgo rnams dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po dang / sangs rgyas kyi
348a7(nyi khri): chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad dang / thams cad shes pa nyid dang / lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid byung ngo // de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin 'di sa
348b1(nyi khri): du gyur te/ btsun pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu zhu ba 'di gang las skyes/ ci'i rgyu snyam pa dang / denas tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bus/ lha'i dbang po brgya byin la 'di skad ces smras so// 3/
348b2(nyi khri): shi ka byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pas yongs su bzung ba rnams ni/ thabs mkhas pas 'das pa dang / ma byon pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas
348b3(nyi khri): bcom ldan 'das de dag gi thugs dang po bskyed pa nas/ dam pa'i chos gnas pa'i bar gyi sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa dang / rang sangs rgyas dang bcas pa de dag
348b4(nyi khri): dang / sems can thams cad kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag thams cad gcig tu bsdus te/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du yongs su bsngo bas na/ bdag gi zhu ba skyes so// ko'u shi ka byang chub
348b5(nyi khri): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni/ sbyin pha rol tu phyin pa zil gyis gnon to// tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /
348b6(nyi khri): brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa zil gyis gnon to// ke'u shi ka 'di lta ste/ dper na dmus long brgya 'am/ stong ngam/ brgya phrag stong yang rung ste/
348b7(nyi khri): dmigs bu med par lam du 'jug par yang mi nus na/ grong khyer du 'gro ba blta ga la nus ko'u shi ka de bzhin du pha rol tu phyin pa lnga po 'di dag ni dmus long lta bur gyur pa ste/
349a1(nyi khri): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med na de dag la dmigs bu med pas/ byang chub kyi lam yang bskyed mi nus na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi grong khyer du 'jug pa
349a2(nyi khri): lta ga la nus/ ko'u shi ka pha rol tu phyin pa lnga nam shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pas yongs su zin par gyur pa de'i tshe/ mig dang ldan par gyur te/ pha rol tu phyin pa lnga po 'di dag ni shes
349a3(nyi khri): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pas yongs su bzung na/ pha rol tu phyin pa'i ming thob bo// de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu la 'di
349a4(nyi khri): skad ces smras so/ / btsun pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu sa/ gang 'di skad du pha rol tu phyin pa lnga po 'di dag shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pas yongs su bzung na/ pha rol tu phyin pa'i
349a5(nyi khri): ming 'thob bo zhes smra na/ btsun pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu de ni der yang ma zad de/ pha rol tu phyin pa lnga ni sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pas yongs su bzung yang / pha rol tu phyin pa'i
349a6(nyi khri): ming 'thob bo/ / pha rol tu phyin pa lnga ni tshul khrims dang / bzod pa dang / brtson 'grus dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pas yongs su bzung yang / pha rol
349a7(nyi khri): tu phyin pa'i ming 'thob bo/ / smras pa/ de lta ma yin te/ ko'u shi ka de ni de lta ma yin no// pha rol tu phyin pa lnga ni sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pas yongs su bzung bas/ pha rol tu
349b1(nyi khri): phyin pa'i ming thob par mi 'gyur/ pha rol tu phyin pa lnga ni tshul khrims dang / bzod pa dang / brtson 'grus dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pas yongs su bzung bas/ pha rol
349b2(nyi khri): tu phyin pa'i ming thob par mi 'gyur gyi/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pas yongs su bzung ba'i pha rol tu phyin pa lnga ni/ pha rol tu phyin pa'i ming 'thob ste/ ko'u shi ka shes rab kyi pha
349b3(nyi khri): rol tu phyin pa la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par byed do// tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /
349b4(nyi khri): bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par
349b5(nyi khri): byed do/ / ko'u shi ka de bas na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni/ pha rol tu phyin pa lngapo 'di dag gi rab ces bya'o// gtso bo dang / dam pa dang / mchog dang / phul dang /
349b6(nyi khri): gya nom pa dang / bla na med pa dang / gong na med pa zhes bya'o// de nas tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bus/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom
349b7(nyi khri): ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni ji ltar mngon par bsgrub par bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka'i stsal pa/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu gzugs mngon par bsgrub pa med pa'i phyir
350a1(nyi khri): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mngon par bsgrub par bya'o/ / tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa mngon par bsgrub pa med pa'i phyir
350a2(nyi khri): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mngon par bsgrub par bya'o/ / skye mched dang / khams dang / rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba rnams mngon par bsgrub pa med pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu
350a3(nyi khri): phyin pa mngon par bsgrub par bya'o/ / sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa mngon par bsgrub pa med pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mngon par bsgrub par bya'o// tshul khrims dang / bzod pa dang /
350a4(nyi khri): brtson 'grus dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa mngon par bsgrub pa med pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mngon par bsgrub par bya'o// nang stong pa nyid mngon par bsgrub pa med pa'i phyir/
350a5(nyi khri): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mngon par bsgrub par bya'o// dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar du mngon par bsgrub pa med pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mngon par bsgrub par bya'o//
350a6(nyi khri): byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun mngon par bsgrub pa med pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mngon par bsgrub par bya'o// 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams dang / bsam gtan
350a7(nyi khri): rnams dang / tshad med pa rnams dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dbu dang
350b1(nyi khri): stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / mngon par shes pa rnams dang / ting nge 'dzin rnams dang / gzungs kyi sgo rnams dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs
350b2(nyi khri): rnams dang / mi 'jigs pa rnams dang / so so yang dag par rig pa rnams dang / byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams mngon par
350b3(nyi khri): bsgrub pa med pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mngon par bsgrub par bya'o// thams cad shes pa nyid dang / lam gyi rnam par shes pa nyid dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid
350b4(nyi khri): mngon par bsgrub pa med pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mngon par bsgrub par bya'o// de bzhin du chos thams cad mngon par bsgrub pa med pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi
350b5(nyi khri): rol tu phyin pa mngon par bsgrub par bya'o/ / gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das ji ltar gzugs mngon par bsgrub pa ma mchis pa'i slad du/ shes rab kyi pha rol
350b6(nyi khri): tu phyin pa mngon par bsgrub par bgyi/ ji ltar chos thams cad kyi bar du mngon par bsgrub pa ma mchis pa'i slad du/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mngon par bsgrub par bgyi/
350b7(nyi khri): bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ gzugs mngon par 'du bya ba med pa dang / gzugs skye ba med pa dang / gzugs 'gag pa med pa dang / gzugs dmigs
351a1(nyi khri): pa med pa dang / gzugs 'jig pa med pas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mngon par bsgrub par bya'o// chos thams cad kyi bar du mngon par 'du bya ba med//
351a2(nyi khri): pa dang / skye ba med pa dang / 'gag pa med pa dang / dmigs pa med pa dang / 'jigs pa med pas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu byin pa mngon par bsgrub par bya'o// gsol pa/ bcom ldan
351a3(nyi khri): 'das de ltar mngon par bsgrub pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa chos gang thob par bgyid/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ shA ra dwa ti'i bu de ltar mngon par bsgrub pa'i shes rab kyi pha
351a4(nyi khri): rol tu phyin pa ni chos gang yang thob par mi byed de/ nam chos gang yang thob par mi byed pa de'i tshe/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i grangs su 'gro'o// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das chos thams cad thob par mi
351a5(nyi khri): bgyid pa gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ mi dge ba'i chos rnams thob par mi byed do// dge ba'i chos rnams thob par mi byed do// 'jig rten pa dang / 'jig rten las 'das pa dang //
351a6(nyi khri): zag pa dang bcas pa dang / zag pa med pa dang / kha na ma tho ba dang bcas pa dang / kha na ma tho ba med pa dang / 'dus byas dang / 'dus ma byas kyi chos rnams thob par mi byed do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ shes
351a7(nyi khri): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni chos gang gi phyir yang dmigs pa'i tshul gyis nyer bar mi gnas te/ de'i phyir chos gang yang thob par byed pa pa yin no// de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis/
351b1(nyi khri): bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das ci lags/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang thob par mi bgyid dang/ bcom ldan 'das
351b2(nyi khri): kyis bka' stsal pa/ ko'u shi ka gang de skad du ni lags/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang thob par mi byed dam zhes zer ba ni/ ko'u shi ka
351b3(nyi khri): de de bzhin no/ / de de bzhin te/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang thob par mi byed/ dmigs par mi byed do// brgya byin gyis gsol pa/
351b4(nyi khri): bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang thob par mi bgyid/ dmigs par mi bgyid pa lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka'
351b5(nyi khri): stsal pa/ ko'u shi ka shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni ming ji lta ba dang / mtshan ma ji lta ba dang / mngon par 'du bya ba ji lta ba bzhin du thob par mi byed pa yin no//
351b6(nyi khri): brgya byin gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'o na ji ltar thob par bgyi ba lags bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ mi dmigs pa dang / mi len pa dang /
351b7(nyi khri): mi gnas pa dang / mi 'dor ba dang / mngon par chags pa med pa de ltar thob par byed de/ gang yang thob par byed pa med do// ko'u shi ka de ltar na shes rab kyi pha rol tu
352a1(nyi khri): phyin pa ni chos thams cad thob par mi byed do/ / gang yang thob par mi byed do// brgya byin gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
352a2(nyi khri): 'di chos thams cad skye ba ma mchis pa dang / 'gag pa ma mchis pa dang / mngon par 'du bgyi ba ma mchis pa dang / dmigs pa ma mchis pa dang / 'jig pa ma mchis pa'i slad du nye bar
352a3(nyi khri): gnas pa ngo mtshar che'o/ / de nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems
352a4(nyi khri): dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ de ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni chos thams cad thob par bgyid pa'o// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni chos thams cad
352a5(nyi khri): thob par mi bgyid pa'o zhes de lta bu'i 'du shes su gyur na/ bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'dor ba lags so//
352a6(nyi khri): bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ring du bgyid pa lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab
352a7(nyi khri): 'byor rnam grangs gang gis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'dor bar byed pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ring du byed pa de lta bu'i
352b1(nyi khri): rnam grangs yod de/ gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ kye ma shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni gsob bo// kye ma shes rab
352b2(nyi khri): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni gsog go/ kye ma shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni snying po med pa'o snyam du de ltar 'du shes na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
352b3(nyi khri): pa 'dor bar byed pa'o/ / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ring du byed pa'o// rab 'byor de ni rnam grangs gang gis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen/
352b4(nyi khri): po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'dor bar byed pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ring du byed pa'i rnam grangs so// gsol pa// /
352b5(nyi khri): bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la yid ches pas/ chos gang la yid ches par mi 'gyur ba lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor shes rab kyi pha
352b6(nyi khri): rol tu phyin pa la yid ches pas/ gzugs la yid ches par mi 'gyur ro// tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa la yid ches par mi 'gyur ro//
352b7(nyi khri): mig la yid ches par mi 'gyur ro// rna ba dang / sna dang / lce dang / lus dang / yid la yid ces par mi 'gyur ro// gzugs la yid ces par mi 'gyur ro// s+tha dang /
353a1(nyi khri): dri dang / ro dang / reg dang / chos la yid ches par mi 'gyur ro// mig gi rnam par shes pa la yid ches par mi 'gyur ro// rna ba'i rnam par shes pa dang / sna'i rnam
353a2(nyi khri): par shes pa dang / lce'i rnam par shes pa dang / lus kyi rnam par shes pa dang / yid kyi rnam par shes pa la yid ches par mi 'gyur ro// mig gi 'dus te reg pa la yid ches par mi 'gyur ro//
353a3(nyi khri): rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa dang / sna'i 'dus te reg pa dang / lce'i 'dus te reg pa dang / lus kyi 'dus te reg pa dang / yid kyi 'dus te reg pa la yid ches par mi 'gyur ro// mig gi 'dus te reg
353a4(nyi khri): pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba la yid ches par mi 'gyur ro/ / rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dang / sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dang / lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dang /
353a5(nyi khri): lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dang / yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba la yid ches par mi 'gyur ro// sa'i khams la yid ches par mi 'gyur ro// chu'i khams dang /
353a6(nyi khri): me'i khams dang / rlung gi khams dang / nam mkha'i khams dang / rnam par shes pa'i khams la yid ches par mi 'gyur ro// ma rig pa la yid ches par mi 'gyur ro//
353a7(nyi khri): 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa dang / ming dang gzugs dang / skye mched drug dang / reg pa dang / tshor ba dang / sred pa dang / len pa dang / srid pa dang /
353b1(nyi khri): skye ba dang / rga shi la yid ches par mi 'gyur ro// sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la yid ches par mi 'gyur ro// tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /

353b3(nyi khri): phyi stong pa nyid dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid la yid ches par mi 'gyur ro// dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar la yid ches par mi 'gyur ro// byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos
353b4(nyi khri): sum cu rtsa bdun la yid ches par mi 'gyur ro/ / 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi dang / bsam gtan bzhi dang / tshad med pa bzhi dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi

353b6(nyi khri): ba rnams dang / ting nge 'dzin rnams dang / gzungs kyi sgo rnams dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang
353b7(nyi khri): byabs pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad la yid ches par mi 'gyur ro// rgyun du zhus pa'i 'bras bu la yid ches par mi 'gyur ro// lan
354a1(nyi khri): cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / dgra bcom pa nyid la yid ches par mi 'gyur ro// rang byang chub la yid ches par mi 'gyur ro//
354a2(nyi khri): lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid la yid ches par mi 'gyur ro// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la yid ches par mi 'gyur ro// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
354a3(nyi khri): la yid ches pas gzugs la yid ches par mi 'gyur ba lags/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar la yid ches par mi 'gyur ba lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/
354a4(nyi khri): rab 'byor gzugs su mi dmigs pas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la yid ches par 'gyur/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du mi dmigs pas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
354a5(nyi khri): pa la yid ches par 'gyur te/ de ltar na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la yid ches pas/ gzugs la yid ches par mi 'gyur ro// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar la yid ches par mi 'gyur
354a6(nyi khri): ro/ / gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni pha rol tu phyin pa chen mo'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems
354a7(nyi khri): rgyu gang gis na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di pha rol tu phyin pa chen mo yin/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni gzugs che bar mi bgyid chung bar mi bgyid/
354b1(nyi khri): tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa che bar mi bgyid/ chung bar mi bgyid/ skye mched dang / khams dang / rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba che bar mi bgyid/ rlung /
354b2(nyi khri): bar mi bgyid/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa che bar mi bgyid/ chung bar mi bgyid/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin
354b3(nyi khri): pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa che bar mi bgyid/ chung bar mi bgyid/ nang stong pa nyid che bar mi bgyid/ chung bar mi bgyid/ phyi stong pa
354b4(nyi khri): zhing dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar che bar mi bgyid/ chung bar mi bgyid/ byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdud che bar mi bgyid
354b5(nyi khri): chung bar mi bgyid/ 'phags pa'i bden pa dang / bsam gtan dang / tshad med pa dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad dang / mthar gyis
354b6(nyi khri): gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / mngon par shes pa rnams che bar mi bgyid/ chung bar mi bgyid/ ting nge
354b7(nyi khri): 'dzin rnams dang / gzungs kyi sgo rnams dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa
355a1(nyi khri): bco brgyad che bar mi bgyid/ rung bar mi bgyid/ rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu che bar mi bgyid/ chung bar mi bgyid/ la cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / byir rmi
355a2(nyi khri): 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / dgra bcom pa nyid dang / rang byang chub che bar mi bgyid/ chung bar mi bgyid/ lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid dang / byang chub dang / sangs rgyas dang / sangs rgyas kyi
355a3(nyi khri): chos rnams che bar mi bgyid/ chung bar mi bgyid/ gzhan yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni gzugs 'du bar mi bgyid/ yangs par mi bgyid/ tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang /
355a4(nyi khri): 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa 'du bar mi bgyid/ yangs par mi bgyid/ byang chub dang / sangs rgyas dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams kyi bar du 'du bar mi bgyid/ yangs par mi bgyid/
355a5(nyi khri): gzhan yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni gzugs tshad mchis par mi bgyid/ tshad ma mchis par mi bgyid/ byang chub dang / sangs rgyas dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams kyi bar du tshad
355a6(nyi khri): mchis par mi bgyid/ tshad ma mchis par mi bgyid/ gzhan yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni gzugs rgya chen por mi bgyid/ rgya chung ngur mi bgyid/ byang chub dang / sangs rgyas
355a7(nyi khri): dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams kyi bar du rgya chen por mi bgyid/ rgya chung ngur mi bgyid/ gzhan yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni gzugs mthu dang ldan par mi bgyid/ mthu ma mchis
355b1(nyi khri): par mi bgyid/ byang chub dang / sangs rgyas dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams kyi bar du mthu dang ldan par mi bgyid/ mthu ma mchis par mi bgyid de/ bcom ldan 'das rnam grangs des na/ 'di
355b2(nyi khri): lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa chen mo'o// bcom ldan 'das gal te yang byang chub sems dpa' sems
355b3(nyi khri): dpa' chen po theg pa la gsar du zhugs pas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la brten/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod
355b4(nyi khri): pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la brten nas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni gzugs che bar mi bgyid/ chung bar
355b5(nyi khri): mi bgyid do/ / byang chub dang / sangs rgyas dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams kyi bar du che bar mi bgyid/ chung bar mi bgyid do// gzugs mthu dang ldan par mi bgyid
355b6(nyi khri): mthu ma mchis par mi bgyid do/ / byang chub dang / sangs rgyas dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams kyi bar du mthu dang ldan par mi bgyid/ mthu ma mchis par mi bgyid do zhes
355b7(nyi khri): bgyi bar 'du shes su gyur na/ bcom ldan 'das de ltar 'du shes su gyur pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa ma lags so//
356a1(nyi khri): de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gang gzugs che bar bgyid pa 'am/ chung bar bgyid pa de ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang 'thun pa'i 'bras bus lags so// byang
356a2(nyi khri): chub dang / sangs rgyas dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams kyi bar du che bar bgyid pa 'am/ chung bar bgyid pa de ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang 'thun pa'i 'bras bu ma lags
356a3(nyi khri): so/ / gang gzugs mthu dang ldan pa'i bar du bgyid pa 'am/ mthu ma mchis par bgyid pa de ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang 'thun pa'i 'bras bu ma lags so// gang byang chub
356a4(nyi khri): dang / sangs rgyas dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams kyi bar du mthu dang ldan par bgyid pa 'am/ mthu ma mchis par bgyid pa de ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang 'thun pa'i 'bras bu ma
356a5(nyi khri): lags te/ bcom ldan 'das de ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spod pa'i tshe/ gzugs che bar bgyid pa 'am/ chung bar bgyid pa 'am/ byang chub dang / sangs rgyas dang / sangs rgyas kyi
356a6(nyi khri): chos rnams kyi bar du che bar bgyid pa'am/ chung bar bgyid pa 'am/ gang gzugs mthu dang ldan par bgyid pa 'am/ mthu ma mchis par bgyid pa 'am/ byang chub dang / sangs rgyas dang / sangs
356a7(nyi khri): rgyas kyi chos rnams kyi bar du mthu dang ldan par bgyid pa 'am/ mthu ma mchis par bgyid pa de ni de'i dmigs pa chen por 'gyur ro// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ dmigs pa'i 'du shes can la byang chub ces
356b1(nyi khri): bgyid pa ma mchis te/ de ni 'di ltar sems can skye ba ma mchis pa'i slad du/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa skye ba ma mchis par blta'o// gzugs skye ba ma mchis pa'i slad du/ shes rab
356b2(nyi khri): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa skye ba ma mchis par blta'o/ / tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa skye ba ma mchis pa dang / byang chub dang / sangs rgyas dang /
356b3(nyi khri): sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams kyi bar du skye ba ma mchis pa'i slad du/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa skye ba ma mchis par blta'o// sems can rang bzhin ma mchis pa'i slad du/ shes rab kyi
356b4(nyi khri): pha rol tu phyin pa rang bzhin ma mchis par blta'o/ / gzugs rang bzhin ma mchis pa'i slad du/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rang bzhin ma mchis par blta'o// tshor ba dang / 'du
356b5(nyi khri): shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa rang bzhin ma mchis pa dang / byang chub dang / sangs rgyas dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams kyi bar du rang bzhin ma mchis pa'i slad du/
356b6(nyi khri): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rang bzhin ma mchis par blta'o// sems can dngos po ma mchis pa'i slad du/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dngos po ma mchis par blta'o//
356b7(nyi khri): gzugs dngos po ma mchis pa'i slad du/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dngos po ma mchis par blta'o// tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa
357a1(nyi khri): dngos po ma mchis pa dang / byang chub dang / sangs rgyas dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams kyi bar du dngos po ma mchis pa'i slang du/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
357a2(nyi khri): dngos po ma mchis par blta'o/ / sems can stong pa nyid kyi slad du/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong pa nyid du blta'o// gzugs stong pa nyid kyi slad du/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
357a3(nyi khri): stong pa nyid du blta'o/ / tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa stong pa nyid dang / byang chub dang / sangs rgyas dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams kyi bar du stong
357a4(nyi khri): bapa nyid kyi slad du/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong pa nyid du blta'o// sems can dben pa'i slad du/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben par blta'o// gzugs dben pa'i slad du/ shes
357a5(nyi khri): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben par blta'o/ / tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa dben pa dang / byang chub dang / sangs rgyas dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams kyi bar du dben pa'i slad
357a6(nyi khri): du/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben par blta'o// sems can ma mchis pa'i slad du/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma mchis par blta'o// gzugs ma mchis pa'i slad du/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma mchis
357a7(nyi khri): par blta'o/ / tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa ma mchis pa dang / byang chub dang / sangs rgyas dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams kyi bar du ma mchis pa'i slad du/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
357b1(nyi khri): pa ma mchis par blta'o/ / sems can bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i slad du/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsam gyis mi khyab par blta'o// gzugs bsam gyi mi khyab pa'i slad du/ shes
357b2(nyi khri): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsam gyis mi khyab par blta'o/ / tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang / byang chub dang / sangs rgyas dang
357b3(nyi khri): sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams kyi bar du bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i slad du/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsam gyis mi khyab par blta'o// sems can rnam par 'jig pa ma mchis pa'i slad du/
357b4(nyi khri): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rnam par 'jig pa ma mchis par blta'o// gzugs rnam par 'jig pa ma mchis pa'i slad du/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rnam par 'jig pa ma mchis par
357b5(nyi khri): blta'o/ / tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa rnam par 'jig pa ma mchis pa dang / byang chub dang / sangs rgyas dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams kyi bar du
357b6(nyi khri): rnam par 'jig pa ma mchis pa'i slad du/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu byin pa rnam par 'jig pa ma mchis par blta'o// sems can mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba ma mchis pa'i slad du/
357b7(nyi khri): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba ma mchis par blta'o// gzugs mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba ma mchis pa'i slad du/ shes rab kyi
358a1(nyi khri): pha rol tu phyin pa mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba ma mchis par blta'o/ / tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa mngon par rdzogs par
358a2(nyi khri): 'tshang rgya ba ma mchis pa dang / byang chub dang / sangs rgyas dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams kyi bar du mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba ma mchis pa'i slad du/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mngon
358a3(nyi khri): par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba ma mchis par blta'o/ / sems can gyi stobs yongs su 'grub pa ma mchis pa'i slad du/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i stobs yongs su 'grub pa ma mchis par blta'o//
358a4(nyi khri): gzugs kyi stobs yongs su 'grub pa ma mchis pa'i slad du/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i stobs yongs su 'grub pa ma mchis par blta'o// tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang /
358a5(nyi khri): rnam par shes pa'i stobs yongs su 'grub pa ma mchis pa dang / byang chub dang / sangs rgyas dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams kyi bar du stobs yongs su 'grub pa ma mchis pa'i
358a6(nyi khri): slad du/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i stobs yongs su 'grub pa ma mchis par blta'o// bcom ldan 'das rnam grangs des kyang 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa de ni
358a7(nyi khri): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa chen mo'o/ / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag nyi shu lnga pa las le'u nyi shu lnga pa'o// /
358b1(nyi khri): de nas tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bus/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la
358b2(nyi khri): mos par gyur pa de dag gang nas shis 'phos te/ 'dir mchis pa lags/ rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo de ji snyed cig nas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu zhugs pa lags// de bzhin
358b3(nyi khri): gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ni ji snyed cig bsnyen bkur ba lags/ gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la don dang tshul gyis mos par gyur pa de sbyin pa'i pha
358b4(nyi khri): rol tu phyin pa la ni yun ring po ji srid cig nas sprad pa lags/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /
358b5(nyi khri): bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la yun ring po ji srid cig nas spyad pa lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ shA ra dwa ti'i bu byang
358b6(nyi khri): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ni/ phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyis khams kyi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas tshad med grangs med pa
358b7(nyi khri): bsnyen bkur nas 'dir 'ongs shing 'dir skyes pa ste/ shA ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ni/ bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong grangs med tshad med dpag tu
359a1(nyi khri): med par/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyad par shes par bya'o// tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol
359a2(nyi khri): tuphyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyad par shes par bya'o// de ni bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya pa stong grangs med tshad med dpag tu med
359a3(nyi khri): ba nas/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yang dag par zhugs pa ste/ sems dang po bskyed phyin chad sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing 'dir 'ongs pa'o// tshul khrims kyi pha
359a4(nyi khri): rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing 'dir 'ongs
359a5(nyi khri): pa'o/ / des de nas bzung ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas grangs med tshad med dpag tu med pa/ bsam gyis mi khyab pa/ mtshungs pa med
359a6(nyi khri): pa bsnyen bkur nas 'dir 'ongs shing 'dir skyes pa ste/ shA ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po des shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di mthong ngam thos na bdag gis ston
359a7(nyi khri): pa mthong ngo zhes bya bar sems bskyed par 'gyur ro/ / bdag gis ston pa thos so zhes bya bar sems bskyed par 'gyur ro// shA ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
359b1(nyi khri): chen po de ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di la mi gnyis pa dang / mi dmigs pa'i tshul du don dang tshul gyis rjes su 'brang bar 'gyur ro// de nas tshe dang ldan pa rab
359b2(nyi khri): 'byor gyis/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mnyan pa 'am/ blta bar nus lags sam/ bcom ldan 'das
359b3(nyi khri): kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ni ma yin no// rab 'byor shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la ni nyan pa med do// lta ba med do// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa nyid kyang mi nyan
359b4(nyi khri): mi blta'o/ / chos la sems med pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni de dag gis mi thos mi mthong ngo // de bzhin du chos la sems med pa'i phyir/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin
359b5(nyi khri): pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ni de dag gis mi thos mi mthong ngo // /
359b6(nyi khri): chos la sems med pa'i phyir/ nang stong pa nyid ni de dag gis mi thos mi mthong ngo // chos la sems med pa'i phyir/ dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar ni de dag gis mi thos mi
359b7(nyi khri): mthong ngo / / chos la sems med pa'i phyir/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams ni de dag gis mi thos mi mthong ngo // chos la sems med pa'i phyir/ yang dag par spong ba rnams dang /
360a1(nyi khri): rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams dang / dbang po rnams dang / stobs rnams dang / byang chub kyi yan lag rnams dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa ni de dag
360a2(nyi khri): gis mi thos mi mthong ngo / / chos la sems med pa'i phyir/ 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams dang / bsam gtan rnams dang / tshad med pa rnams dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug
360a3(nyi khri): ba rnams dang / rnam par thar pa rnams dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dang / stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / mngon par shes pa
360a4(nyi khri): rnams ni de dag gis mi thos mi mthong ngo / / chos la sems med pa'i phyir/ ting nge 'dzin rnams dang / gzungs kyi sgo rnams dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams dang / mi 'jigs
360a5(nyi khri): pa rnams dang / so so yang dag par rig pa rnams dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams ni de dag gis mi thos mi mthong ngo // chos la sems med pa'i phyir/ rgyun du zhugs pa'i
360a6(nyi khri): 'bras bu ni de dag gi mi thos mi mthong ngo / / chos la sems med pa'i phyir/ lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / dgra bcom pa nyid dang / rang byang chub
360a7(nyi khri): ni de dag gis mi thos mi mthong ngo / / chos la sems med pa'i phyir/ lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid dang / byang chub dang / sangs rgyas dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams ni de dag gis mi thos mi
360b1(nyi khri): mthong ngo / / // shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag nyi shu lnga pa bam po so brgyad pa// // gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems
360b2(nyi khri): dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la brtson par bgyid pa de yun ring po ji sred cig nas spyod spyod pa lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab
360b3(nyi khri): 'byor de ni rnam par phye zhing bshad dgos pa ste/ rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po la sems dang po bskyed pa nye bar bzung ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la/
360b4(nyi khri): de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis brtson par byed pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu
360b5(nyi khri): phyin pa dang / sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la brtson par byed cing / 'phel ba dang 'grib pa mthong ba med pas chos gang yang mi spong ste/ nam yang pha rol tu phyin pa drug dang 'bral bar mi 'gyur la/
360b6(nyi khri): sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams dang nam yang 'bral bar mi 'gyur zhing / dge ba'i rtsa ba gang gis sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag la rim gro dang / bkur sti dang / bsti stang dang
360b7(nyi khri): mchod pa bya bar 'dod pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag kyang sems bskyed pa tsam gyis 'grub par 'gyur te/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing du 'gro zhing / nam yang ma'i mngal du
361a1(nyi khri): mi skye la/ nam yang mngon par shes pa rnams dang mi 'bral zhing / nyon mongs pa gang dang yang mi 'grogs la/ nyan thos kyi sems dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi sems dang
361a2(nyi khri): lhan cig mi gnas shing / sems can yongs su smin par bya ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par byed cing / sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing du 'gro ba de lta bu'i rnam
361a3(nyi khri): grangs yod de/ rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de lta bu dag ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la brtson par byed do// rab
361a4(nyi khri): 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang gis sangs rgyas brgya phrag mang po dang / sangs rgyas stong phrag mang po dang / sangs
361a5(nyi khri): rgyas bye ba khrag khrig brgya phrag mang po mthong zhing / de dag gi drung du dmigs pa'i tshul gyis sbyin pa byin pa dang // tshul khrims bsrungs pa dang / bzod pa bsgoms pa dang / brtson 'grus
361a6(nyi khri): brtsams pa dang / bsam gtan bskyed pa dang / shes rab bsgoms pa yod de/ de dag ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di bstan pa'i tshe/ 'khor de nas gung du 'dong ste/ byang chub
361a7(nyi khri): sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di bstan pa'i tshe/ rim gro med pas sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gi drung nas gud du
361b1(nyi khri): 'dong ba'o/ / de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni sngon gyi mthar yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di ston pa'i tshe
361b2(nyi khri): 'khor de nas gud du 'dong 'dong ba ste/ de dag ni da ltar byung ba'i tshe'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di bstan pa'i tshe/ 'khor de nas gud du 'dong bar 'gyur te/ lus dang sems kyis
361b3(nyi khri): mthun par spyod par mi 'gyur ro/ / de dag ni shes rab 'chal par gyur pa'i las byas shing sogs pa yin te/ de dag shes rab 'chal par gyur pa'i las byas shing bsags pa des/
361b4(nyi khri): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di bstan pa'i tshe spong bar 'gyur te/ de dag gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di spangs pas 'das pa dang / ma byon pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i
361b5(nyi khri): sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid spang bar 'gyur te/ de dag rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid spangs pa las byung ba'i las mngon par 'dus byas shing
361b6(nyi khri): bsags pa dang / chos brlab par gyur pa'i las byas shing bsags pa des lo mang po dang / lo brgya phrag mang po dang / lo stong phrag mang po dang / lo bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag mang po'i bar du
361b7(nyi khri): sems can dmyal bar sreg par 'gyur ro/ / de dag sems can dmyal ba chen po nas sems can dmyal ba chen por 'dong bar 'gyur te/ de dag sems can dmyal ba chen po nas sems can dmyal ba chen por 'do
362a1(nyi khri): pa'i tshe/ mas yongs su 'jig pa 'am/ chus yongs su 'jig pa 'am/ rlung gis yongs su 'jig pa 'byung bar 'gyur te/ de dag de ltar mes yongs su 'jig pa 'am/
362a2(nyi khri): chus yongs su 'jig pa 'am/ rlung gis yongs su 'jig pa byung ba'i tshe yang / 'jig rten gyi khams gzhan dag gi sems can dmyal ba chen po de dag tu 'phang bar 'gyur te/ de dag tu skye bar
362a3(nyi khri): 'gyur/ de dag tu sreg par 'gyur ro// der 'phangs te der skyes nas kyang sems can dmyal ba chen po nas sems can dmyal ba chen por 'dong bar 'gyur te/ de dag sems can dmyal ba
362a4(nyi khri): chen po nas sems can dmyal ba chen por 'dod ba'i tshe/ mas yongs su 'jig pa 'am/ chus yongs su 'jig pa 'am/ rlung gis yongs su 'jig pa 'byung ste/ de dag de ltar mes
362a5(nyi khri): yongs su 'jig pa 'am/ chus yongs su 'jig pa 'am/ rlung gis yongs su 'jig pa 'byung ba'i tshe/ yang 'jig rten gyi khams gzhan dag gi sems can dmyal ba chen po dag tu 'phang bar 'gyur/
362a6(nyi khri): de dag tu skye bar 'gyur/ de dag tu sreg par 'gyur ro// der 'phangs te der skyes nas kyang sems can dmyal ba chen po nas sems can dmyal ba chen po 'dong bar 'gyur te/ de dag
362a7(nyi khri): sems can dmyal ba chen po nas sems can dmyal ba chen por 'dong ba'i tshe/ mes yongs su 'jig pa 'am/ chus yongs su 'jig pa 'am/ rlung gis yongs su 'jig
362b1(nyi khri): / pa 'byung ste/ de dag de ltar mes yongs su 'jig pa 'am/ chus yongs su 'jig pa 'am/ rlung gis yongs su 'jig pa 'byung ba'i tshe/ yang shar phyogs kyi sems can dmyal
362b2(nyi khri): ba chen po dag tu 'phang bar 'gyur/ lho dang / nub dang / byang dang / byang shar dang / shar lho dang / lho nub dang / nub byang dang / 'og dang / steng gi phyogs kyi sems can
362b3(nyi khri): dmyal ba chen po dag tu 'phang bar 'gyur ro/ / de dag tu'ang sems can dmyal ba chen po nas sems can dmyal ba chen por 'dong bar 'gyur te/ der yang mes yongs su 'jig pa 'am/
362b4(nyi khri): chus yongs su 'jig pa 'am/ rlung gis yongs su 'jig pa 'byung ste/ de dag de ltar mes yongs su 'jig pa 'am/ chus yongs su 'jig pa 'am/ rlung gis yongs su 'jig
362b5(nyi khri): pa 'byung ba'i tshe/ de nas shi 'phos nas chos 'jig par 'gyur pa'i las de ma zad par yang 'dir skyes te/ de dag tu'ang sems can dmyal ba chen po nas sems can dmyal ba chen
362b6(nyi khri): por 'dong bar 'gyur ro/ / de dag der skyes nas kyang / sems can dmyal ba chen po de dag tu sems can dmyal ba'i sdug bsngal nyams su 'bab par 'gyur ro// de dag tu'ang mes
362b7(nyi khri): yongs su 'jig pa 'am/ chus yongs su 'jig pa 'am/ rlung gis yongs su 'jig pa ma byung gi bar du/ sems can dmyal ba'i sdug bsngal de dag myong bar 'gyur ro// de dag mes yongs
363a1(nyi khri): su 'jig pa 'am/ chus yongs su 'jig pa 'am/ rlung gis yongs su 'jig pa byung nas kyang / de dag nas shi bos te/ shar phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams dag tu byol
363a2(nyi khri): song gi skye gnas pa rnams dang skal ba mnyam par skye bar 'gyur ro/ / lho dang / nub dang / byang dang / byang shar dang / shar lho dang / lho nub dang / nub byang dang / 'og dang / steng gi
363a3(nyi khri): phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams dag tu byol song gi skye gnas pa rnams dang / skal ba mnyam par skye bar 'gyur ro// de dag tu'ang phyogs bcu kun gyi 'jig rten gyi khams kyi bar du gshin rje'i
363a4(nyi khri): 'jig rten du skye bar 'gyur ro/ / de dag der skyes nas kyang sdug bsngal mang po myong bar 'gyur ba'i las zad nas/ ci ste brgya la mir skye ba thob na'ang chos 'jig par 'gyur ba'i las byas pa dang
363a5(nyi khri): bsags pa dang / bsgrubs pa dang / tshang ba dang / rdzogs pa'i rnam par smin pa des de dag gang dang gang du skye ba de dang der/ dmus long gi rigs su skye bar 'gyur/ phyag bdar ba'i rigs su skye bar
363a6(nyi khri): 'gyur/ gdol pa'i rigs su skye bar 'gyur/ smyig mkhan gyi rigs su skye bar 'gyur// de dag der skyes nas kyang / dmus long du 'gyur ba yin/ zhar bar 'gyur ba yin/ sna med par 'gyur
363a7(nyi khri): pa yin/ lce med par 'gyur ba yin/ lag pa med par 'gyur ba yin/ rkang pa med par 'gyur ba yin/ mdze can du 'gyur ba yin/ sha bkra can du 'gyur ba yin/ sgur por 'gyur
363b1(nyi khri): ba yin/ gang na sangs rgyas kyi sgra med pa dang / chos kyi sgra med pa dang / dge 'dun gyi sgra med pa de dag tu rtag tu skye bar 'gyur ba yin no// de nas tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti
363b2(nyi khri): bus/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das mtshams ma mchis pa lngas ni chos 'jig par 'gyur ba'i sug las bgyis pa dang bsags pa 'di'i gzugs brnyan tsam
363b3(nyi khri): du'ang mi spyod do/ / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ shA ra dwa ti'i bu de ni gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di bstan cing bshad pa'i tshe/ phyir spong bar sems shing / 'di skad
363b4(nyi khri): du 'di la khyed dang bdag cag gis bslab par mi bya ste/ 'di ni chos ma yin no// 'di ni 'dul ba ma yin no// 'di ni ston pas bstan pa ma yin no// 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang
363b5(nyi khri): dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis gsungs pa ma yin no zhes zer zhing / de dag nyid kyang phyir spong la/ sems can gzhan yang mos pa med par byed cing / bdag gi bsam pa nyams par byas
363b6(nyi khri): nas/ gzhan gyi bsam pa nyams par byed la/ bdag gi bsam pa gdug par byas nas/ gzhan gyi bsam pa gdug par bya bar dga' ba/ bdag nyid chud gson cing / gzhan chud gson
363b7(nyi khri): bar dga' ba/ bdag nyid shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo mi shes mi rig pas phyir spang bar 'dod la/ gzhan yang de bzhin du 'dzin du 'jug pa de'i chos 'jig par dga' ba'i
364a1(nyi khri): las byas shing bsags pa lha la/ des gzugs brnyan du'ang 'gyur re skan/ shA ra dwa ti'i bungs ni gang zag de lta bu thos par bya ba'ang ma gnang na/ 'phrad par lta ci/
364a2(nyi khri): smos te/ 'grogs par lta smos kyang ci smos so// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ shA ra dwa ti'i bu gang zag de lta bu dag ni chos la skyon 'dogs par rig par bya ste/ shA ra dwa ti'i bu gang zag de lta bu ni blun po'i tshul can/
364a3(nyi khri): phyogs nag po'i tshul can du rig par bya'o// shA ra dwa ti'i bu gang zag de lta bu dag gi ngag mnyan par sems pa 'am/ de dag la yid ches par bya bar sems pa de dag kyang / tshul ma yin pa'i 'jigs pas
364a4(nyi khri): phung bar 'gyur ro/ / shA ra dwa ti'i bu gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la skyon 'dogs pa de ni chos la skyon 'dogs par rig par bya ste/ sems can dmyal ba 'am/ byol song gi skye gnas sam
364a5(nyi khri): gshin rje'i 'jig rten par rig par bya'o/ / gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das chos la skyon 'dogs pa'i gang zag der skyes pa'i lus kyi tshad da dung ma gsungs so// bcom
364a6(nyi khri): ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ shA ra dwa ti'i bu chos la skyon 'dogs pa'i gang zag der skyes pa'i lus kyi tshad ma gleng zhig/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gang zag chos la skyon 'dogs pa de'i lus kyi tshad
364a7(nyi khri): thos na/ mod la khrag tu skyug par 'gyur ba 'am/ 'chi ba 'am/ srog la 'bab pa'i sdug bsngal lam/ mya ngan gyi zug rngu skye ba 'am/ ldum bu brngas pa ltar skam zhing rnying par 'gyur
364b1(nyi khri): du 'ong ste/ gang zag der skyes pa'i lus kyi tshad ni thos ma'ang nyes pa de lta bu yad pa de tsam ste/ de'i lus kyi tshad ni de yin no zhes nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu
364b2(nyi khri): la skabs dbye ba ma mdzad do/ / gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bstan du gsol/ chos 'jig par 'gyur ba'i sug las bgyis shing bsags pa des chos la skyon 'dogs pa'i gang
364b3(nyi khri): zag 'di 'dra ba'i lus yongs su 'dzin par 'gyur ro zhes bgyi bas ni/ ma byung ba'i skye bo rnams la snang ba bgyis par 'gyur ro// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ shA ra dwa ti'i bu
364b4(nyi khri): de ni chos 'jig par 'gyur ba'i las byas pa dang / bsags pa dang / tshang bar byas pa dang / rdzogs par byas pa dang / yongs su gzung ba dang / yongs su bskang ba des
364b5(nyi khri): 'di srid cig tu sems can dmyal bar sdug bsngal myong bar 'gyur ro/ / 'di srid cig tu byol song gi nang du sdug bsngal myong bar 'gyur ro// 'di srid cig tu gshin rje'i 'jig rten du sdug
364b6(nyi khri): bsngal myong bar 'gyur ro/ / zhes bya ba de nyid kyis kyang ma byung ba'i skye bo rnams la snang ba byas par 'gyur ro// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de de lags so// bde bar gshegs
364b7(nyi khri): pa de de lags so/ / bcom ldan 'das de nyid kyis kyang / dga' zhing rigs dang ldan pa'i gang zag rnams nongs pa spong zhing / bdag cag gis de ltar de lta bu'i sdug bsngal
365a1(nyi khri): zhams su myong bar 'gyur du 'ong ngo zhes srog gi don du'ang dam pa'i chos mi spong ngo / / de nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di
365a2(nyi khri): skad ces gsol to/ / rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo dag gis gang zag dam pa'i chos spong ba'i nongs pa brjod pa 'di thos na bdag cag kyang ngan song dag tu sdug bsngal gyi rnam pa de lta bu myong
365a3(nyi khri): du 'ong ngo / / de bzhin gshegs pa mi mthong ba dang / chos mi thos pa dang / dge 'dun la bsnyen cing bkur du med par 'gyur du 'ong ngo // sangs rgyas 'byung ba med pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing du
365a4(nyi khri): skyes su 'ong ngo / / mi 'phongs par 'gyur du 'ong ngo // shin tu 'jungs pa'i sems dang ldan par 'gyur du 'ong ngo zhes bgyi bar lus dang / ngag dang / yid kyi las shin tu bsnga ma
365a5(nyi khri): bar bgyi'o/ / yang tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das tshig gi las bgyis shing bsags pas ni chos 'jig par 'gyur
365a6(nyi khri): ba'i las bgyis shing bsags par 'gyur ro/ / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor tshig gi las byas shing bsags pas/ chos 'jig par 'gyur ba'i las byas
365a7(nyi khri): shing bsags par 'gyur te/ rab 'byor skyes bu glen pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di la skyon 'dogs par sems shing / phyir spang bar sems pa de dag kyang chos dang / 'dul ba de nyid
365b1(nyi khri): la rab tu 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ / rab 'byor shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyon pa tags shing phyir spangs pas/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi byang chub la skyon btags shing phyir
365b2(nyi khri): spangs par 'gyur ro/ / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi byang chub la skyon btags shing phyir spangs pas/ 'das pa dang / ma byon pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan
365b3(nyi khri): 'das rnams kyi rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la skyon btags shing phyir spangs par 'gyur ro/ / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la skyon btags shing phyir spangs pas/ chos la skyon btags
365b4(nyi khri): shing phyir spangs par 'gyur ro/ / chos phyir spangs pas/ dge 'dun phyir spangs par 'gyur ro// dge 'dun phyir spangs pas/ 'jig rten pa'i yang dag pa'i lta ba phyir spangs par 'gyur ro//
365b5(nyi khri): 'jig rten pa'i yang dag pa'i lta ba phyir spangs pas/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa phyir spangs par 'gyur ro// tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /
365b6(nyi khri): brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa phyir spangs par 'gyur ro// nang stong pa phyir spangs par 'gyur ro//
365b7(nyi khri): dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar du phyir spangs par 'gyur ro// dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi phyir spangs par 'gyur ro// 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'i bar du phyir
366a1(nyi khri): spangs par 'gyur ro/ / 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi dang / bsam gtan bzhi dang / tshad med pa bzhi dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi phyir spangs par//
366a2(nyi khri): 'gyur ro// rnam par thar pa brgyad dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / mngon par shes pa lnga phyir spangs par
366a3(nyi khri): 'gyur ro/ / ting nge 'dzin thams cad dang / gzungs kyi sgo thams cad dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / sangs rgyas
366a4(nyi khri): kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad phyir spangs par 'gyur ro/ / thams cad shes pa nyid dang / lam gyi rnam pa shes pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid phyir spangs par 'gyur ro// rnam pa thams
366a5(nyi khri): cad mkhyen pa nyid phyir spangs pas/ bsod nams ma yin pa'i phung po tshad med grangs med dpag tu med pa yongs su bzung bar 'gyur ro// bsod nams ma yin pa'i phung po tshad med grangs med dpag
366a6(nyi khri): tu med pa yongs su bzung bas/ sems can dmyal ba dang / byo la song dang / yi dgas kyi nang du sdug bsngal dang / yid mi bde ba tshad med grangs med dpag tu med pa myong bar 'gyur ro// rab
366a7(nyi khri): 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das skyes bu glen pa gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di slar spong ba de dag rnam pa du zhig gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di slar spong bar
366b1(nyi khri): 'gyur/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor skyes bu glen pa de dag rnam pa bzhis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa slar spong bar 'gyur ro// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das bzhi gang
366b2(nyi khri): dang gang zhig lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ skyes bu glen pa gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di spong ba de dag ni bdud kyis byin gyis brlabs pa yin te/ rab 'byor
366b3(nyi khri): rgyu dang po des na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la phyir spong bar 'gyur ro// chos zab mo rnams la yid pa ches pa dang / dad cing mos pa med pa yin te/ rgyu gnyis pa des na shes rab kyi
366b4(nyi khri): pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la phyir spong bar 'gyur ro/ / rab 'byor skyes bu glen pa de dag ni sdig pa'i grogs po'i lag tu song ba yin te/ brtson 'grus med cing phung po lnga la mngon par zhen pas//
366b5(nyi khri): rgyu gsum pa des na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la phyir spong bar 'gyur ro// rab 'byor skyes bu glen pa de dag ni zhe sdang gi spyod pa can yin te/ de dag bdag bstod cing gzhan
366b6(nyi khri): smod par gyur pa yin pas/ rgyu bzhi pa des na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la phyir spong bar 'gyur te/ rab 'byor rnam pa bzhi po de dag gis skyes bu glen pa de dag
366b7(nyi khri): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la phyir spong bar 'gyur ro/ / gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni/ brtson 'grus chung ba dang / dge ba'i
367a1(nyi khri): / Na ba dang mi ldan zhing sdig pa'i grogs par sug par mchis pa rnams kyis mos par dkara'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de de bzhin
367a2(nyi khri): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di ni brtson 'grus chung ba dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba dang mi ldan zhing / sdig pa'i grogs po'i lag tu lhung ba rnams kyis mos par dka' 'o//
367a3(nyi khri): gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de ltar mos par dka' ba'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa de ji tsam du zab pa lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor gzugs ni ma bcings ma
367a4(nyi khri): grol ba ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor gzugs la rang bzhin med pa ni gzugs so// tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa ni ma bcings ma grol ba ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na
367a5(nyi khri): rab 'byor rnam par shes pa la rang bzhin med pa ni rnam par shes pa'o/ / rab 'byor skye mched dang / khams dang / rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba ni ma bcings ma grol ba ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor
367a6(nyi khri): rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba la rang bzhin med pa ni rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba'o/ / rab 'byor sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ni ma bcings ma grol ba ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor sbyin pa'i pha
367a7(nyi khri): rol tu phyin pa la rang bzhin med pa ni sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ / rab 'byor tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang
367b1(nyi khri): bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni ma bcings ma grol ba ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la rang bzhin med pa ni shes rab kyi ba
367b2(nyi khri): rol tu phyin pa'o/ / rab 'byor nang stong pa nyid ni ma bcings ma grol ba ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor nang stong pa nyid la rang bzhin med pa ni nang stong pa nyid do// rab 'byor phyi stong pa nyid ni ma brjid
367b3(nyi khri): pa grol ba ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor phyi stong pa nyid la rang bzhin med pa ni phyi stong pa nyid do// rab 'byor phyi nang stong pa nyid ni ma bcings ma grol ba ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor phyi/
367b4(nyi khri): nang stong pa nyid la rang bzhin med pa ni phyi nang stong pa nyid do// rab 'byor dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar ni ma bcings ma grol ba ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor dngos po med
367b5(nyi khri): paba'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar la rang bzhin med pa ni dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid do/ / rab 'byor dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams ni ma bcings ma grol ba ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab
367b6(nyi khri): 'byor dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams la rang bzhin med pa ni dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams so/ / rab 'byor yang dag par spong ba rnams dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams dang / dbang po rnams dang /
367b7(nyi khri): stobs rnams dang / byang chub kyi yan lag rnams dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa ni ma bcings ma grol ba ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor 'phags pa'i lam yan
368a1(nyi khri): lag brgyad pa la rang bzhin med pa ni 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'o/ / rab 'byor 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams dang / bsam gtan rnams dang / tshad med pa rnams
368a2(nyi khri): dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams ni ma bcings ma grol ba ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams la rang bzhin med pa ni gzugs med pa'i snyoms
368a3(nyi khri): par 'jug pa rnams so/ / rab 'byor rnam par thar pa rnams dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dang / stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / mngon
368a4(nyi khri): par shes pa rnams ni ma bcings ma grol ba ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor mngon par shes pa rnams la rang bzhin med pa ni mngon par shes pa rnams so// rab 'byor ting nge 'dzin rnams dang / gzungs
368a5(nyi khri): kyi sgo rnams dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams dang / mi 'jigs pa rnams dang / so so yang dag par rig pa rnams dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams ni ma bcings ma grol ba ste/
368a6(nyi khri): de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams la rang bzhin med pa ni sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams so// rab 'byor thams cad shes pa nyid dang / lam gyi rnam pa shes
368a7(nyi khri): pa nyid dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ni ma bcings ma grol ba ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la rang bzhin med pa ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do//
368b1(nyi khri): rab 'byor gzugs kyi sngon gyi mtha' ni ma bcings ma grol ba ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor sngon gyi mtha' dngos po med pa'i rang bzhin ni gzugs so// rab 'byor tshor ba dang /
368b2(nyi khri): 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa'i sngon gyi mtha' ni ma bcings ma grol ba ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor sngon gyi mtha' dngos po med pa'i rang bzhin ni rnam par shes pa'o//
368b3(nyi khri): rab 'byor rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar gyi sngon gyi mtha' ni ma bcings ma grol ba ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor sngon gyi mtha' dngos po med pa'i rang bzhin ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa
368b4(nyi khri): nyid do/ / rab 'byor gzugs kyi phyi ma'i mtha' ni ma bcings ma grol ba ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor phyi ma'i mtha' dngos po med pa'i rang bzhin ni gzugs so// rab 'byor tshor
368b5(nyi khri): ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa'i phyi ma'i mtha' ni ma bcings ma grol ba ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor phyi ma'i mtha' dngos po med pa'i rang bzhin ni rnam par
368b6(nyi khri): shes pa'o/ / rab 'byor rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar gyi phyi ma'i mtha' ni ma bcings ma grol ba ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor phyi ma'i mtha' dngos po med pa'i rang bzhin ni rnam pa
368b7(nyi khri): thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do/ / rab 'byor gzugs kyi da ltar byung ba ni ma bcings ma grol ba ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor da ltar byung ba dngos po med pa'i rang bzhin ni gzugs
369a1(nyi khri): so/ / rab 'byor tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa'i da ltar byung ba ni ma bcings ma grol ba ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor da ltar byung ba
369a2(nyi khri): dngos po med pa'i rang bzhin ni rnam par shes pa'o/ / rab 'byor rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar gyi da ltar byung ba ni ma bcings ma grol ba ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor da ltar byung ba

369a4(nyi khri): grogs po'i srub par lhung ba/ bdud kyi dbang du gyur pa/ le lo can brtson 'grus btang ba/ dran pa nyams pa/ shes bzhin dang mi ldan pa rnams kyis mos par dka'o// bcom ldan 'das
369a5(nyi khri): kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de de bzhin te/ rab 'byor shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni brtson 'grus chung ba/ dge ba'i rtsa ba ma bskyed pa/ sdig pa'i grogs po'i lag tu lhung ba
369a6(nyi khri): bdud kyi dbang du gyur pa/ le lo can brtson 'grus btang ba/ dran pa nyams pa/ shes bzhin dang mi ldan pa rnams kyis mos par dka' 'o// rab 'byor gzhan yang gzugs
369a7(nyi khri): rnam par dag pa gang yin pa de ni/ 'bras bu rnam par dag pa'o// tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam pa shes pa rnam par dag pa gang yin pa de ni/ 'bras bu rnam par dag pa'o// skye mched dang
369b1(nyi khri): khams dang / rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba rnam par dag pa gang yin pa de ni/ 'bras bu rnam par dag pa'o// sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa rnam par dag pa gang yin pa de ni/ 'bras bu rnam par dag pa'o// /
