262a6(nyi khri): bsags/ bkur stir bgyi ba lags/ bsti stang du bgyi ba lags/ mchod par 'gyi ba lags pas srung zhing / rim gro dang / bkur sti dang / bsti stang dang / mchod par bgyid do//
262a7(nyi khri): de nas tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bus/ lha'i dbang po brgya byin la 'di skad ces smras so// ko'u shi ka shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni gzung du med pa/ gzugs med pa
262b1(nyi khri): bltar med pa/ thogs pa med pa/ mtshan nyin gcig pa ste/ 'di ltar mtshan nyid med pa yin na/ de la khyod ji ltar na shes par gyi pha rol tu phyin pa gzung du med pa/ gzugs med pa/ bltar
262b2(nyi khri): med pa/ thogs pa med pa/ mtshan nyid gcig pa ste/ 'di ltar mtshan nyid med pa la gzung bar sems/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni 'dzin pa dang / dor bar bya
262b3(nyi khri): ba'i phyir nye bar gnas pa ma yin/ 'grib pa'i phyir ma yin/ 'phel ba'i phyir ma yin/ bskyed pa'i phyir ma yin/ bsnyung ba'i phyir ma yin/ dbri ba'i phyir ma yin// bsnan pa'i phyir ma yin
262b4(nyi khri): kun nas nyon mongs pa'i phyir ma yin/ rnam par byang ba'i phyir ma yin/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams nye bar sgrub pa ma yin/ so so'i skye bo'i chos rnams 'dor ba ma yin/ byang chub sems
262b5(nyi khri): dpa'i chos rnams dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams dang / nyan thos kyi chos rnams dang / slob pa dang mi slob pa'i chos rnams nye ba sgrub pa ma yin/ so so'i skye bo'i chos rnams 'dor
262b6(nyi khri): ba ma yin/ 'dus ma byas kyi dbyings nye bar sgrub pa ma yin/ 'dus byas kyi khams 'dor bar byed pa ma yin/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa nye bar sgrub pa ma yin/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin
262b7(nyi khri): pa'i bar du nye bar sgrub pa ma yin/ nang stong pa nyid nye bar sgrub pa ma yin/ dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar du nye bar sgrub pa ma yin/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams
263a1(nyi khri): rtse bar sgrub pa ma yin/ yang dag par spong ba dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang / dbang po dang / stobs dang / byang chub kyi yan lag dang
263a2(nyi khri): 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa nye bar sgrub pa ma yin/ 'phags pa'i bden pa dang / bsam gtan dang / tshad med pa dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang / rnam
263a3(nyi khri): par thar pa dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang // mngon par shes pa dang / ting nge 'dzin dang /
263a4(nyi khri): gzungs kyi sgo dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs dang / mi 'jigs pa dang / so so yang dag par rig pa dang / byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos
263a5(nyi khri): ma 'dres pa rnams nye bar sgrub pa ma yin/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du nye bar sgrub pa ma yin no// brgya byin gyis smras pa/ btsun pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu de de bzhin no//
263a6(nyi khri): de de bzhin te/ btsun pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu gang gis de ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni/ sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams nye bar sgrub pa ma yin/ so so'i skye bo'i chos rnams 'dor bar byed pa ma yin/ rnam
263a7(nyi khri): pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du nye bar sgrub pa ma yin no/ / zhes bya bar shes pa de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa yin no// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la sgom pa yin no// shes rab kyi pha rol tu
263b1(nyi khri): byin pa ni gnyis su shes par bya ba ma yin te/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni mi gnyis pa'o// bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa
263b2(nyi khri): dang tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ni gnyis su shes par bya ba ma yin te/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ni mi gnyis pa'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis
263b3(nyi khri): lha'i dbang po brgya byin la legs so zhes bya ba gnang ste/ ke'u shi ka legs so legs so// de de bzhin no// de de bzhin te/ ji skad du smras pa bzhin no// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni
263b4(nyi khri): gnyis su shes par bya ba ma yin te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni mi gnyis pa'o// bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod
263b5(nyi khri): pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ni gnyis su shes par bya ba ma yin te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin
263b6(nyi khri): ba ni mi gnyis pa'o/ / ko'u shi ka gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnyis su 'dod pa de ni chos kyi dbyings la gnyis su 'dod du zad do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ko'u shi ka de ni 'di ltar chos kyi
263b7(nyi khri): dbyings dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa de la gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med do// ko'u shi ka gang bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang
264a1(nyi khri): bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la gnyis su 'dod pa de ni chos kyi dbyings la gnyis su 'dod du
264a2(nyi khri): zad do/ / de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar chos kyi dbyings dang / sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa de la gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med do// ko'u shi ka gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la
264a3(nyi khri): gnyis su 'dod pa de ni de bzhin nyid dang / yang dag pa'i mtha' dang / bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i dbyings la gnyis su 'dod du zad do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ko'u shi ka de ni 'di ltar de bzhin
264a4(nyi khri): nyid dang / yang dag pa'i mtha' dang / bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i dbyings dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa de la gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med do// ke'u shi ka gang bsam gtan gyi pha
264a5(nyi khri): rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la gnyis su 'dod pa de ni nga
264a6(nyi khri): bzhin nyid dang / yang dag pa'i mtha' dang / bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i dbyings la gnyis su 'dong du zad do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de bzhin nyid dang / yang dag pa'i mtha' dang / bsam
264a7(nyi khri): gyis mi khyab pa'i dbyings dang / sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa de la gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med do// de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad
264b1(nyi khri): ces gsol to/ / bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni lha dang / mi dang / snga ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyi phyag bgyi bar 'os pa ste/ de la bslabs pas ni byang
264b2(nyi khri): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so/ / mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o// mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang
264b3(nyi khri): rgya bar 'gyur ro/ / bcom ldan 'das gang gi tshe bdag chos bzang po'i lha'i 'khor du bdag nyid kyi lha'i dbang po'i stan la mchis par gyur pa de'i tshe/ der lha'i bu gang ji snyed bdag gi rim gro la mchis pa de
264b4(nyi khri): dag kun kyang bdag la mchod pa bgyid de/ nam bdag der mchis shing stan de la ma mchis pa de'i tshe'ang / lha'i bu de dag 'khor der mchis shing / lha'i dbang po brgya byin stan 'di la 'dug
264b5(nyi khri): cing sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lha rnams la chos ston to/ / zhes stan de la g.yas phyogs su bskor ba bgyis shing phyag 'tshal te slar mchi'o// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin du gang na shes rab kyi pha rol tu
264b6(nyi khri): byin pa 'di bris shing 'chang ba dang / kha ton tu bgyid cing gzhan la rgya cher ston pa der/ phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams na lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang /
264b7(nyi khri): nam mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po ji snyed cig mchis pa de dag kyang de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams ni 'di las byung ngo // nyan
265a1(nyi khri): thos dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyang 'di las byung ngo / / sems can thams cad kyi bde ba'i yo byad thams cad kyang 'di las byung ngo nas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la phyag
265a2(nyi khri): bgyis shing / bdud pa bgyis nas slar mchi bar 'gyur ro// de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung rnams mchod pa mnga' ba'ang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pas yongs su bsgrubs pa'i slad du mchod pa
265a3(nyi khri): mnga' ste/ de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byang chub sems dpa'i spad pa spon pa'i tshe/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni thams cad mkhyen pa'i
265a4(nyi khri): ye shes kyi gzhir gyur to/ / rgyur gyur to// rkyen du gyur to// yongs su sgrub par gyur to// bcom ldan 'das de lta bas na che de gnyis las bdag ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid len to//
265a5(nyi khri): bcom ldan 'das gang gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di blangs te/ chos kyi khongs su gtogs pa'i yid kyis kha ton bgyid pa de'i tshe/ 'jigs pa'am/ bag tsha ba'i mtshan ma tsam yang dag par
265a6(nyi khri): rjes su mi mthong ngo / / bcom ldan 'das de ci'i slad du zhe na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni mtshan ma ma mchis/ rtags ma mchis/ brjod du ma mchis pa ste/ bcom ldan 'das shes rab
265a7(nyi khri): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni smos su ma mchis pa'o/ / bcom ldan 'das bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol
265b1(nyi khri): phyin pa dang / sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ni mtshan ma ma mchis/ rtags ma mchis/ brjod du ma mchis pa ste/ bcom ldan 'das pha rol tu phyin pa de dag ni smos su ma mchis pa'o// bcom ldan
265b2(nyi khri): 'das rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar ni mtshan ma ma mchis/ rtags ma mchis/ brjod du ma mchis pa ste/ bcom ldan 'das rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ni smos su ma mchis pa'o// bcom ldan
265b3(nyi khri): 'das gal te shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mtshan ma ma mchis pa zhig lags te/ mtshan ma ma mchis pa ma lags na ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis chos
265b4(nyi khri): thams cad la mtshan ma ma mchis pa dang / rtags ma mchis pa dang / brjod du ma mchis pa dang / smos su ma mchis par thugs su chud de/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon
265b5(nyi khri): par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas/ / sems can rnams la mtshan ma ma mchis pa dang / rtags ma mchis pa dang / brjod du ma mchis pa dang / smos su ma mchis pa'i chos mi ston te/ bcom ldan 'das
265b6(nyi khri): de ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mtshan ma ma mchis/ rtags ma mchis/ brjod du ma mchis/ smos su ma mchis pas de'i slad du de bzhin gshegs pas chos thams cad mtshan ma ma mchis pa dang /
265b7(nyi khri): rtags ma mchis pa dang / brjod du ma mchis pa dang / smos su ma mchis par thugs su chud de/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas// sems
266a1(nyi khri): can rnams la mtshan ma ma mchis pa dang / rtags ma mchis pa dang / brjod du ma mchis pa dang / smos su ma mchis pa'i chos bstan to// bcom ldan 'das de bas na she
266a2(nyi khri): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni lha dang / mi dang / lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyis me tog dang / 'phreng ba dang / spos dang / byug pa dang / bye ma dang / na bza' dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan
266a3(nyi khri): dang / ba dan dang / sil snyan sna tshogs kyi rim gro dang / bkur sti dang / bsti stang dang / mchod par bgyi bar 'os pa'o// bris shing me tog dang / 'phreng ba dang / spos dang / byug pa dang /
266a4(nyi khri): bye ma dang / na bza' dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan dang / sil snyan sna tshogs kyis rim gro dang / bkur sti dang / bsti stang dang / mchod par bgyi bar 'os pa'o// bcom ldan
266a5(nyi khri): 'das gang la la zhig shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di 'dzin cing 'chang ba dang / klog cing kun chud par bgyid pa dang / tshul bzhin du yid la bgyid pa dang / de bris shing / me tog dang / 'phreng ba dang / spos dang /
266a6(nyi khri): byug pa dang / phye ma dang / na bza' dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan dang / sil snyan sna tshogs kyis rim gro dang / bkur sti dang / bsti stang dang / mchod par bgyi ba de ni nam bla na
266a7(nyi khri): med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas kyi bar du/ des sems can dmyal ba'i rgyud kyi dogs pa ma mchis par bgyi'o// byol song gi skye gnas dang / gshin rje'i
266b1(nyi khri): 'jig rten gyi rgyud kyi dogs pa ma mchis par bgyi'o/ / can thos kyis pa 'arang sangs rgyas kyis dogs pa ma mchis par bgyi'o// de ni de bzhin gshegs pa mthong ba dang yang mi 'bral bar 'gyur/ sems
266b2(nyi khri): can yongs su smin par bgyi ba dang nam yang mi 'bral bar gyur te/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de dag la me tog dang / 'phreng ba dang / spos dang
266b3(nyi khri): byug pa dang / phye ma dang / na bza' dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan dang / sil snyan sna tshogs kyis rim gro dang / bkur stir dang / bsti stang dang / mchod par bgyid cing
266b4(nyi khri): sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing du mchi bar 'gyur ro/ / bcom ldan 'das gzhan yang gal te stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku
266b5(nyi khri): gdung gis byur bur bltams pa zhig kyang sprul la/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di'ang bris te stsal na/ bcom ldan 'das dkon mchog de gnyis las bdag ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di
266b6(nyi khri): nyid len to/ / bcom ldan 'das de ci'i slad du zhe na/ 'di las byung ba ni de bzhin gshegs pa rnams dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung rnams te/ de bas na de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku
266b7(nyi khri): gdung de dag kyang / rim gror bgyi ba dang / bkur stir bgyi ba dang / bsti stang du bgyis shing / mchod par bgyi ba lags te/ rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo dag gis de dag la
267a1(nyi khri): rim gror bgyis/ bkur stir bgyis/ bsti stang du bgyis/ mchod par bgyis na log par ltung ba dang / ngo song du mchi bar mi 'gyur te/ lha dang mi'i bde ba phun
267a2(nyi khri): sum tshogs pa myong nas/ smon lam gyi tshul bzhin du nyan thos kyi theg pa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa 'am/ yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi theg pas yongs su mya ngan las 'da'
267a3(nyi khri): bar 'gyur ro/ / bcom ldan 'das de bas na gang de bzhin gshegs pa mthong ba dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bris pa mthong ba de ni mi 'dra ba ma mchis pa'o// de ci'i slad du zhe na
267a4(nyi khri): bcom ldan 'das de ni 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa gnyis su ma mchis te/ gnyis su bgyir ma mchis so// bcom ldan 'das
267a5(nyi khri): gzhan yang gang de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis cho 'phrul rnam pa gsum la bzhugs te/ mdo dang / dbyangs kyis bsnyad pa dang / lung du
267a6(nyi khri): bstan pa dang / chos gtan la bab pa bstan pa'i bar du gsungs te bshad pa dang / rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang la las shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di bzung zhing kun
267a7(nyi khri): chub par bgyis te/ gzhan la bstan pa de gnyis kyang mi 'dra ba ma mchis so// bcom ldan 'das de ci'i slad du zhe na/ 'di las byung ba ni de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag
267b1(nyi khri): par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams so/ / 'di las byung ba ni cho 'phrul rnam pa gsum mo// 'di las byung ba ni mdo dang / dbyangs kyis bsnyad pa dang / lung du bstan pa dang / chos
267b2(nyi khri): bstan la bab pa bstan pa'i bar dag go/ / bcom ldan 'das gzhan yang shar phyogs kyi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma
267b3(nyi khri): snyed mang po dang / lho dang / nub dang / byang dang / byang shar dang / shar lho dang / lho nub dang / nub byang dang / 'og dang / steng gi phyogs kyi phyogs re re zhing de bzhin
267b4(nyi khri): gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gad+hA'i klung gi bye ma snyed mang pos cho 'phrul rnam pa gsum la bzhugs te/ mdo dang / dbyangs kyis bsnyad pa dang
267b5(nyi khri): lung du bstan pa dang / chos bstan la bab pa bstan pa'i bar du gsungs te bshad pa dang / rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang la las shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di bzung zhing kun
267b6(nyi khri): chub par bgyis te/ gzhan la bstan pa de gnyis kyang mi 'dra ba ma mchis so// bcom ldan 'das de ci'i slad du zhe na/ 'di las byung ba ni phyogs bcu'i de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom
267b7(nyi khri): pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams so/ / 'di las byung ba ni cho 'phrul rnam pa gsum mo// 'di las byung ba ni mdo dang dbyangs kyis bsnyad pa dang / lung du bstan
268a1(nyi khri): pa dang / chos gtan la bab pa bstan pa'i bar dag go/ bcom ldan 'das gzhan yang phyogs bcu'i phyogs re re zhing 'jig rten gyi khams pang+gA'i klung
268a2(nyi khri): gi bye ma snyed kyi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag pa rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de dag la me tog dang / 'phreng ba dang / spros dang / byug pa dang / phye ma dang / na bza'
268a3(nyi khri): dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan dang / sil snyan sna tshogs kyis rim gro dang / bkur sti dang / bsti stang dang / mchod par bgyis pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol
268a4(nyi khri): tu phyin pa 'di glegs bam du bris shing / me tog dang / 'phreng ba dang / spos dang / byug pa dang / phye ma dang / na bza' dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan dang
268a5(nyi khri): sem snyan sna tshogs kyis rim gro dang / bkur sti dang / bsti stang dang / mchod par bgyis pa'ang mi 'dra ba ma mchis so// de ci'i srad du zhe na/ 'di las byung ba ni de bzhin gshegs pa
268a6(nyi khri): dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams so/ / bcom ldan 'das gzhan yang rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di 'dzin cing 'cha
268a7(nyi khri): dang klog cing kun chub par bgyid pa dang / tshul bzhin du yid la bgyid cing / gzhan la'ang rgya cher ston pa de ni sems can dmyal ba'i rgyud kyi dogs pa ma mchis par bgyi'o// rgyas song
268b1(nyi khri): gi skye gnas dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rten gyi rgyud kyi dogs pa ma mchis par bgyi'o// nyan thos kyis dang rang sangs rgyas kyi sa'i dogs pa ma mchis par bgyi'o// de ci'i slad du zhe na
268b2(nyi khri): 'di ltar rigs kyi bu dang / rigs kyi bu mo de ni phyir mi ldog pa'i sa la gnas par rig par bgyi'o// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ 'di ltar de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di 'bris shing 'dzin to// 'chang ngo //
268b3(nyi khri): klog go/ kun chub par bgyid do// tshul bzhin du yid la bgyid do// bris pa de la'ang me tog dang / 'phreng ba dang / spos dang / byug pa dang / phye ma dang / na bza'
268b4(nyi khri): dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan dang / sil snyan sna tshogs kyis rim gror 'gyid/ bkur stir bgyid/ bsti stang du bgyid/ mchod par bgyid do//
268b5(nyi khri): bcom ldan 'das de ltar na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni 'jigs pa thams cad zhi bar bgyid pa'o// nad rab tu sel ba'o// bcom ldan 'das gzhan yang rigs
268b6(nyi khri): kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di bris shing / 'dzin pa dang / 'chang ba dang / klog pa dang / kun chub par bgyid pa dang / de la me tog dang
268b7(nyi khri): 'phreng ba dang / spos dang / byug pa dang / phye ma dang / na bza' dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan dang / sil snyan sna tshogs kyis rim gro dang
269a1(nyi khri): bkur sti dang / bsti stang dang / mchod par bgyid pa des ni gang nas kyang 'jigs pa 'byung ba'i dogs pa ma mchis par bgyi'o// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ dper na skyes
269a2(nyi khri): bu nor gyi bdag po zhig 'jigs nas rgyal po la gnas shing / rgyal po la brten na/ de ltar rgyal po la gnas shing / rgyal po la brten pas/ sus 'jigs pa de dag nyid kyang de la rten pas//
269a3(nyi khri): de dag gi 'jigs par mi 'gyur ro// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das de ni 'di ltar bsha' ste/ gang rgyal po la brten pa ni mthu dang ldan pa la brten pa'o// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin
269a4(nyi khri): du de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung de dag kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pas yongs su bsgrubs pas na mchod pa mnga'a'o/ / bcom ldan 'das rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi ye shes gang
269a5(nyi khri): lags pa de'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pas yongasu bsgrubs par blta'o/ / bcom ldan 'das de lta bas na bdag gis cha de gnyis las shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid blang bar bgyi'o//
269a6(nyi khri): bcom ldan 'das de ci'i slad du zhe na/ 'di las byung ba ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung rnams so// 'di las byung ba ni mi chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis so// 'di las byung ba ni de bzhin
269a7(nyi khri): gshegs pa rnams kyi de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad do//
269b1(nyi khri): 'di las byung ba ni byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po'o// bcom ldan 'das 'di las byung ba ni pha rol tu phyin pa lnga ste/ de dag pha rol tu phyin pa'i ming thob bo// 'di las byung ba ni de
269b2(nyi khri): bzhin gshegs pa'i rnam pa thams can mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar te/ bcom ldan 'das grong ngam/ grong rdal lam/ grong khyer ram/ khams sam/ rgyal po'i gnas sam/ stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i
269b3(nyi khri): 'jig rten gyi khams gang na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di 'dzin cing 'chang ba dang / klog cing kun chud par bgyid pa dang / de bres shing rim gro dang / bkur sti dang / bsti stang
269b4(nyi khri): dang / mchod par bgyid pa de dag tu/ mi 'am/ mi ma lags pa glags tshol zhing glags lta ba rnams kyi glags rnyed par mi 'gyur te/ sems can de dag thams cad kyang theg pa
269b5(nyi khri): gsum las theg pa gang yang rung bas mthar gyis yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba'i chos can du 'gyur ro/ / bcom ldan 'das de lta bas na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni don chen po dang ldan
269b6(nyi khri): pa ste/ stong gsum gyi ston chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams na de ltar sems can rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi don du nye bar gnas so// bcom ldan 'das 'jig rten gyi khams gang na shes rab
269b7(nyi khri): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di mchis pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams der ni sangs rgyas byung ba dang 'dra bar blta'o/ / bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ dper na nor bu rin po che chen po mi dpogs rin chen
270a1(nyi khri): ces bgyi ba mchis te/ de ni nor bu rin po che chen po'i yon tan rnam pa 'di lta bu dag dang ldan te/ nor bu rin po che de gang dang gang du bzhag pa de dang der mi ma lags pa rnams
270a2(nyi khri): kyis glags mi rnyed do/ / mi ma lags pas zin pa'i skyes pa 'am/ bud med kyang nor bu rin po che de bstan na/ mi ma lags pa de nor bu rin po che chen po de'i gzi brjid mi bzod do// myur du bapho zhen
270a3(nyi khri): mi gnas so/ / mkhris pas gdungs pa'i lus la nor bu rin po che chen po de btags na/ mkhris pa de'ang 'byang bar 'gyur ro// rlung gis mnar ba'i lus la nor bu rin po che de btags na/ rlung de'
270a4(nyi khri): 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ / pad kan gyis non pa'i lus la nor bu rin po che de btags na/ bad kan de'ang zhi bar 'gyur ro// 'dus pa'i nad kyis btab pa'i lus la nor bu rin po che de btags na/ 'dus
270a5(nyi khri): pa'i nad de'ang zhi bar 'gyur zhing rnam par mi 'phel lo/ / rub mo ni nor bu rin po che de snang bar bgyid do// tsha ba'i dus na ni nor bu rin po ched phyogs gang du bzhag pa'i phyogs de bsil bar bgyid do//
270a6(nyi khri): grang ba'i dus na ni nor bu rin po che chen po de phyogs gang du bzhag pa'i phyogs de dro bar bgyid do// nor bu rin po che chen po de dog sa'i phyogs gang du bzhag pa'i phyogs de'ang ha cang yang mi dro// ha cang
270a7(nyi khri): yang mi grang zhing ran pa phun sum tshogs par bgyid do/ / nor bu rin po che chen po de dogs sa'i phyogs gang du bzhag pa'i dogs sa'i phyogs der sprul lam/ de ma lags pa sdig pa la sogs pa gdug
270b1(nyi khri): pa dang / gzhan dag kyang rgyu bar mi 'gyur ro// / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag nyi shu lnga pa bam po sum cu bzhi pa// bcom ldan 'das skyes
270b2(nyi khri): pa'am/ bud med la la zhig sbrul gdug pas zin pa la nor bu rin po che chen po de bstan na/ des de mthong ma thas tu ru ka de'ang byang bar 'gyur ro// bcom ldan 'das nor bu rin po che chen po de ni
270b3(nyi khri): yon tan gyi rnam pa 'di lta bu dag dang ldan te/ skyes pa 'am/ bu med la la zhig 'brum bus btab bam/ mig rab rib can du gyur te// mig gi nad ngam/ rna ba'i nad dam/ rna'i nad dam
270b4(nyi khri): lce'i nang dam/ lkog ma'i nad dam/ lus kyi nad gcig byung ba las/ de'i lus la nor bu rin po che chen po de btags na/ de dag gi 'brum bu 'am/ rab rib bam/ mig gi nad dam/ rna ba'i
270b5(nyi khri): nad dam/ sna'i nad dam/ lce'i nad dam/ lkog ma'i nad dam/ lus kyi nad de dag kyang zhi bar 'gyur ro// bcom ldan 'das nor bu rin po che chen po de ni yon tan gyi rnam pa 'di lta bu
270b6(nyi khri): dag dang yang ldan te/ gal te nor bu rin po che chen po de chab rnyog ma can gyi nang du stsal na/ de'i mod la chab de thams cad kyang yan lag brgyad dang ldan zhing kha dog gcig par 'gyur ro//
270b7(nyi khri): gal te nor bu rin po che chen po degos sngon pos dkris te chab kyi nang du stsal na/ chab de'ang de'i rang bzhin nyid du 'gyur ro// gal te nor bu rin po che chen po de gos ser po 'am/ dmar po 'am/ dkar po 'am/
271a1(nyi khri): se banan nas/ shel gyi kha dog gas/ gos gzhan rnam pa sna tshogs kyis nor bu rin po rgya chen po de dkris te chab tu sras na/ chab de'ang de'i rang bzhin nyid du/
271a2(nyi khri): 'gyur ro// cham de la rlos ma mchis pa'ang nor du rin po che chen po des 'du ste/ bcom ldan 'das nor bu rin po che chen po de ni yon tan rnam pa de lta bru ga dang / gzhan yang rnam pa mang po dag dang lda
271a3(nyi khri): no/ / bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di'ang lha rdzas kyi nor bu rin po che chen po de dang 'dra bar yon tan thams cad kyi 'byung gnas gyur pa ste/ sdig pa thams cad sel ba'o//
271a4(nyi khri): denas tshe dang ldan pa dga' bos/ lha'i dbang po brgya byin la 'di skad ces smras so// ko'u shi ka de ji snyam du sems/ nor bu rin po che chen po de lha rdzas shig yin nam/ 'on tam nor bu rin po che chen po de 'dzam
271a5(nyi khri): bu gling gi mi rnams la'ang yod/ brgya byin gyis spras pa/ btsun pa dga' bo nor bu rin po che chen po de ni lU rdzas te/ btsun pa dga' bo 'dzam bu'i gling gi mi rnams la nor bu rin po che chen po gang yod pa
271a6(nyi khri): dedag ni chung zhing lci/ lha rdzas kyi nor bu rin po che de dag ni che ning yang ste/ 'dzam du gling gi mi rnams kyi nor bu rin po che de dag ni b+ha rdzas ltar yan lag de dag gis yongs su rdzogs pa ma yin te/ 'dzam bu
271a7(nyi khri): gling gi nor bu rin po che de dag gis ni lga dzas kyi nor bu rin ma che'i grangs sam/ cha'am/ 'grang ba 'am/ dpe 'am/ rgyur yang nye bar mi 'gro'o// de nas yang lha'i dbang po brgya
271b1(nyi khri): byin gyis/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das nor bu rin po che chen po de snod la la zhig gi nang du stsal ba las/ snod de nas byung yang / snod de ni nor bu rin po che de'i yon tan gyis yid/
271b2(nyi khri): du mchi bar 'gyur te/ gzhan yang snod de la mos pa bskyed do// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di gang na mchis pa de'i rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo de dag gi lus sam
271b3(nyi khri): sems kyi sdug bsngal dang / gnod pa mi las gyur pa 'am/ mi ma lags pa las gyur pa thams cad kyang ma mchis par 'gyur te/ bcom ldan 'das nor bu rin po che chen po zhes bgyi ba ni//
271b4(nyi khri): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i tshig bla dgas so// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes kyi tshig bla dgas so// bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i yon tan lta ji snyed cig brjod par
271b5(nyi khri): bgyi ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i yon tan ni tshad ma mchis so// de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung de dag kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i snod do// bcom ldan 'das
271b6(nyi khri): bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang
271b7(nyi khri): nang stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar dang / dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi dang / yang dag par spong ba bzhi dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi dang / dbang po lnga dang / stobs
272a1(nyi khri): lnga dang / byang chub kyi yan lag 'dun dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams dang / bsam gtan bzhi dang / tshad med pa bzhi dang
272a2(nyi khri): gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo gsum dang / mngon par shes pa rnams
272a3(nyi khri): dang / ting nge 'dzin rnams dang / gzungs kyi sgo rnams dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / byams pa chen
272a4(nyi khri): po dang / snying rje chen po dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad dang / thams cad shes pa nyid dang / lam gyi rnam par shes pa nyid dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi ye shes
272a5(nyi khri): dang / de bzhin nyid dang / ma nor ba de bzhin nyid dang / gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin nyid dang / chos nyid dang / chos kyi dbyings dang / chos kyi gnas nyid dang / chos mi 'gyur ba nyid dang / yang dag
272a6(nyi khri): pa'i mtha' dang / bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i dbyings dang / bag chags kyi mtshams sbyor ba'i nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs pa dang / rtag tu gtang snyoms la gnas pa dang / mi nyams pa'i chos
272a7(nyi khri): nyid kyi yon tan lta ji snyed cig brjod par bgyi ste/ mi nyams pa'i chos nyid kyi yon tan ni tshad ma mchis so// de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung de dag kyang mi nyams pa'i chos nyid kyi snod do// de
272b1(nyi khri): bas na de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung de dag ni mchod pa mnga' 'o/ / bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung de dag ni pha rol tu phyin pa rin po che'i snod do// de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung de/
272b2(nyi khri): dag ni pha rol tu phyin pa kun nas nyon mongs pa ma mchis/ rnam par byang ba ma mchis pa dang / pha rol tu phyin pa mi skye mi 'gag pa dang / pha rol tu phyin pa blang ba ma mchis pa dang / dor ba ma mchis pa
272b3(nyi khri): dang / pha rol tu phyin pa dbri ba ma mchis pa dang / bsnan pa ma mchis pa dang / pha rol tu phyin pa 'ong ba ma mchis/ 'gro ba ma mchis/ gnas pa ma mchis pa'i snod do// de bas na de bzhin
272b4(nyi khri): gshegs pa'i sku gdung de dag ni mchod pa mnga' 'o/ / bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung de dag ni pha rol tu phyin pa chos nyid kyi snod de/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung de dag ni pha rol tu phyin
272b5(nyi khri): pa'i chos nyid kyis yongs su bsgoms pa'o/ / de bas na de bzhin gshegs pa mya ngan las 'das kyang de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung de dag ni mchod pa mnga' 'o// gzhan yang stong
272b6(nyi khri): gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung gis byur bur bltams pa lta zhog gi/ bcom ldan 'das gal te phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed
272b7(nyi khri): cig de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung gis byung bur bltams pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa glegs bam la bris pa zhig stsal na/ bcom ldan 'das rnam pa de gnyis las bdag ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
273a1(nyi khri): pa 'di nyid len to/ / de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das 'di las byung ba ni de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi sku gdung rnams te
273a2(nyi khri): mchod pa mnga'a'o/ / bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su bsgoms pas na/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung de dag mchod pa mnga' ste/ bcom ldan 'das rigs bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu
273a3(nyi khri): mo gang de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung rnams la rim gror bgyid pa dang / bkur stir bgyid pa dang / bsti stang du bgyid pa dang / mchod par bgyid pa'ang dge ba'i rtsa ba de'i mtha' mi dmigs shing /
273a4(nyi khri): rgyal rigs che zhing mtho ba 'am/ bram ze'i rigs che ni mtho ba 'am/ khyim bdag gi rigs che zhing mtho ba 'am// rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha 'am/ sum cu rtsa gsum mam/ mtshe mra 'am/
273a5(nyi khri): dga' ldan nam/ 'phrul dga' 'am/ gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha'i nang du/ mi dang lha'i phun sum tshogs pa dang bde ba myong nas/ dge ba'i rtsa ba de nyid kyis sdug bsngal gyi mthar
273a6(nyi khri): 'byung ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung mchod pa'i 'bras bu de tsam du bas kyis/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di bzung zhing bcangs pa dang / bklags shing kun chub par bgyis pa dang
273a7(nyi khri): tshul bzhin du yid la bgyis na/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi sa
273b1(nyi khri): rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// nang stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// dngos po med pa'i//
273b2(nyi khri): ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar du yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi bar du yongs su
273b3(nyi khri): rdzogs par 'gyur ro/ / de ched du bsams te lus yongs su 'dzin par 'gyur ro// lus de dag gis sems can yongs su smin par bgyid par 'gyur te/ 'khor lo sgyur ba'i lus sam/ rgyal rigs
273b4(nyi khri): che zhing mtho ba 'am/ bram ze'i rigs che zhing mtho ba 'am/ khyim bdag gi rigs che zhing mtho ba'i gzugs sam/ brgya byin gyi gzugs sam/ tshangs pa'i gzugs sam/ ngal bso po'i gzum
273b5(nyi khri): kyang rung ste/ lus de dag gis sems can yongs su smin par bgyid par 'gyur ro// nyan thos kyi sa dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi sa las 'das te/ byang chub sems dpa'i skyon med par 'jug par 'gyur ro//
273b6(nyi khri): byang chub sems dpa'i skyon med par zhugs nas/ byang chub sems dpa'i mngon par shes pa thob par 'gyur ro// byang chub sems dpa'i mngon par shes pa thob nas/ sang+yas kyi zhing nas sangs rgyas
273b7(nyi khri): kyi zhing du mchi bar 'gyur ro/ / bcom ldan 'das de bas na bdag ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung la rim gro ma mchis pa'ang ma lags/ slob mches pa'ang ma mchis/ mchod par mi 'tshal
274a1(nyi khri): ba'ang ma lags/ gzung bar mi 'tshal ba'ang ma lags te/ bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni/ rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo rnams kyis ram
274a2(nyi khri): gro dang / bkur sti dang / bsti stang dang / mchod pa bgyis na/ sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad kyi rgyu shin tu bsags pa lags/ phun sum tshogs pa thams cad kyang yongs su zin par 'gyur/ de bzhin
274a3(nyi khri): gshegs pa'i sku gdung rnams la'ang rim gro dang / bkur sti dang / bsti stang dang / mched pa bgyis par 'gyur ro// bcom ldan 'das gzhan yang phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi
274a4(nyi khri): khams tshad dang grangs ma mchis pa dag na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ji snyed cig bzhugs shing 'tshe skyong ba dang / chos ston pa de dag chos kyi sku dang
274a5(nyi khri): gzugs kyi sku dang / ye shes kyi skur mthong bar 'tshal zhing mchod par 'tshal bas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid gzung bar bgyi/ bcang bar bgyi/ bklag par bgyi/ kun chub par
274a6(nyi khri): bgyi/ mchod par bgyi/ gzhan la'ang rgya cher yang dag par bstar par bgyi/ tshul bzhin du'ang yid la bgyi ste/ rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo dos ni phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams grangs dang
274a7(nyi khri): tshad ma mchis pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams mthong bar 'gyur ro/ / de bas na rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod
274b1(nyi khri): pa des/ chos nyid du sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa bsgom par bgyi'o// bcom ldan 'das gzhan yang rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo de bzhin gshes sa pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par/
274b2(nyi khri): rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de dag mthong bar 'tshal bas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di gzung bar bgyi/ bcang bar bgyi/ bklag par bgyi/ kun chub par bgyi/ mchod par bgyi/ gzhan
274b3(nyi khri): la'ang rgya cher yang dag par bstan par bgyi/ chos nyid tshul bzhin du'ang yid la bgyi'o// bcom ldan 'das gnyis po 'di dag ni chos nyid do// gnyis gang zhe na/ 'dus byas kyi chos rnams
274b4(nyi khri): kyi chos nyid dang / 'dus ma byas kyi chos rnams kyi chos nyid do// bcom ldan 'das de la 'dus byas kyi chos rnams kyi chos nyid gang lags she na// nang stong pa nyid kyi ye shes dang / phyi stong pa nyid
274b5(nyi khri): kyi ye shes dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid kyi ye shes dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar gyi ye shes dang / byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun gyi ye shes dang / 'phags pa'i bden
274b6(nyi khri): pa bzhi dang / bsam gtan bzhi dang / tshad med pa bzhi dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i stobs par 'jug par dgu dang /
274b7(nyi khri): rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa'i ye shes dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang
275a1(nyi khri): #/ byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi ye shes dang / dge ba dang / mi dge ba'i chos rnams kyi ye shes dang / zag pa
275a2(nyi khri): med pa dang / zag pa dang bcas pa'i chos rnams kyi ye shes dang / 'jig rten dang / 'jig rten las 'das pa'i chos rnams kyi ye shes gang lags pa de ni/ 'dus byas kyi chos rnams kyi chos nyid
275a3(nyi khri): ces bgyi'o/ / de la 'dus ma byas kyi chos rnams kyi chos nyid gang lags she na/ de ni gang la skye ba ma mchis pa dang / 'gag pa ma mchis pa dang / gnas pa ma mchis
275a4(nyi khri): pa dang / gnas pa las gzhan du 'gyur ba ma mchis pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa ma mchis pa dang / rnam par byang ba ma mchis pa dang / 'phel ba ma mchis pa dang / 'grib pa ma mchis
275a5(nyi khri): ba ste/ de ni chos thams cad kyi ngo bo nyid do// chos thams cad kyi ngo bo nyid gang lags she ra/ chos thams cad ni dngos po ma mchis pa'i ngo bo nyid de/ 'di ni 'dus ma byas kyi chos rnams kyi chos
275a6(nyi khri): nyid ces bgyi'o/ / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ ke'u shi ka de de bzhin no// de de bzhin te/ 'das pa'i dus kyi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par
275a7(nyi khri): rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gang ji snyed cig byung ba de dag kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid la brten te/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs
275b1(nyi khri): rgyas so/ / ma 'ongs pa'i dus kyi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gang ji snyed cig 'byung ba de dag kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid la brten te/ bla na med/
275b2(nyi khri): pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o// da ltar byung ba'i phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams tshad med grangs med pa dag na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs
275b3(nyi khri): ba'i sangs rgyas gang ji snyed cig bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ba dang / chos ston pa da ngadag kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid la brten te/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa byang chub tu mngon par rdzog
275b4(nyi khri): par sangs rgyas so/ / 'das pa'i dus kyi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyi nyan thos gang ji snyed cig byung ba dang / ma byon pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa
275b5(nyi khri): dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyi nyan thos gang ji snyed cig 'byung ba dang / da ltar byang ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyi nyan
275b6(nyi khri): thos gang ji snyed cig yod pa de dag gis kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid la brten te/ rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu dang / lan cig phyin 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras
275b7(nyi khri): bu dang / dgra bcom pa nyid thob bo// 'thob bo// thob par 'gyur ro// 'das pa'i dus kyi rang sangs rgyas ji snyed cig byung ba dang / ma 'ongs pa'i dus kyi rang sangs rgyas je snyed cig 'byung ba dang /
276a1(nyi khri): da ltar byung ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams grangs mang tshad med pa dag na rang sangs rgyas gang ji snyed cig 'khod cing 'tsho skyong ba de dag gis kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid la brten
276a2(nyi khri): terang byang chub thob bo/ / 'thob bo// thob par 'gyur ro// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di las theg pa gsum po thams cad rgya cher bstan te/ de dag kyang mtshan ma med
276a3(nyi khri): pa'i tshul dang / dmigs pa med pa'i tshul dang / skye ba med pa dang / 'gag pa med pa'i tshul dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang / rnam par byang ba med pa'i tshul dang / mngon par
276a4(nyi khri): 'du bya ba med pa'i tshul dang / len pa med pa dang / dor ba med pa'i tshul dang / dbri ba med pa dang / bsnan pa med pa'i tshul dang / blang ba med pa dang / spang ba med pa'i tshul gyis bstan
276a5(nyi khri): te/ de'ang 'jig rten gyi tha snyad kyi tshul gyis bstan gyi/ don dam par ni ma yin no// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni ring du song ba ma yin/ pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin te/ shes rab
276a6(nyi khri): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni tshu rol ma yin/ pha rol ma yin/ thang du 'dug pa ma yin/ gshed du 'dug pa ma yin/ mnyam pa ma yin/ mi mnyam pa ma yin/ mtshan ma ma yin/ mtshan ma
276a7(nyi khri): med pa ma yin/ 'jig rten pa ma yin/ 'jig rten las 'das pa ma yin/ 'dus byas ma yin/ 'dus ma byas ma yin/ dge ba ma yin/ mi dge ba ma yin/ 'das pa ma yin/ ma 'ongs pam
276b1(nyi khri): yin/ da ltar byung ba ma yin te/ ko'u shi ka shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams nye bar sgrub pa ma yin/ dgra bcom pa'i bar gyi chos rnams dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams nye bar
276b2(nyi khri): sgrub pa ma yin/ so so'i skye bo'i chos rnams 'dor ba ma yin no// brgya byin gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni pha rol tu phyin pa chen po ste/ bcom
276b3(nyi khri): ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di la spyod pa rnams ni/ sems can thams cad kyi sems dang spyod pa'ang 'tshal te/ sems can du dmigs pa ma mchis
276b4(nyi khri): so/ / sems can du gdags par dmigs pa ma mchis so// bdag dang / sems can dang / srog dang / 'gro ba dang / gso ba dang / skyes bu dang / gang zag dang / shed can dang / shed
276b5(nyi khri): bdag dang / byed pa po dang / tshor ba po dang / shes pa po dang / mthong ba por dmigs pa ma mchis so// gzugs su dmigs pa ma mchis so// tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed
276b6(nyi khri): dang rnam par shes par dmigs pa ma mchis so/ / mig tu dmigs pa ma mchis/ yid kyi bar du dmigs pa ma mchis so// gzus su dmig pa ma mchis/ chos kyi bar du daris pa ma mchis so// mig gi rnam par shes par
276b7(nyi khri): dmigs pa ma mchis/ yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i bar du dmigs pa ma mchis so// mig gi 'dus te reg par dmigs pa ma mchis/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i bar du dmigs pa ma mchis
277a1(nyi khri): so/ mig gi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor bar dmigs pa ma mchis/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba'i bar du dmigs pa ma mchis so// sa'i khams su
277a2(nyi khri): dmigs pa ma mchis/ chu'i khams dang / me'i khams dang / rlung gi khams dang / nam mkha'i khams dang / rnam par shes pa'i khams su dmigs pa ma mchis so// ma rig par dmigs
277a3(nyi khri): pa ma mchis/ 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa dang / ming dang gzugs dang / skye mched drug dang / reg pa dang / tshor ba dang / sred pa dang / len pa dang / srid pa dang / skye ba dang / rga shir dmigs pa
277a4(nyi khri): ma mchis so/ / sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin par dmigs pa ma mchis/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol
277a5(nyi khri): tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin par dmigs pa ma mchis so// nang stong pa nyid du dmigs pa ma mchis/ dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar du dmigs pa ma mchis so// dran panye
277a6(nyi khri): par gzhag pa rnams su dmigs pa ma mchis/ yang dag par spong ba dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang / dbang po dang / stobs dang / byang chub kyi yan lag dang / 'phags pa'i lam
277a7(nyi khri): yan lag brgyad par dmigs pa ma mchis so/ / 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams su dmigs pa ma mchis/ bsam gtan dang / tshad med pa dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams su
277b1(nyi khri): dmigs pa ma mchis so/ / rnam par thar pa brgyad du dmigs pa ma mchis mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang rnam par thar pa'i sgo gsum dang / mngon par shes
277b2(nyi khri): pa rnams su dmigs pa ma mchis so/ / ting nge 'dzin rnams su dmigs pa ma mchis/ gzungs kyi sgo rnams su dmigs pa ma mchis so// de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams su dmigs pa
277b3(nyi khri): ma mchis/ mi 'jigs pa rnams dang / so so yang dag par rigs pa rnams dang / snying rje chen po dang / byams pa chen po dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams su dmigs pa ma mchis
277b4(nyi khri): so/ / rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bur dmigs pa ma mchis/ lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / dgra bcom pa nyid du dmigs pa ma mchis so// rang byang chub
277b5(nyi khri): tu dmigs pa ma mchis so/ / lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid dang / byang chub dang / rang sangs rgyas dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos su dmigs pa ma mchis te/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni dmags
277b6(nyi khri): pa'i tshul du nye bar gnas pa ma lags so/ / de ci'i slad du zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar gang gis dmigs par bgyi ba dang / gang la dmigs par bgyi ba dang / gang du dmigs par bgyi ba de lta bu'i de nge
277b7(nyi khri): nyid de la ma mchis so/ / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ ko'u shi ka de de bzhin no// de de bzhin te/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de mi dmigs pa'i tshul du shes rab
278a1(nyi khri): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la yun ring por spyad pas des byang chub kyang mi dmigs na/ sangs rgyas lta ci smos/ sangs rgyas kyi chos lta ci smos// brgya byin gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das
278a2(nyi khri): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la sdod kyi/ de ma lags pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa gzhan la mi spyod dam/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ ko'u shi ka/
278a3(nyi khri): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni pha rol tu phyin pa drug po kun la'ang de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyi spyod de/ des sbyin pa'ang mi dmigs/ gtong ba'ang mi dmigs/ len pa'ang mi
278a4(nyi khri): dam gas so/ / tshul khrims kyang mi dmigs/ tshul khrims dang ldan pa'ang mi dmigs/ tshul khrims ngan pa'ang mi dmigs so// bzod pa'ang mi dmigs/ bzod pa dang ldan pa'ang mi dmigs
278a5(nyi khri): gnod sems kyang mi dmigs so/ / brtson 'grus kyang mi dmigs/ brtson 'grus dang ldan pa'ang mi dmigs/ le lo'ang mi dmigs so// bsam gtan yang mi dmigs/ bsam gtan dang
278a6(nyi khri): ldan pa'ang mi dmigs/ 'khrug pa'ang mi dmigs so// shes rab kyang mi dmigs/ shes rab dang ldan pa'ang mi dmigs/ shes rab 'chal pa'ang mi dmigs so// ko'u shi ka shes rab kyi
278a7(nyi khri): pha rol tu phyin pa ni gzugs mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / mig mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang
278b1(nyi khri): na ba dang / sna dang / lce dang / lus dang / yid mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / gzugs mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / sgra dang / dri dang / ro dang / reg bya dang / chos mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang /
278b2(nyi khri): mig gi rnam par shes pa mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / rna ba'i rnam par shes pa dang / sna'i rnam par shes pa dang / lce'i rnam par shes pa dang / lus kyi rnam par shes pa dang / yid kyi rnam par shes
278b3(nyi khri): pa mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / mig gi 'dus te reg pa mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa dang / sna'i 'dus te reg pa dang / lce'i 'dus te reg pa dang / lus kyi 'dus te reg
278b4(nyi khri): reg pa dang / yid kyi 'dus te reg pa mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / mig gi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba dang /
278b5(nyi khri): sna'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba dang / lce'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba dang / lus kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba dang / yid kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba
278b6(nyi khri): mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / sa'i khams mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / chu'i khams dang / me'i khams dang / rlung gi khams dang / nam mkha'i khams dang / rnam par shes
278b7(nyi khri): ba'i khams mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / ma rig pa mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa dang / ming dang gzugs dang / skye mched drug dang / reg pa dang / tshor ba dang /
279a1(nyi khri): sred pa dang / len pa dang / srid pa dang / skye ba dang / rga shi mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin
279a2(nyi khri): pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tuphyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / nang stong pa
279a3(nyi khri): nyid mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar du mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa
279a4(nyi khri): rnams dang / bsam gtan rnams dang / tshad med pa rnams dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i
279a5(nyi khri): snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo gsum dang / mngon par shes pa lnga dang / ting nge 'dzin thams cad dang / gzungs kyi sgo thams cad mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / de bzhin gshegs/
279a6(nyi khri): pa'i stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / snying rje chen po dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / rgyun du zhugs pa'i
279a7(nyi khri): 'bras bu dang / lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / phyir mi 'ongs pa'i 'bras bu dang / dgra bcom pa nyid dang / rang byang chub dang / lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid dang / rnam pa thams cad
279b1(nyi khri): mkhyen pa nyid mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / chos thams cad mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sbyin pa yongs su gtong ba'i sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yengs
279b2(nyi khri): su rdzogs pa'i bya ba la sngon du 'gro'o/ / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshul khrims srung ba'i tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par bya ba la sngon
279b3(nyi khri): du 'gro ba'o/ / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bzod pa sgom pa'i bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par bya ba la sngon du 'gro ba'o//
279b4(nyi khri): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po brtson 'grus rtsom pa'i brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par bya ba la sngon du 'gro ba'o// shes
279b5(nyi khri): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bsam gtan la snyoms par 'jug pa'i bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par bya ba la sngon du 'gro ba'o/ /
279b6(nyi khri): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos thams cad la rnam par lta ba'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par bya ba la sngon du
279b7(nyi khri): 'gro ba'o/ / ko'u shi ka 'di lta ste/ dper na 'dzam du gling gi shing rnams lo ma sna tshogs can/ me tog sna tshogs can/ 'bras bu sna tshogs can/ dbyibs sna tshogs can
280a1(nyi khri): chu keng sna tshogs can du 'khod kyang / de dag gi grib ma la khyad par ram bye brag mi dmigs te/ gzhan du na grib ma grib ma zhes bya ba'i grangs su 'gro bar zad do// ko'u
280a2(nyi khri): shi ka de bzhin du pha rol tu phyin pa lnga shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pas yongs su zin pa/ thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes su yongs su bsngos pa rnams la'ang khyad par ram bye brag mi dmigs so// /
280a3(nyi khri): / brgya byin gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni yon tan thams cad yongs su rdzogs par bgyid pa'i slad du yon tan chen po dang ldan
280a4(nyi khri): pa'o/ / bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni yon tan tshad ma mchis pa dang ldan pa'i slad du// tshad ma mchis pa'i yon tan dang ldan pa'o// bcom ldan 'das shes
280a5(nyi khri): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni yon tan mu ma mchis pa dang ldan pa'i slad du/ yon tan kun tu mtha' yas pa dang ldan pa'o// bcom ldan 'das rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo la la zhig
280a6(nyi khri): gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di bris shing glegs bam du bgyis te bcangs pa dang / me tog dang / 'phreng ba dang / spos dang / byug pa dang / phye ma dang / na
280a7(nyi khri): bza' dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan dang / sil snyan sna tshogs kyi rim gror bgyis// bkur stir dang / bsti stang du bgyis/ mchod par bgyis te/ de nas gong
280b1(nyi khri): du ji skadang bstan pa bzhin du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa tshul bzhin du yid la bgyis pa dang / rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo sa las shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di glegs pam du bgyis
280b2(nyi khri): te gzhan la stsal na/ de gnyis las gang gi bsod nams cher 'phel bar 'gyur/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' sprus pa/ ko'u shi ka de bas na khyod 'di la dris
280b3(nyi khri): khyod kyis ji ltar bzod pa de ltar lung ston cig/ ko'u shi ka de ji snyam du sems/ rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo la las de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku bdung mang po la me tog dang /
280b4(nyi khri): 'phreng ba dang / spos dang / byug pa dang / phye ma dang / na bza' dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan dang / sil snyan sna tshogs kyis rim gror byas/ bkur stir
280b5(nyi khri): byas bsti stang du byas/ mchod par byas pa dang / rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo la las de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung yungs kar gyi 'bru tsam zhig gzhan la byin te bgo shar byas pa dang / rigs
280b6(nyi khri): kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo la las de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung sungs kar gyi 'bru tsam po de blangs te/ me tog dang / 'phreng ba dang / spos dang / byug pa dang / phye ma dang / na bza'
280b7(nyi khri): dang gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan dang / sil snyan sna tshogs kyi rim gror byas/ bkur stir byas/ bsti stang du byas/ mchod par byas na/ de dag las gang gis
281a1(nyi khri): bsod nams cher 'phel ba yin/ brgya byin gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das bdag gis/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa'i don 'tshal te/ de la rigs kyi
281a2(nyi khri): bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang gis de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung mang po la me tog dang / 'phreng ba dang / spos dang / byug pa dang / phye ma dang / na bza' dang / gdugs dang / rgyal
281a3(nyi khri): mtshan dang / ba dan dang / sil snyan sna tshogs kyi bkur stir bgyis/ rim gror bgyis/ bsti stang du bgyis// mchod par bgyis pa bas/ gang la las de bzhin gshegs pa'i
281a4(nyi khri): sku gdung yungs kar gyi 'bru tsam gzhan la stsal na/ 'di ni de bas bsod nams cher 'phel lo// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs
281a5(nyi khri): rgyas kyis kyang don de nyid gzigs te rdo rje lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin la mnyam par gzhags nas rdo rje lta bu'i sku bshig ste/ sems can gyi ris na de bzhin gshegs pa'i ring bsrel gyis 'dul
281a6(nyi khri): ba'i sems can mchis pa rnams kyi slad du thugs rje chen po bskyed de/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung du byin gyis brlabs so// bcom ldan 'das gang la las chung ngu na/ de bzhin
281a7(nyi khri): gshegs pa'i sku gdung yungs kar gyi 'bru tsam la mchod pa sna tshogs kyis mchod pa bgyis na/ de dag sems can kyang dge ba'i rtsa ba de'i mthar ma thug par sdug bsngal mthar 'byin par 'gyur ro//
281b1(nyi khri): bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// ko'u shi ka de de bzhin no// de de bzhin te/ ko'u shi ka rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo la las shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di
281b2(nyi khri): glegs bam du byas te/ me tog dang / 'phreng ba dang / spos dang / byug pa dang / phye ma dang / na bza' dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan dang / sil snyan sna tshogs kyis rim gror
281b3(nyi khri): byas/ bkur stir byas/ bsti stang du byas/ mchod par byas pa bas/ gang la las shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di bris te/ chos kyi dga' bas gzhan la byin na/ rigs kyi bu 'am/
281b4(nyi khri): rigs kyi bu mo de'i bsod nams cher 'phel bar 'gyur ro// ko'u shi ka gzhan yang rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu me la las shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ji skad du bstan
281b5(nyi khri): ba bzhin du gzhan gyi drung du song ste/ bshad cing bstan pa dang / brjed cing bkrol ba dang / rnam par phye ste gsal bar byas na/ rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo de ni rigs kyi bu 'am/
281b6(nyi khri): rigs kyi bu mo snga ma dag pas bsod nams cher 'phel te/ de ni ston pa yin par bsam me// bla ma'i gnas mkhas pa chad pa mtshungs par spyod pa la la zhig yin par bsam mo// de ci'i phyir
281b7(nyi khri): zhe na/ ko'u shi ka de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid ston pa yin te/ ston pa ni gzhan shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni gzhan zhes bya ba mod kyi/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa nyid kyang ston pa
282a1(nyi khri): ston pa nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ / de ci'i phyir zhe na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid la bslabs pas/ 'das pa dang / ma byon pa dang
282a2(nyi khri): da ltar byung ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so/ / mngon
282a3(nyi khri): par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o/ / mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro// tshangs pa tshungs par spyod pa de dag kyang phyir mi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams las gud na med de/
282a4(nyi khri): dag kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di la bslabs shing / bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so// mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o//
282a5(nyi khri): mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro// ko'u shi ka shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid la bslabs shing / nyan thos kyi theg pa pa rnams kyis kyang rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu thob bo//
282a6(nyi khri): 'thob bo// thob par 'gyur ro// dgra bcom pa nyid kyi bar du thob bo// 'thob bo// thob par 'gyur ro// rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa pa rnams kyis kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid
282a7(nyi khri): la bslabs shing / rang byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so// mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o// mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro// byang chub
282b1(nyi khri): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di 'di la bslabs shing / byang chub sems dpa'i skyon med par zhugs so// 'jug go// 'jug par 'gyur ro//
282b2(nyi khri): bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so// mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o// mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro// ko'u shi ka
282b3(nyi khri): de bas na rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams la me tog dang / 'phreng ba dang / spos dang /
282b4(nyi khri): byug pa dang / phye ma dang / na gza' dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dam dang / sil snyan sna tshogs kyi rig gror bya bar 'dod pa dang / bkur stir bya bar 'dod
282b5(nyi khri): pa dang / bsti stang du bya bar 'dod pa dang / mchod par bya bar 'dod pas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di bris te me tog dang / 'phreng ba dang / spos dang / byug pa dang / phye ma dang
282b6(nyi khri): na bza' dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan dang / sil snyan sna tshogs kyis rim gror bya'o// bkur stir bya'o// sti stang du bya'o// mched par bya'o// ko bu shi ka ngas don de
282b7(nyi khri): nyid kyi dbang yang dag par mthong ste/ bla na med pa yang dag rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas 'di snyam ste/ gang zhig la bdag gis rim gro dang / bkur sti dang /
283a1(nyi khri): @#// bsti stang dang / mchod par byas te/ rten cing rnam par spyad par bya snyam na/ ko'u shi ka de langs 'jig rten lha dang bcas pa/ bdud dang bcas pa/ tshangs pa dang bcas pa/ dge
283a2(nyi khri): skyong dang bram zer bcas pa'i skye dgu dang / lha dang / mi dang / lha ma yin du bcas pa'i nang na nga dang 'dra ba'am/ lhag par yang dag par rjes su ma mthong nas/ de la ngas 'di snyam du
283a3(nyi khri): bsams te/ de lta yin na bdag gis chos zhi ba bzang po gang bdag nyid kyis mngon par sangs rgyas pa de nyid la rim gro dang / bkur sti dang / bsti stang dang / mchod par bya ste/ brten cing rnam par
283a4(nyi khri): spyad par bya'o snyam du bsams so/ / ko'u shi ka chos de'ang gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid yin te/ ke'u shi ka de ltar nga nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid la
283a5(nyi khri): rim gror byed/ bkur stir byed/ bsti stang du byed/ mchod par byed de/ de ltar rim gror byed/ bkur sti dang / bsti stang dang // mchod par byas shing rnam par spyod na/ ko'u shi ka rigs
283a6(nyi khri): kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'dod pas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la me tog dang / 'phreng ba dang / spos

283b1(nyi khri): dang / mchod par bya ba lta ci smos/ nyan thos kyi theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo de dag gis shes rab kyi/
283b2(nyi khri): pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid la me tog dang / 'phreng ba dang / spos dang / byug pa dang / phye ma dang / na bza' dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan dang / sil snyan sna tshogs
283b3(nyi khri): kyis rim gror bya ba dang / bkur stir bya ba dang / bsti stang du bya ba dang / mchos par bya ba lta ci smos/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las byung ba ni byang chub sema?
283b4(nyi khri): dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams so/ / byang chub sems dpa' las byung ba ni de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams so// de bzhin gshegs pa
283b5(nyi khri): dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams las byung ba ni nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas rnams so/ / ko'u shi ka de lta bas na byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu dang /
283b6(nyi khri): rigs kyi bu mo 'am/ nyan thos gi theb pa pa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu dang / rigs kyi bu mos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid la me tog dang / 'phreng

284a1(nyi khri): dubya'o/ / mchod par bya'o// de ltar de la slob pa'i rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so//

284a4(nyi khri): nyishu gnyis pa'o/ / / de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ lha'i dbang po brgya byin la bka' stsal pa/ ko'u shi ka rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo la la
284a5(nyi khri): zhig gis gal te 'dzam bu gling gi sems can de dag dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam la bkod par gyur na/ kau'u shi ka de ji snyam du sems/ rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo de de'i rgyus
284a6(nyi khri): bsod nams mang du 'phel bar 'gyur ram/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das mang ngo // bde bar gshegs pa mang ngo // bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ ko'u shi ka de bas
284a7(nyi khri): kyang la la zhig gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di glegs bam du byas te klog pa dang / bri ba 'am/ kha ton bya ba'i phyir gzhan la byin na bsod nams ches mang du 'phel lo// de ci'i phyir zhe na/
284b1(nyi khri): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di las zag pa med pa'i chos gang la rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo slob cing yang dag pa'i skyon med par zhugs par gyur pa dang / 'jug pa dang / 'jug
284b2(nyi khri): par 'gyur ba dang / dgra bcom pa nyid kyi bar du thob par gyur pa dang / 'thob pa dang / thob par 'gyur ba dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa pa rnams kyis rang sangs rgyas kyi byang chub thob
284b3(nyi khri): par gyur pa dang / 'thob pa dang / thob par 'gyur pa dang / bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yang dag par zhugs pa rnams kyis byang chub sems dpa'i skyon med par zhugs pa
284b4(nyi khri): dang / 'jug pa dang / 'jug par 'gyur ba dang / bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa dang / mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba dang
284b5(nyi khri): mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ba de lta bu'i chos mang po rgya cher bstan to/ / ko'u shi ka zag pa med pa'i chos de dag kyang gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /
284b6(nyi khri): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i bar dang / nang stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar dang / byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun dang / 'phags pa'i
284b7(nyi khri): bden pa bzhi dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa
285a1(nyi khri): dang / mngon par shegs pa drub dang / ting nge 'dzin thams cad dang / gzungs kyi sgo thams cad dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi
285a2(nyi khri): dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad dang / byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po dang / dga' ba chen po dang / btang snyoms chen po dag
285a3(nyi khri): ste/ sangs rgyas kyi chos tshad med pa gzhan dag kyang rgya cher bstan to// ko'u shi ka rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo la la zhig gis sems can gcig cig rgyun du zhugs pa'i
285a4(nyi khri): 'bras bu la gzhag na/ de'i bsod nams ches mang du 'phel gyi/ 'dzam bu gling gi sems can rnams dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam la bkod pa ni ma yin no// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ke'u shi ka dge
285a5(nyi khri): ba bcu'i las kyi lam la bkod pa'i sems can rnams ni/ sems can dmyal ba dang / byel song gi skye gnas dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rten nas yongs su grol ba ma yin no// ko'u shi ka/
285a6(nyi khri): rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu la bkod pa'i sems can ni/ sems can dmyal ba dang / byel song gyi skye gnas dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rten nas yongs su grol ba'i phyir te/ lan cig phyir
285a7(nyi khri): 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / dgra bcom pa nyid la bkod pa lta ci smos/ ko'u shi ka gang la las 'dzam bu gling gi sems can rnams rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu
285b1(nyi khri): / sa bkod pa dang / dgra bcom pa nyid kyi bar bkod pa bas la la zhig gis sems can gcig cig rang byang chub la gzhag na/ de'i bsod nams ches mang du 'phel lo// rigs kyi
285b2(nyi khri): bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo la la zhig gis 'dzam bu gling gi sems can thams cad rang byang chub la bkod pa bas/ rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo la la zhig gis sems can gcig
285b3(nyi khri): cig bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la gzhag na/ de'i bsod nams ches mang du 'phel lo// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ sems can gcig pu bla na med pa yang dag rdzogs pa'i
285b4(nyi khri): byang chub tu bkod pa de ni/ sangs rgyas kyi tshul rgyun mi gcang ba'i don du zhugs pa'i phyir ro// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ko'u shi ka byang chub sems dpa' las byung ba ni rgyun du zhugs pa dang /

286a1(nyi khri): / drung tshams kyis ma / bya ba dang / dang / cho pa dzin ma bya ko
286a2(nyi khri): shig rigs kyi du 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo la la zhig gis 'jam du gling sems sa can thams cad dge babacu'i las kyi sems bkod par gyur na/ ko'u shi ka de'i tsam

286b1(nyi khri): dpa' chen po rnams kyang yang dag pa'i skyon med par zhugs par gyur to/ / 'jug go// 'jug par 'gyur ro// dran med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so//

286b7(nyi khri): tshad med pa gzhan dag kyang rgya cher bstan to/ / ko'u shi ka rnam grangs des kyang rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di glegs dam du byas te klog pa dang
287a1(nyi khri): bri ba dang / kha ton du bya ba'i phyir gzhan la byin na de ni bsod nams ches mang du 'phel bar shes par bya'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ko'u shi ka shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
287a2(nyi khri): 'di las chos thams cad rgya cher bstan to/ / de dag yod pas rgyal rigs che zhing mtho ba rnams yod do// bram ze'i rigs che zhing mtho ba dang / khyim bdag gi rigs che zhing mtho ba
287a3(nyi khri): rnams yod do/ / rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha rnams yod do// sum cu rtsa gsum dang / mtshe ma dang / dga' ldan dang / 'phrul dga' dang / gzhan 'khrul dbang byed kyi lha
287a4(nyi khri): rnams dang / tshangs ras dang / tshangs lha nye phan dang / tshangs pa kun 'bar dang / tshangs chen dang / 'og min gyi bar gyi lha rnams dang / nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched dang
287a5(nyi khri): 'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched kyi bar gyi lha rnams yod do/ / pha rol tu phyin pa thams cad yod do// stong pa nyid thams cad yod do// byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun
287a6(nyi khri): yod do/ / 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams dang / bsam gtan rnams dang / tshad med pa rnams dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams yod do// rnam par thar pa brgyad
287a7(nyi khri): dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu yod do// rnam par thar pa'i sgo gsum dang / mngon par shes pa rnams yod do// ting nge 'dzin rnams dang / gzungs kyi sgo rnams yod
287b1(nyi khri): do/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams dang / mi 'jigs pa rnams dang / so so yang dag par rig pa rnams dang / byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos
287b2(nyi khri): ma 'dres pa rnams yod do/ / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du yod do// rgyun du zhugs pa dang / lan cig phyir 'ong ba dang / phyir mi 'ong ba dang / dgra bcom pa dang / rang sangs
287b3(nyi khri): rgyas rnams yod do/ / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams yod do// de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams yod do//
287b4(nyi khri): ko'u shi ka 'dzam du gling gi sems can rnams dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam la bkod pa dang / rang byang chub kyi bar la bkod pa lta zhog gi/ ke'u shi ka gleng bzhi pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi
287b5(nyi khri): sems can ji snyed pa de dag rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo la las dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam la rab tu bged na/ ko'u shi ka de ji snyam du sems/ rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo de'i
287b6(nyi khri): bsod nams de'i rgyus mang du 'phel lam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das mang ngo // bde bar gshegs pa mang ngo // bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ ko'u shi ka de bas rigs
287b7(nyi khri): kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di glegs bam la 'bri ba dang / klog pa dang / kha ton bya ba'i phyir gzhan la byin na bsod nams ches mang du 'phel lo//
288a1(nyi khri): de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ko'u shi ka de ni 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las skyes pa ni nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa'i chos thams
288a2(nyi khri): cad dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad do// ko'u shi ka gling chen po bzhi pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi sems can rnams dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam la bkod pa dang
288a3(nyi khri): rang byang chub kyi bar la bkod pa lta zhog gi/ ko'u shi ka stong gi 'jig rten gyi khams byung bu'i sems can ji snyed gcig yod pa de dag rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo la las dge ba bcu'i las
288a4(nyi khri): kyi lam la rab tu bkod/ rang byang chub kyi bar la rab tu bkod na/ ko'u shi ka de ji snyam du sems/ rig kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo de'i bsod nams de'i rgyus mang du 'phel lam
288a5(nyi khri): gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das mang ngo // bde bar gshegs pa mang ngo // bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ ko'u shi ka de bas rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs
288a6(nyi khri): kyi bu mo gang gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di glegs bam bklag pa'am/ bri ba dang / kha ton bya ba'i phyir gzhan la byin na bsod nams ches mang du 'phel lo//
288a7(nyi khri): ko'u shi ka stong gi 'jig rten gyi khams byung bu lta zhog gi/ ko'u shi ka stong gnyis pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'bring po'i sems can ji snyed pa de dag rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi
288b1(nyi khri): / bu mo la las dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam la rab tu bkod pa dang / rang byang chub kyi bar la rab tu bkod na/ ko'u shi ka de ji snyam du sems/ rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo de'i
288b2(nyi khri): bsod nams de'i rgyas mang du 'phel lam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das mang ngo // bde bar gshegadang pa mang ngo // bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ ko'u shi ka de bas
288b3(nyi khri): rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di glegs bamA la dri ba dang / klog pa dang / kha ton bya ba'i phyir gzhan la byin na bsod nams ches mang du
288b4(nyi khri): 'phel lo/ / koT shi ka stong gnyis pa 'jig rten gyi khams 'bring po lta zhog gi/ ko'u shi ka stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi sems can ji snyed pa de dag rigs kyi bu
288b5(nyi khri): ma rigs kyi bu mo la las dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam la rab tu bkod pa dang / rang byang chub kyi bar la rab tu bkod na/ ko'u shi ka de ji snyam du sems/ rigs kyi bu 'am
288b6(nyi khri): rigs kyi bu mo de'i bsod nams de'i rgyus mang du 'phel lam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das mang ngo // bde bar gshegs pa mang ngo // bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa
288b7(nyi khri): ko'u shi ka de bas rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di glegs bam la dri ba dang / klog pa dang / kha ton bya ba'i phyir gzhan la byin na
289a1(nyi khri): bsod nams ches mdad phel lo/ / ko'u shi ka stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams lta zhog gi// ko'u shi ka phyogs btsu phyogasar/
289a2(nyi khri): shing 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na sems can ji snyed cig yod pa de dag rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo la las dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam la rab tu bkod
289a3(nyi khri): pa dang / rang byang chub kyi bar la rab tu bkod na/ ko'u shi ka de ji snyam du sems/ rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo de'i bsod nams de'i rgyus mang du 'phel

289a6(nyi khri): ci'i phyir zhe na/ ko shi ka de ni 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di las zag pa med pa'i chos rnams rgya cher bstan to// de dag la bslabs shing rigs kyi bu
289a7(nyi khri): 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo de dag yang dag pa'i skyon med par zhugs par gyur to// 'jug go// 'jug par 'gyur ro// dgra bcom pa nyid kyi bar du thob par gyur to//
289b1(nyi khri): 'thob bo// thob par 'gyur ro// rang byang chub thob par gyur ro// 'thob bo// thob par 'gyur ro// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyang
289b2(nyi khri): byang chub sems dpa'i skyon med par zhugs par 'gyur to/ / 'jug go// 'jug par 'gyur ro// bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs pa rasangs rgyas so//
289b3(nyi khri): mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o// mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro// ko'u shi ka zag pa med pa'i chos de rab kyang gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste
289b4(nyi khri): pha rol tu phyin pa rnams dang / nang stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar dang / byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun dang
289b5(nyi khri): 'phags pa'i bden pa dang / bsam gtan dang / tshad med pa dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad dang /
289b6(nyi khri): thar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo gsum dang / mngon par shes pa drug dang / ting nge 'dzin thams cad dang / gzungs kyi sgo thams
289b7(nyi khri): cad dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi bar dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos tshad med pa'i bar gzhan
290a1(nyi khri): dag kyang rgya cher bstan / / ko ru shis rnam grangs des pang rigs kyi su'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di thugs pam du'is
290a2(nyi khri): shing klog pa dang / bri ba dang / kha ton du bya ba'i phyir gzhan la byin na/ de bas de'i bsod nams ches mang du 'phes par shes par bya'o// de ci'i phyir ne na
290a3(nyi khri): ko shi ka de ni 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di las chos thams cad rgya cher bstan te/ de dag yod pas rgyal rigs che zhing mtho ba dang / bram ze'i
290a4(nyi khri): rigs che zhing mtho ba dang / khyim bdag gis rigs che zhing mtho ba dang rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha rnams yod do// sum cu rtsa gsum dang
290a5(nyi khri): batshe ma dang / dga' ldan dang / 'phrul dga' dang / gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha rnams dang / tshangs ris dang / tshangs
290a6(nyi khri): la nye phan dang / tshangs pa kun 'khor dang / tshangs chen dang / 'og min gyi bar gyi lha rnams dang / nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched dang
290a7(nyi khri): 'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched kyi bar gyi lha rnams yod do/ / pha rol tu phyin pa rnams yod do// nang stong pa nyid yod do// dngos po med pa'i ngo sa
290b1(nyi khri): stong pa kyi dus da/ / kyang chum kyi thams thatshas thams bdan me / sangs rgyas kyi chos su 'dres pa bcod kyad kyi bar na ma // @

290b3(nyi khri): lan cig phyir 'ong ba dang / phyi mi 'ong ba dang / dgra bcom pa dang / rang byang chub rnams yod do// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen

292a1(nyi khri): @#/ kun chub par byed pa dang / tshul bzhin du yid la byed na de'i bsod nams ches mang du 'phel gyi/ 'dzam bu gling gi sems can rnams dang / stong gsum gyi stong chen

292b1(nyi khri): 'chang ba dang / klog pa dang / tshul bzhin du yid la byed pa'o// gnyis la spyod pa'ang ma yin/ mi gnyis pa la spyod pa'ang ma yin pa'i blos/ dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi

292b6(nyi khri): bar du tshul bzhin du yid la byed pa'o/ / ko'u shi ka gzhan yang rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhig shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di gzhan la rnam grangs du mar rgyu
292b7(nyi khri): cher rjod cing ston la/ 'chad cing 'grel pa dang / rnam par 'byed cing gsal bar byed la/ yang dag par ston cing / de'i don gtan la bab par ston par byed na/ ko'u shi ka de la shes rab kyi
293a1(nyi khri): rol tu phyin pa'i don ni 'di yin te/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni gnyis su lta ba ma yin/ gnyis su med par lta ba ma yin/ mtshan mar ma yin/ mtshan
293a2(nyi khri): ma med par ma yin/ blang bar ma yin/ dor bar ma yin/ dbri bar ma yin/ bsnan par ma yin/ kun nas nyon mongs par ma yin// rnam par byang bar ma yin/ skye bar ma yin//
293a3(nyi khri): 'gag par ma yin/ gzung bar ma yin/ mi gzung bar ma yin/ len par ma yin/ 'dor bar ma yin/ gnas par ma yin/ mi gnas par ma yin/ yang dag par ma yin/
293a4(nyi khri): log par ma yin/ ldan par ma yin/ mi ldan par ma yin/ 'dre bar ma yin/ mi 'dre bar ma yin/ rkyen du ma yin/ rkyeni med par ma yin/ chos su ma yin/ chos ma yin pa ma yin/
293a5(nyi khri): de bzhin nyid du ma yin/ de bzhin nyid ma yin par ma yin/ yang dag pa'i mthar ma yin/ yang dag pa'i mthar ma yin par yang ma yin te/ 'di ni gnyis su med pa'i don to// rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs
293a6(nyi khri): kyi bu mo gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di gzhan la rgya cher rjod cing ston la/ 'chad cing 'grel pa dang / rnam par 'byed cing gsal bar byed la/ yang dag par ston par byed cing / de'i don gtan la bab par ston na/

293b1(nyi khri): yang rigs kyi zlum/ rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhig/ bdag nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di 'dzin cing kun chub par byed de/ 'chang zhing klog la tshul bzhin du yid la byed cing / gzhan la'ang rgya cher rjod cing ljon la/

293b3(nyi khri): bsod nams ni shin tu mang du 'phel lo/ / brgya byin gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa de ltar don dang ldan la/ yi ge dang ldan par
293b4(nyi khri): bstan par bgyi ba 'am/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ ko'u shi ka rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo des shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa de ltar don dang ldan la/ yi ge dang ldan par
293b5(nyi khri): bstan par bya ste/ ko'u shi ka de ltar ston pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo de ni bsong dpas kyi phung po tshad med grangs med pa dang ldan par 'gyur ro// ko'u shi ka gal te rigs kyi bu
293b6(nyi khri): 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo la las phyogs bcu kun gyi phyogs re re zhing / de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas tshad med grangs med pa dag la nam 'tshe'i bar du me tog
293b7(nyi khri): dang 'phreng ba dang / spos dang / byug pa dang / phye ma dang / na bza' dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan dang / sil snyan sna tshogs dang / bde ba'i yo byad thams
294a1(nyi khri): cad kyis rim gror byas pa dang / bkur stir byas pa dang / bsti stang du byas pa dang / mchod par byas pa bas/ ko'u shika rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi dri mo la la zhig
294a2(nyi khri): gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di gzhan la rgya cher don dang ldan/ yi ge dang ldan par rnam grangs du mar rjod de bstan pa dang / bshad de bkrol zhing rnam par phye ste gsal ba dang / yang dag par
