294a6(nyi khri): mo gang la las bskal pa tshad med grangs med par dmigs pa'i tshul gyis sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang
294a7(nyi khri): brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spad pa bas ni/ gang la las shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di don dang
294b1(nyi khri): ldan yi ge dang ldan par mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis gzhan la rgya cher rjod cing ston la 'chad cing rnam par 'god pa dang / rab tu 'god cing rnam par 'byed la gsal bar byed cing
294b2(nyi khri): yang dag par ston par byed na/ de'i bsod nams ches mang du 'phel lo// de la mi dmigs pa ni 'di yin te// ko'u shi ka 'di la byang chub sems dpa' dmigs pa'i tshul
294b3(nyi khri): gyis sbyin pa gtong zhing / 'di snyam du bdag ni sbyin pa gtong ngo // sbyin pa ni 'di gtong ngo // 'di la sbyin par bya'o snyam na/ des sbyin pa de ltar btang bas sbyin pa nyid du
294b4(nyi khri): 'gyur gyi/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin no// bdag ni tshul khrims srung ngo // tshul khrims ni 'di srung ngo snyam na/ de sa tshul khrim so de ltar bsrungs pas tshul khrims nyid
294b5(nyi khri): du 'gyur gyi/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin no// bdag ni bzod pa sgom mo// bzod pa ni 'di sgom mo snyam na// des bzod pa de ltar bsgoms pas bzod pa nyid
294b6(nyi khri): du 'gyur gyi/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin no// bdag ni brtson 'grus rtsom mo// 'di'i don du brtson 'grus brtsam mo snyam na/ des brtson 'grus de ltar brtsams pas
294b7(nyi khri): brtson 'grus nyid du 'gyur gyi/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin no// bdag ni bsam gtan la snyoms par 'jug go// bsam gtan 'di la mnyam par gzhag go snyam na
295a1(nyi khri): nges bsam gtan la de ltar mnyam par bzhag pas bsam gtan nyid du 'gyur gyi/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin no// bdag ni shes rab sgom mo//
295a2(nyi khri): shes rab ni 'ang sbom mo saman/ des shes rab de ltar bsgoms pas shes rab nyid du gyu / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin no// oT shi ka rigs kyi sa'am/ rigs kyi
295a3(nyi khri): mo de ltar dmigs pa la spyod pas ni/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par mi 'gyur ro// tshul khrims dang / bzod pa dang / brtson 'grus dang / bsam gtan dang
295a4(nyi khri): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par mi 'gyur ro/ / brgya byin gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ji ltar spyad na
295a5(nyi khri): sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur/ / ji ltar spyad na tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur/ ji ltar spyad na bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su
295a6(nyi khri): rdzogs par 'gyur/ ji ltar spyad na brtson 'grus kyi pha rol phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur/ ji ltar spyad na bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur// ji
295a7(nyi khri): ltar spyad na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsas pa/ ko'u shi ka 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sbyin
295b1(nyi khri): gtong ba'i tshe/ yongs su gtong ba mi dmigs/ sbyin pa dang / len pa mi dmigs so// tshul khrims srung ba'i tshe/ tshul khrims dang / tshul khrims yang dag par blang bar mi dmigs
295b2(nyi khri): so/ / bzod pa sgom pa'i tshe/ bzod pa dang / bzod pa sgom par mi dmigs so// brtson 'grus rtsom pa'i tshe/ brtsos 'grus dang / brtson 'grus rtsom par mi dmigs so//
295b3(nyi khri): bsam gtan la snyoms par 'jug pa'i tshe/ bsam gtan dang / bsam gtan sgom par mi dmigs so// shes rab sgom pa'i tshe/ shes rab dang / shes rab sgom pa dang
295b4(nyi khri): shes rab dang ldan pa mi dmigs so/ / ko'u shi ka de ltar sdod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos ni/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro//
295b5(nyi khri): tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu yin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phan pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu
295b6(nyi khri): phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro/ / ko'u shi ka rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo de ltar khong du chud pa med par shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa don dang ldan/ yi ge dang ldan par
295b7(nyi khri): bstan par bya'o/ / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / sbyin
296a1(nyi khri): pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa bstan par bya'o/ / de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ko'u shi ka ma 'ongs pa'i dus kyi rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo la la byang chub sems dpa'i theg/
296a2(nyi khri): pa pa rnams la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i gzugs brnyan ston pa 'byung ste/ der rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu zhugs
296a3(nyi khri): pa de dag gis kyang gzugs brnyan de thos nas/ lam ston par 'gyur te/ de dag la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di don dang ldan yi ge dang ldan par bstan par bya'o//
296a4(nyi khri): brgya byin gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i gzugs brnyan gang lags// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// ko'u shi ka/
296a5(nyi khri): 'di ltar rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bstan to snyam zhing / de dag gzugs brnyan ston par byed pa'o// brgya byin gyis gsol pa
296a6(nyi khri): bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo de dang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i gzugs brnyan ston pa lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa
296a7(nyi khri): ko'u shi ka 'di la rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ston par byed pa'i tshe/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i gzugs brnyan ston te
296b1(nyi khri): de la 'di ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i gzugs brnyan te/ 'di ltar gzugs mi rtag go zhes bya bar ston/ gzugs sdug bsngal le zhes bya ba dang / bdag med do zhes bya ba
296b2(nyi khri): dang / mi sdug go zhes bya bar ston/ tshe pa dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa mi rtag go zhes bya bar ston/ tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed
296b3(nyi khri): dang / rnam par shes pa sdug bsngal lo zhes bya ba dang / bdag med do zhes bya ba dang / mi sdug go zhes bya bar ston cing / 'di skad du gang de ltar sbed pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
296b4(nyi khri): la spyod do zhes rjod de/ su la bstan pa de dag kyang gzugs mi rtag ces bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro// gzugs sdug bsngal zhes bya ba dang / bdag medo ces bya ba dang / mi sdug
296b5(nyi khri): ces bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro/ / tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa mi rtag ces bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro// tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang
296b6(nyi khri): 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa sdug bsngal lo zhes bya ba dang / bdag med ces bya ba dang / mi sdug ces bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro// de ltar de dag gzugs mi rtag ge/
296b7(nyi khri): zhes bya bar rtog pa dang / gzugs sdug bsngal lo zhes bya ba dang / bdag med do zhes bya ba dang / mi sdug go zhes bya ba dang / tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam pa
297a1(nyi khri): shes pa mi rtag ge zhes bya ba dang / tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa sdug bsngal lo zhes bya ba dang / bdag med do zhes bya ba dang //
297a2(nyi khri): mi sdug go zhes bya bar rtog pas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i gzugs brnyan la spyod par 'gyur ro// mig mi rtag go zhes bya bar ston/ mi sdug bsngal lo zhes bya ba dang / bdag med de zhes
297a3(nyi khri): bya ba dang / mi sdug go zhes bya bar ston/ rna ba dang / sna dang / lce dang / lus dang / yid mi rtag go zhes bya bar ston/ rna ba dang / sna dang / lce dang / lus dang / yang sdug bsngal la
297a4(nyi khri): zhes bya ba dang / bdag med do zhes bya ba dang / mi sdug go zhes bya bar ston/ gzugs mi rtag go zhes bya bar ston/ gzugs sdug bsngal lo zhes bya ba dang / bdag med do zhes bya ba dang
297a5(nyi khri): mi sdug go zhes bya bar ston/ sgra dang / dri dang / ro dang / reg bya dang / chos mi rtag go zhes bya bar ston/ sgra dang / dri dang / ro dang / reg bya dang / ches sdug bsngal le zhes bya ba
297a6(nyi khri): dang / bdag med do zhes bya ba dang / mi sdug go zhes bya bar ston/ mig gi rnam par shes pa mi rtag go zhes bya bar ston/ mig gi rnam par shes pa sdug bsngal lo zhes bya ba dang / bdag med de
297a7(nyi khri): zhes bya ba dang / mi sdug go zhes bya bar sten/ rna ba'i rnam par shes pa dang / sna'i rnam par shes pa dang / lce'i rnam par shes pa dang / lus kyi rnam par shes pa dang / yid kyi rnam par shes
297b1(nyi khri): gapa mi rtag ge zhes bya bar ston/ rna ba'i rnam par shes pa dang / sna'i rnam par shes pa dang / lce'i rnam par shes pa dang / lus kyi rnam par shes pa dang / yid kyi rnam par shes pa
297b2(nyi khri): sdug bsngal lo zhes bya ba dang / bdag med do zhes bya ba dang / mi sdug go zhes bya bar ston mig gi 'dus te reg pa mi rtag go zhes bya bar ston/ mig gi 'dus te reg pa sdug bskul
297b3(nyi khri): lo zhes bya ba dang / bdag med do zhes bya ba dang / mi sdug go zhes bya bar ston/ rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa dang / sna'i 'dus te reg pa dang / lce'i 'dus te reg pa dang / lus kyi 'dus
297b4(nyi khri): te reg pa dang / yid kyi 'dus te reg pa mi rtag go zhes bya bar ston/ rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa dang / sna'i 'dus te reg pa dang / lce'i 'dus te reg pa dang / lus kyi 'dus te reg pa dang
297b5(nyi khri): yid kyi 'dus te reg pa sdug bsngal lo zhes bya ba dang / bdag med do zhes bya ba dang / mi sdug go zhes bya bar ston/ mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba mi rtag go zhes bya bar ston
297b6(nyi khri): mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba sdug bsngal lo zhes bya ba dang / bdag med do zhes bya ba dang / mi sdug go zhes bya bar ston/ rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dang / sna'i 'dus
297b7(nyi khri): 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dang / lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dang / lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dang / yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba mi rtag go zhes bya/
298a1(nyi khri): par ston/ rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tsho ba dang / sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dang / lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dang / lus kyi
298a2(nyi khri): 'dus te reg pa rkyen gyis tshor ba dang / yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba sdug bsngal lo zhes bya ba dang / bdag med do zhes bya ba dang / mi sdug go zhes bya bar ston/ sa'i khams
298a3(nyi khri): mi rtag go zhes bya bar ston/ sa'i khams sdug bsngal lo zhes bya ba dang / bdag med do zhes bya ba dang / mi sdug go zhes bya bar ston/ chu'i khams dang / me'i khams dang / rlung gi
298a4(nyi khri): khams dang / nam mkha'i khams dang / rnam par shes pa'i khams mi rtag go zhes bya bar ston/ chu'i khams dang / me'i khams dang / rlung gi khams dang / nam mkha'i khams dang
298a5(nyi khri): rnam par shes pa'i khams sdug bsngal ro zhes bya ba dang / bdag med do zhes bya ba dang / mi sdug go zhes bya bar ston/ ma rig pa mi rtag go zhes bya bar ston/ ma rig pa sdug bsngal lo zhes bya ba dang
298a6(nyi khri): bdag med do zhes bya ba dang / mi sdug go zhes bya bar ston/ 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa dang / ming dang gzugs dang / skye mched drug dang / reg pa dang / tshor ba dang
298a7(nyi khri): sred pa dang / len pa dang / srid pa dang / skye ba dang / rga shi mi rtag go zhes bya bar sngon/ 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa dang / ming dang gzugs dang / skye mched drug dang / reg pa dang /
298b1(nyi khri): tshor ba dang / sred pa dang / len pa dang / srid pa dang / skye ba dang / rga shi sdug bsngal lo zhes bya ba dang / bdag med do zhes bya ba dang / mi sdug go zhes bya bar ston/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu
298b2(nyi khri): phyin pa mi rtag go zhes bya bar ston/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa sdug bsngal lo zhes bya ba dang / bdag med ngo zhes bya ba dang / mi sdug go zhes bya bar ston/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /
298b3(nyi khri): bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mi rtag go zhes bya bar ston//
298b4(nyi khri): tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol
298b5(nyi khri): tu phyin pa sdug bsngal lo zhes bya ba dang / bdag med do zhes bya ba dang / mi sdug go zhes bya bar ston/ nang stong pa nyid mi rtag go zhes bya bar ston/ nang stong pa nyid sdug bsngal lo zhes
298b6(nyi khri): bya ba dang / bdag med do zhes bya ba dang / mi sdug go zhes bya bar ston/ dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar du mi rtag go zhes bya bar ston/ dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa
298b7(nyi khri): nyid kyi bar du sdug bsngal lo zhes bya ba dang / bdag med do zhes bya ba dang / mi sdug go zhes bya bar ston/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams mi rtag go zhes bya bar ston/ dran pa nye bar
299a1(nyi khri): gzhag pa rnams sdug bsngal lo zhes bya ba dang / bdag med do zhes bya ba dang / mi sdug ge zhes bya bar ston/ yang dag par spong ba dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang /
299a2(nyi khri): dbang po dang / stobs dang / byang chub kyi yan lag dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa mi rtag go zhes bya ba dang / yang dag par spyod pa dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang
299a3(nyi khri): dbang po dang / stobs dang / byang chub kyi yan lag dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa sdug bsngal lo zhes bya ba dang / bdag med do zhes bya ba dang / mi sdug go zhes bya bar
299a4(nyi khri): ston/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams kyi bar du mi rtag go zhes bya bar ston/ sangs rgyas kyi chos mi 'dres pa rnams kyi bar du sdug bsngal lo zhes bya ba dang / bdag med do zhes bya ba dang /
299a5(nyi khri): mi sdug go zhes bya bar ston/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa'i dgyi bar du mi rtag go zhes bya bar ston/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa 'od kyi bar du sdug bsngal le zhes bya ba dang / bdag
299a6(nyi khri): med do zhes bya ba dang / mi sdug go zhes bya bar sten cing / 'di skad du gang de ltar spyod pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do zhes bya bar brjod de/ su la bstan pa de dag kyang gzugs
299a7(nyi khri): rtag ces bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro/ / gzugs sdug bsngal so zhes bya ba dang / bdag med ces bya ba dang / mi sdug ces bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du mi pa
299b1(nyi khri): ces bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro/ / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du sdug bsngal lo zhes bya ba dang / bdag med ces bya ba dang / mi sdug ces bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro// de ltar de
299b2(nyi khri): dag rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid mi rtag go zhes bya bar rtog pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid sdug bsngal lo zhes bya bar rtog pa dang / bdag med de zhes bya bar rtog pa dang
299b3(nyi khri): mi sdug go zhes bya bar rtog pas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gzugs brnyan la spyod par 'gyur te/ ko'u shi ka de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i gzugs brnyan no//
299b4(nyi khri): ko'u shi ka gzhan yang rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo de dag shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ston na 'di ltar ston te/ tshur rigs kyi bu shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa sgoms shig
299b5(nyi khri): khyod kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa sgoms dang / byang chub sems dpa'i sa dang po la gnas par 'gyur ro// sa bcu'i bar la gnas par 'gyur ro// tshur rigs kyi bu bsam gtan
299b6(nyi khri): gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa sgoms shig/
299b7(nyi khri): khyod kyis sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa sgoms dang / byang chub sems dpa'i sa dang po la gnas par 'gyur ro// sa bcu'i bar la gnas par 'gyur ro zhes de'ang mtshan ma'i tshul lam/ dmigs
300a1(nyi khri): pa'i tshul gyis ston te/ de'ang gnyis ka'i 'du shes kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgoms par 'gyur te/ ko'u shi ka de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i
300a2(nyi khri): gzugs brnyan no/ / ko'u shi ka gzhan yang rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo de dag byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo dgal shes
300a3(nyi khri): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ltar ston te/ tshur rigs kyi bu khyod kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa sgoms shig/ rigs kyi bu khyod kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa sgoms dang / nyan thos
300a4(nyi khri): kyis las 'da' bar 'gyur ro/ / rang sangs rgyas kyi sa las 'da' bar 'gyur ro// zhes ston par 'gyur te/ ko'u shi ka de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i gzugs brnyan to//
300a5(nyi khri): ko'u shi ka gzhan yang rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo de dag byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo de dag la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ston na
300a6(nyi khri): 'di ltar ston te/ tshur rigs kyi bu khyod kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di sgoms shig/ rigs kyi bu khyod kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa sgoms dang / byang chub sems dpa'i
300a7(nyi khri): skyon med par 'jug par 'gyur ro/ / mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob par 'gyur ro// khyod kyis de ltar mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i mngon par shes pa sa
300b1(nyi khri): gnas te/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams la rim gro dang / bkur sti dang / bsti stang dang / mchod par byed cing / sangs
300b2(nyi khri): rgyas kyi zhing nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing du 'gro bar 'gyur ro zhes rigs kyi bu dang / rigs kyi bu mo de dag byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa'i rigs kyi bu dang / rigs kyi bu mo de dag la sngon na 'di
300b3(nyi khri): ltar ston te/ rigs kyi bu dag su shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di 'dzin cing 'chang ba dang / klog cing kun chub par byed pa dang / tshul bzhin du yid la byed pa de ni bsod nams kyi phung po
300b4(nyi khri): tshad med grangs med dpag tu med par 'gyur ro zhes zer te/ de ltar ston pa'i rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i gzugs brnyan ston to//
300b5(nyi khri): ko'u shi ka gzhan yang rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo de dag byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am/ rags kyi bu mo de dag la 'di ltar ston te/ tshur rigs
300b6(nyi khri): kyi bu khyod kyis 'das pa dang / ma byon pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyis thugs dang po bskyed pa nas/ phung
300b7(nyi khri): po ma lus par mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings su yongs su mya las 'das pa'i bar gyi dge ba'i rtsa ba gang ji snyed pa de dag thams cad gcig tu bsdus te/ rjes su dga' bar gyis la
301a1(nyi khri): bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su sngos shig ces/ rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo de dag de ltar ston cing / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i gzugs brnyan ston to/
301a2(nyi khri): brgya byin gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das ji ltar ston na/ rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo de dag byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs bu mo de dag la
301a3(nyi khri): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i gzugs brnyan mi ston pa lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ ko'u shi ka 'di la rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo dag byang chub sems dpa'i
301a4(nyi khri): theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo de dag la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ltar ston te/ tshur rigs kyi bu khyod kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa sgoms shig/ gzugs
301a5(nyi khri): mi rtag ces bya bar yang dag par rjes su ma lta zhig/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gzugs ni rang bzhin gyis stong ste/ gzugs kyi rang bzhin gang yin pa de ni dngos po med pa'o// dngos
301a6(nyi khri): po med pa gang yin pa de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gang yin pa de la ni gzugs rtag ces bya ba 'am/ gzugs mi rtag ces bya bar mi dmigs so//
301a7(nyi khri): de la gzugs nyid kyang med na rtag pa'am/ mi rtag pa lta ga la yod ces ston te/ ko'u shi ka de ltar ston pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
301b1(nyi khri): pa'i gzugs parnyan mi ston to/ / ko'u shi ka gzhan yang rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo de dag byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu
301b2(nyi khri): mo de dag la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ltar ston te/ tshur rigs kyi bu khyod kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa sgoms shig/ tshor ba mi rtag ces bya bar yang dag par rjes su
301b3(nyi khri): ma lta zhig/ 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa mi rtag ces bya bar yang dag par rjes su ma lta zhig/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rnam par shes pa ni rang bzhin gyis
301b4(nyi khri): stong ste/ rnam par shes pa'i rang bzhin gang yin pa de ni dngos po med pa'o// dngos po med pa gang yin pa de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gang
301b5(nyi khri): yin pa de la ni rnam par shes pa rtag ces bya ba 'am/ mi rtag ces bya bar mi dmigs so// de la rnam par shes pa nyid kyang med na rtag pa 'am/ mi rtag pa lta ga la yod ces
301b6(nyi khri): ston te/ ko'u shi ka de ltar ston pa'i rigs kyi bu dang / rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i gzugs brnyan mi ston to// ko'u shi ka
301b7(nyi khri): gzhan yang rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo de dag byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo de dag la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ltar
302a1(nyi khri): kon te/ tshur rigs kyi bu khyod kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa sgoms shig/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyer pa nyid kyi bar du mi rtag ces bya bar yang dag par rje
302a2(nyi khri): su pa lta zhig/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ni rang bzhin gyis stong ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi rang bzhin gang yin pa de ni dngos po med pa'o//
302a3(nyi khri): dngos po med pa gang yin pa de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gang yin pa de la ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rtag ces bya ba 'am
302a4(nyi khri): mi rtag ces bya bar mi dmigs so/ / de la rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang med na rtag pa 'am/ mi rtag pa lta ga la yod ces ston te/ ko'u shi ka de ltar ston pa'i rigs
302a5(nyi khri): kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i gzugs brnyan mi ston to// ko'u shi ka gzhan yang rigs kyi bu dang / rigs kyi bu mo de dag
302a6(nyi khri): byang chub sems dpa'i thegs pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo de dag la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ltar ston te/ tshur rigs kyi bu khyod kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
302a7(nyi khri): pa sgoms shig/ chos gang las kyang yongs su 'da' bar ma byed cig/ gang la'ang gnas par ma byed cig/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyir pa
302b1(nyi khri): la chos gang las 'da' bar bya ba 'am/ gang la gnas par bya ba'i chos de lta bu med do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kaT shi ka de ni 'di ltar chos thabs cad ni rang bzhin gyis stong ste/ rang /
302b2(nyi khri): bzhin gyis stong pa'i chos gang yin pa de la ni dngos po med pa'o// dngos po med pa gang yin pa de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gang yin pa de la ni
302b3(nyi khri): blang bar bya ba 'am/ dor bar bya ba 'am/ bskyed par bya ba 'am/ 'gag par bya ba'i chos gang yang med do zhes ston ste/ ko'u shi ka de ltar ston pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu/
302b4(nyi khri): mo de dag ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i gzugs brnyan mi ston to// ko'u shi ka de bas na rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mos de ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i don bstan par bya ste/
302b5(nyi khri): ko'u shi ka de ltar ston pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo de dag gi bsod nams kyi phung po ni ches mang du 'phel gyi/ rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo snga ma dag gi ni ma yin no//
302b6(nyi khri): ko'u shi ka gzhan yang 'dzam bu gling gi sems can ji snyed pa de dag rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo la la zhig gis rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu la bkod na/ ko'u shi
302b7(nyi khri): ka de ji snyam du sems/ rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo de'i bsod nams de'i rgyus mang du 'phel lam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das mang ngo // bde bar gshegs pa mang ngo //
303a1(nyi khri): bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ koru shi ka de bas kyang rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di don dang ldan/ yi ge dang ldan par bzhan/
303a2(nyi khri): largya cher brjod de bstan pa dang / bshad de bkrol zhing rnam par bye ste gsal ba dang / yang dag par bstan pa byas pa dang / 'di skad du tshur rigs kyi bu khyod kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zung zhig/ kun
303a3(nyi khri): chub par gyis shig/ chongs shig/ lhogs shika/ tshul bzhin du yid la gyis shig/ ji ltar bstan pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la nan tan du gyis shig ces bsgo na/ ches de'i bsod nams
303a4(nyi khri): mang du 'phel lo/ / de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ko'u shi ka shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di las rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu rnams yod par 'gyur ro// ko'u shi ka 'dzam bu gling gi
303a5(nyi khri): sems can lta'ang zhog/ gling chen po bzhi pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi sems can lta'ang zhog/ stong gi 'jig rten gyi khams byung bu'i sems can lha'ang zhog/ stong gnyis pa'i 'jig
303a6(nyi khri): rten gyi khams 'bring po'i sems can lta'ang zhog/ stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi sems can rgyud du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu la bkod pa lta'ang zhog gi/ ko'u shi ka phyogs
303a7(nyi khri): bcu'i phyogs re re zhing gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams kyi sems can ji sbed pa de dag rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo la la zhig gis rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu la bkod na/ ko'u
303b1(nyi khri): shi ka de ji snyam du sems/ rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo de'i bsod nams de'i rgyus mang du 'phel lam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das mang ngo // bde bar gshegs pa mang ngo //
303b2(nyi khri): bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ ko'u shi ka de bas kyang rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di don dang ldan/ yi ge dang ldan par gzhan la
303b3(nyi khri): rgya cher brjod de bstan pa dang / bshad de bkrol zhing rnam par phye ste gsal ba dang / yang dag par bstan pa byas pa dang / 'di skad du tshur rigs kyi bu khyod kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu
303b4(nyi khri): phyin pa zung zhig/ kun chub par gyis shig/ chongs shig/ lhogs shig/ tshul bzhin du yid la gyis shig/ ji ltar bstan pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
303b5(nyi khri): la nan tan du gyis shig ces bsgo na/ ches de'i bsod nams mang du 'phel lo// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ko'u shi ka shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di las rgyun du zhugs pa rnams
303b6(nyi khri): yod par 'gyur ro/ / ko'u shi ka gzhan yang 'dzam bu gling gi sems can ji snyed pa de dag rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo la la zhig gis lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras
303b7(nyi khri): bu la bkod/ phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / dgra bcom pa nyid dang / rang byang chub la rab tu bkod na/ ko'u shi ka de ji snyam du sems/ rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi/
304a1(nyi khri): bu mo de'i bsod nams de'i rgyus mang du 'phel lam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das mang ngo // bde bar gshegs pa mang ngo // bcom ldan 'das kyis
304a2(nyi khri): bka' stsal pa/ ko'u shi ka de bas kyang rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di don dang ldan yi ge dang ldan par gzhan la rgya cher brjod de bstan
304a3(nyi khri): pa dang / bshad de bkrol zhing rnam par phye ste gsal ba dang / yang dag par bstan pa byas pa dang / 'di skad du tshur rigs kyi bu khyod kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zung zhig
304a4(nyi khri): kun chub par gyis shig/ chongs shig/ lhogs shig/ tshul bzhin du yid la gyis shig/ ji ltar bstan pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la nan tan du gyis shig ces bsgo na
304a5(nyi khri): ches de'i bsod nams mang du 'phel lo/ / de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ko'u shi ka shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di las lan cig phyir 'ong ba dang / phyir mi 'ong ba dang / dgra bcom pa dang /
304a6(nyi khri): rang sangs rgyas rnams yod par 'gyur ro// ko'u shi ka 'dzam bu gling gi sems can thams cad lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang /
304a7(nyi khri): dgra bcom pa nyid dang / rang byang chub la bkod pa lta'ang zhog/ gling chen po bzhi pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi sems can lta'ang zhog/ stong gi 'jig rten gyi khams byung bu'i sems can lta'ang
304b1(nyi khri): zhog/ stong gnyis kyi 'jig rteran gyi khams 'bring ba'i sems can lnga'ang nog// stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi sems can lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / byir
304b2(nyi khri): mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / dgra bcom pa nyid dang / rang byang chub la bkod pa lnga'ang zhog gi/ phyogs bcu'i phyogs re re zhing gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi
304b3(nyi khri): khams kyi sems can ji snyed pa de dag rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo la la zhig gis lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang /
304b4(nyi khri): dgra bcom pa nyid dang / rang byang chub la bkod na/ ko'u shi ka de ji snyam du sems rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo de'i bsod nams de'i rgyus mang du 'phel
304b5(nyi khri): lam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das mang ngo // bde bar gshegs pa mang ngo // bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ ko'u shi ka de bas kyang
304b6(nyi khri): rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di don dang ldan/ yi ge dang ldan par gzhan la rgya cher brjod de bstan pa dang / bshad de bkrol zhing rnam par
304b7(nyi khri): phye ste gsal ba dang / yang dag par bstan pa byas pa dang 'di skad du tshur rigs kyi bu khyod kyis shes rab kyis pha rol tu phyin pa zung zhig/ kun chub par gyis shig/
305a1(nyi khri): chongs shig/ lhogs shig/ tshul bzhin du yid la gyis shig/ ji ltar bstan pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la nan tan du gyis shig ces bsgo na/ ches
305a2(nyi khri): de'i bsod nams mang du 'phel lo/ / de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ko'u shi ka shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di las lan cig phyir 'ong ba dang / phyir mi 'ong ba dang / dgra bcom pa dang /
305a3(nyi khri): rang sangs rgyas rnams yod par 'gyur ro// ko'u shi ka gzhan yang 'dzam bu gling gi sems can ji snyed pa de dag rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo la la zhig gis bla na med pa
305a4(nyi khri): yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yang dag par bskul ba byas na/ ko'u shi ka de ji snyam du sems// rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo de'i bsod nams de'i rgyus mang du
305a5(nyi khri): 'phel lam gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das mang ngo // bde bar gshegs pa mang ngo // bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ ko'u shi ka de bas kyang rigs
305a6(nyi khri): kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di don dang ldan// yi ge dang ldan par gzhan la rgya cher brjod de bstan pa dang / bshad de bkrol zhing rnam par phye
305a7(nyi khri): ste gsal ba dang / yang dag par bstan pa byas pa dang / 'di skad du tshur rigs kyi bu khyod kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zung zhig/ kun chub par gyis shig/ chongs
305b1(nyi khri): shig/ lhogs shig/ tshul bzhin du yid la gyis shig/ ji ltar bstan pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la nan tan du gyis shig/ rigs kyi bu khyod kyi sa gang gi
305b2(nyi khri): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ji ltar bstan pa la nan tan byed pa de'i tshe/ / rigs kyi bu khyod shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la slob par 'gyur ro// rigs kyi bu khyod gang gi
305b3(nyi khri): tshe/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la slob par gyur pa de'i tshe/ khyod kyis thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi chos rnams thob par 'gyur ro// gang gi tshe khyod kyis thams cad
305b4(nyi khri): mkhyen pa nyid kyi chos rnams thob par gyur pa de'i rtse khyod kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa de bas kyang yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro/ / gang gi tshe khyod
305b5(nyi khri): kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa de bas kyang yongs su rdzogs par gyur pa de'i tshe/ khyod bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o
305b6(nyi khri): zhes bsgo na/ ches de'i bsod nams mang du 'phel lo// de ni'i phyir zhe na/ ko'u shi ka 'di las byung ba ni sems dang po bskyed pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems
305b7(nyi khri): dpa' chen po rnams so/ / ko'u shi ka 'dzam bu gling gi sems can bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yang dag par bskul ba byas pa lta'ang zhog/ gling chen
306a1(nyi khri): po pa bzhi'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi sems can la'ang zhog/ stong gi 'jig rten gyi khams byung bu'i sems can lta'ang zhog/ stong gnyis kyi 'jig rten gyi khams 'bring
306a2(nyi khri): po'i sems can lta'ang zhog/ stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi sems can ji snyed pa de dag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yang dag par bskul ba byas pa lta'ang
306a3(nyi khri): zhog gi/ ko'u shi ka phyogs bcu'i phyogs re re zhing gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams kyi sems can ji snyed pa de dag rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo la la zhig gis
306a4(nyi khri): bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yang dag par bskul ba byas na/ ko'u shi ka de ji snyam du sems rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo de de'i rgyus bsod
306a5(nyi khri): nams mang du 'phel lam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das mang ngo // bde bar gshegs pa mang ngo // bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ ko'u shi
306a6(nyi khri): ka de bas kyang rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di don dang ldan/ yi ge dang ldan par gzhan la rgya cher brjod de bstan pa dang
306a7(nyi khri): bshad de bkrol zhing rnam par bya ste gsal ba dang / yang dag par bstan pa byas pa dang / 'di skad du tshur rigs kyi bu khyod kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zung zhig/ kun chub par
306b1(nyi khri): gyis shig/ rmongs shig/ zhogs shig/ tshul bzhin du yid la gyis shig/ ji ltar bstan pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la nan kan du gyis shig/ rigs kyi bu myong
306b2(nyi khri): gang gi rtse shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ji ltar bstan pa la nan tan byed pa de'i tshe rigs kyi bu khyod shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la slob par 'gyur ro/ / rigs kyi bu khyod
306b3(nyi khri): gang gi tsheshes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la slob par gyur pa de'i tshe/ khyod kyis thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi chos rnams thob par 'gyur ro// gang gi tshe khyod kyis thams cad mkhyen pa
306b4(nyi khri): nyid kyi chos rnams thob par gyur pa de'i tshe/ khyod kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa de bas kyang yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// gang gi tshe khyod kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
306b5(nyi khri): bsgom pa de bas kyang yongs su rdzogs par gyur pa de'i tshe/ khyod bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o zhes bsgo na/ ches de'i bsod nams
306b6(nyi khri): zang du 'phel lo/ / de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ko'u shi ka 'di las byung ba ni sems dang po bskyed pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams so// koT
306b7(nyi khri): shi ka gzhan yang 'dzam bu'i gling gi sems can ji snyed pa de dag rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo la la zhig gis phyir mi ldog pa'i sa la bkod na/ ko'u shi ka de ji snyam du sem/
307a1(nyi khri): rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo de'i bsod nams de'i rgyus mang du 'phel lam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das mang ngo // bde bar gshegs
307a2(nyi khri): pa mang ngo / / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ ko'u shi ka de bas kyang rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di don dang ldan
307a3(nyi khri): yi ge dang ldan par gzhan la rgya cher brjod de bstan pa dang / bshag de bkrol zhing rnam par phye ste gsal ba dang / yang dag par bstan pa byas pa dang / 'di skad du tshur
307a4(nyi khri): rigs kyi bu khyod kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zung zhig/ kun chub par gyis shig/ chongs shig/ lhogs shig/ tshul bzhin du yid la gyis shig
307a5(nyi khri): ji ltar bstan pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la nan tan du gyis shig/ rigs kyi bu khyod gang gi tshe/ ji ltar bstan pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la nan tan byed pa
307a6(nyi khri): de'i tshe/ rigs kyi bu khyod shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la slob par 'gyur ro// rigs kyi bu khyod gang gi tshe/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la slob par gyur pa de'i tshe/ khyod kyis thams
307a7(nyi khri): cad mkhyed pa nyid kyi chos rnams thob par 'gyur ro/ / gang gi tshe khyod kyis thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi chos rnams thob par gyur pa de'i tshe/ khyod kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
307b1(nyi khri): bsgom pa de bas kyang yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro/ / gang gi tshe khyod kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa de bas kyang yongs su rdzogs par gyur pa de'ikhyod bla na med pa
307b2(nyi khri): yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o zhes bsgo na/ da ches de'i bsod nams mang du 'phel lo// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ko'u shi ka 'di las byung ba
307b3(nyi khri): ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi phyir mi ldog pa'i sa'o/ / ko'u shi ka 'dzam bu gling gi sems can rnams phyir mi ldog pa'i sa la bkod pa lta zhog
307b4(nyi khri): gling chen po bzhi pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi sems can lta'ang zhog/ stong gi 'jig rten gyi khams byur bu'i sems can lta'ang zhog/ stong gnyis kyi 'jig rten gyi
307b5(nyi khri): khams 'bring po'i sems can lta'ang zhog/ stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi sems can ji snyed pa de dag phyir mi ldog pa'i sa la bkod pa lta'ang zhog gi
307b6(nyi khri): ko'u shi ka phyogs bcu'i phyogs re re zhing gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams kyi sems can ji snyed pa de dag rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo la la zhig gis phyir mi
307b7(nyi khri): ldog pa'i sa la bkod na/ ko'u shi ka de ji snyam du sems/ rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo de'i bsod nams de'i rgyus mang du 'phel lam/ gsol pa/ bcom
308a1(nyi khri): ldan 'das mang ngo / / bde bar gshegs pa mang ngo // bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ ko'u shi ka de bas kyang rigs kyi bu 'am
308a2(nyi khri): rigs kyi bu mo gang gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di don dang ldan/ yi ge dang ldan par gzhan la rgya cher brjod de bstan pa dang / bshad de bkrol zhing rnam par bya ste gsal
308a3(nyi khri): pa dang / yang dag par bstan pa byas pa dang / 'di skad du tshur rigs kyi bu khyod kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zung zhig/ kun chub par gyis shig/ chongs shig
308a4(nyi khri): lhogs shig/ tshul bzhin du yid la gyis shig/ ji ltar bstan pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la nan tan du gyis shig/ rigs kyi bu khyod gang gi tshe/ ji ltar bstan pa'i shes rab kyi
308a5(nyi khri): pha rol tu phyin pa la nan tan du byed pa de'i tshe/ rigs kyi bu khyod shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la slob par 'gyur ro// rigs kyi bu khyod gang gi tshe/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la slob
308a6(nyi khri): par gyur pa de'i tshe/ khyod kyis thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi chos rnams thob par 'gyur ro// gang gi tshe khyod kyis thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi chos rnams thob par gyur pa de'i tshe/
308a7(nyi khri): khyod tha ma med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o zhes bsgo na/ ches de'i bsod nams mang du 'phel lo// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ko'u shi ka shes
308b1(nyi khri): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las byung ba ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi phyir mi ldog pa'i sa'o/ / ko'u shi ka gzhan yang 'dzam bu gling gi sems cad ji snyed pa
308b2(nyi khri): de dag thams cad bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yang dag par zhugs par gyur te/ de dag la rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo la la zhig gis shes rab kyi pha
308b3(nyi khri): rol tu phyin pa 'di don dang ldan yi ge dang ldan par gzhan la rgya cher brjod de bstan pa dang / bshad de bkrol zhing rnam par phye ste gsal ba dang / yang dag par bstan
308b4(nyi khri): pa byas pa dang / 'di skad du tshur rigs kyi bu khyod kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pazung zhig/ kun chub par gyis shig/ chongs shig/ lhogs shig
308b5(nyi khri): tshul bzhin du yid la gyis shig/ ji ltar bstan pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la nan tan du gyis shig/ rigs kyi bu khyod gang gi tshe/ ji ltar bstan pa'i shes rab kyi
308b6(nyi khri): pha rol tu phyin pa la nan tan du byed pa de'i tshe/ rigs kyi bu khyod shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la slob par 'gyur ro// rigs kyi bu khyod gang gi tshe/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la slob par gyur pa de'i tshe/ khyod
308b7(nyi khri): kyis thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi chos rnams thob par 'gyur ro/ / gang gi tshe khyod kyis thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi chos rnams thob par 'gyur ba de'i tshe/ khyod bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs
309a1(nyi khri): par 'tshang rgya'o zhes bsgo na/ ches de'i bsod nams mang du 'phel lo// ko'u shi ka 'dzam bu gling gi sems can rnams bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
309a2(nyi khri): byang chub tu yang dag par zhugs pa lta'ang zhog/ gling bzhi pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi sems can lta'ang zhog/ stong gi 'jig rten gyi khams byur bu'i sems can lta'ang zhog/ stong gnyis kyi 'jig rten
309a3(nyi khri): gyi khams 'bring po'i sems can lta'ang zhog/ stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi sems can ji snyed pa de dag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yang dag par zhugs pa
309a4(nyi khri): lta'ang zhog gi/ ko'u shi ka phyogs bcu'i phyogs re re zhing gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams kyi sems can ji snyed pa de dag thams cad bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu
309a5(nyi khri): yang dag par zhugs par gyur te/ de dag la rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo la la zhig gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di don dang ldan/ yi ge dang ldan par rgya cher brjod de bstan
309a6(nyi khri): pa dang / bshad de bkrol zhing rnam par phye ste gsal ba dang / yang dag par bstan pa byas pa dang / 'di skad du tshur rigs kyi bu khyod kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zung zhig/ kun
309a7(nyi khri): chub par gyis shig/ chongs shig/ lhogs shig/ tshul bzhin du yid la gyis shig/ ji ltar bstan pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la nan tan du gyis shig/ rigs kyi bu khyod gang
309b1(nyi khri): gi tshe/ ji ltar bstan pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la nan tan du byed pa de'i tshe/ rigs kyi bu khyod shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la slob par 'gyur ro// rigs kyi bu khyod gang gi tshe/ shes rab kyi pha
309b2(nyi khri): rol tu phyin pa la slob par gyur pa de'i tshe/ khyod kyis thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi chos rnams thob par 'gyur ro// gang gi tshe khyod kyis thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi chos rnams thob par gyur pa de'i tshe/ khyod
309b3(nyi khri): bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o zhes bsgo na/ ches de'i bsod nams mang du 'phel lo// ko'u shi ka gzhan yang 'dzam bu gling
309b4(nyi khri): gi sems can ji snyed pa de dag thams cad bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog par gyur te/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag la rigs kyi bu 'am
309b5(nyi khri): rigs kyi bu mo la la zhig gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di don dang ldan/ yi ge dang ldan par rgya cher brjod de bstan pa dang / bshad de bkrol zhing rnam par phye ste gsal ba dang / yang
309b6(nyi khri): dag par bstan pa byas pa bas/ de'i nang nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po la la zhig 'di skad du bdag myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par
309b7(nyi khri): 'tshang rgya'o zhes zer la/ rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo la la zhig gis de la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'ang don dang ldan/ yi ge dang ldan par rgya cher bstan na/ rigs kyi bu 'am
310a1(nyi khri): rigs kyi bu mo de'i bsod nams ches mang du 'phel lo/ / ko'u shi ka 'dzam bu gling gi sems can rnams bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir
310a2(nyi khri): mi ldog par gyur pa lta'ang zhog/ gling bzhi pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi sems can lta'ang zhog/ stong gi 'jig rten gyi khams byung bu'i sems can lta'ang zhog/ stong gnyis kyi 'jig rten gyi khams 'bring
310a3(nyi khri): po'i sems can lta'ang zhog/ stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi sems can rnams bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog par gyur pa lta'ang zhog gi
310a4(nyi khri): k o'u shi ka phyogs bcu'i phyogs re re zhing gad+hA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams kyi sems can ji snyed pa de dag thams cad bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi
310a5(nyi khri): ldog par gyur te/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag la rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo la la zhig gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di don dang ldan/ yi ge dang
310a6(nyi khri): ldan par rgya cher brjod de bstan pa dang / bshad de bkrol zhing rnam par phye ste gsal ba dang / yang dag par bstan pa byas pa bas/ de'i nang nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po la
310a7(nyi khri): la zhig 'di skad du bdag myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o zhes zer la/ rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo la la zhig gis de la shes rab kyi pha
310b1(nyi khri): / rol tu phyin pa 'di don dang ldan/ yi ge dang ldan par rgya cher brjod de bstan na/ rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo de'i bsod nams ches mang du 'phel lo// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ phyir mi ldog pa'i byang /
310b2(nyi khri): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag ni nges pa ste/ rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu gzhol zhing bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog par mi 'gyur bas na/ de dag la ni de
310b3(nyi khri): tsam du chos bstan kyang mi dgos kyi/ 'di ni 'khor ba las 'byung bar 'dod la/ snying rje chen pos mnar ba'i phyir ro// de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis/ bcom ldan
310b4(nyi khri): 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ / bcom ldan 'das ji lta ji ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu nye bar gyur pa de lta de ltar byang chub sems
310b5(nyi khri): dpa' sems dpa' chen po de sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la gdams shing rjes su bstan par bgyi'o/ / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dag
310b6(nyi khri): bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gdams shing rjes su bstan par bgyi'o// nang stong pa nyid la gdams shing rjes su bstan par bgyi'o// dngos po med pa'i ngo
310b7(nyi khri): bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar la gdams shing rjes su bstan par bgyi'o/ / dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams dang / yang dag par spong ba rnams dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams dang / dbang po rnams dang /
311a1(nyi khri): stobs rnams dang / byang chub kyi yan lag rnams dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa la gdams shing rjes su bstan par bgyi'o// 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams dang / bsam/
311a2(nyi khri): gtan rnams dang / tshad med pa rnams dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo gsum dang
311a3(nyi khri): mngon par shes pa rnams dang / ting nge 'dzin dang / gzugs kyi sgo rnams la gdams shing rjes su bstan par 'gyi'o// de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams dang / mi 'jigs pa rnams dang / so so//
311a4(nyi khri): yang dag par rig pa rnams dang / byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcwo brgyad la gdams shing rjes su bstan par bgyi'o// gos dang / bsod snyoms
311a5(nyi khri): dang mal cha dang / nad kyi rkyen sman dang / yo byad kyis kyang rjes su gzungs par bgyi ste/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de la chos kyis bsdu ba dang / zang zing gis bsdu bas
311a6(nyi khri): rjes su 'dzin pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo de dag gi bsod nams ches mang du 'phel gyi/ rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo snga ma dag gi ni ma lags so// de ci'i slad du
311a7(nyi khri): zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das de ni yong yang de ltar 'gyur te/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang lags pa de ni/ pha rol tu phyin pa rnams la gdams shing rjes su bstan pa'o// stong
311b1(nyi khri): pa nyid thams cad dang / byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos thams cad dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams dang bsam gtan rnams dang / tshad med pa rnams dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa//
311b2(nyi khri): rnams la gdams shing rjes su bstan pa'o// rnam par thar pa brgyad dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo gsum dang / mngon par shes pa rnams dang
311b3(nyi khri): ting nge 'dzin rnams dang / gzungs kyi sgo rnams la gdams shing rjes su bstan pa'o// de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang /
311b4(nyi khri): byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad la gdams shing rjes su bstan pa'o// de nas tshe dang ldan par rab 'byor gyis/ lha'i
311b5(nyi khri): dbang po brgya byin la smras pa/ ko'u shi ka de ltar khyod byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi mos pa bskyed pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i rnams la phan 'dogs pa dang / yongs su skyob pa legs so//
311b6(nyi khri): ko'u shi ka khyod kyis de bzhin du bya'o// 'phags pa nyan thos gang sems can rnams la phan 'dogs par 'dod pa des kyang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams bla na med pa yang dag par
311b7(nyi khri): rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mos pa bskyed par bya'o/ / byang chub sems dpa' rnams zang zing dang / chos kyis phan gdags pas phan gdags shing yongs su bskyang bar bya'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/
312a1(nyi khri): ko'u shi ka bcom ldan 'das kyi nyan thos kyi dge 'dun ni/ 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag las 'byung ngo // gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems
312a2(nyi khri): dpa' chen po bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems mi skyed na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po pha rol tu phyin pa drug po 'di dag la slob pa ma yin/ nang stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa'i
312a3(nyi khri): ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar dang / byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams dang / bsam gtan rnams dang / tshad med pa rnams dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par
312a4(nyi khri): 'jug pa rnams dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo gsum dang / mngon par shes pa rnams dang / ting nge 'dzin rnams
312a5(nyi khri): dang / gzungs kyi sgo rnams dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams dang / mi 'jigs pa rnams dang / so so yang dag par rig pa rnams dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad la slob
312a6(nyi khri): pa ma yin te/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar mi 'gyur ro// bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar ma
312a7(nyi khri): gyur na/ rang sangs rgyas dang nyan thos rnams kyang yod par ma 'gyur te/ ko'u shi ka byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni pha rol tu phyin pa drug po 'di dag la'ang slob la/ stong pa nyid thams cad dang /
312b1(nyi khri): byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams dang / bsam gtan rnams dang / tshad med pa rnams dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dang / rnam par thar/
312b2(nyi khri): pa brgyad dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo gsum dang / mngon par shes pa rnams dang / ting nge 'dzin rnams dang / gzungs kyi sgo rnams dang / de bzhin
312b3(nyi khri): gshegs pa'i stobs rnams dang / mi 'jigs pa rnams dang / so so yang dag par rig pa rnams dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcwo brgyad la'ang slob pas/ de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems
312b4(nyi khri): dpa' chen po bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ste/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa dang / 'jig rten gyi
312b5(nyi khri): khams thams cad du sems can dmyal ba rnams rgyun chad par 'gyur ro/ / byol song gi skye gnas dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rten rnams rgyu mchad par 'gyur ro// lha ma yin gyi ris kyang yongs su 'grib par 'gyuraro
312b6(nyi khri): lha'i ris kyang mngon par 'phel bar 'gyur ro/ / rgyal rigs che zhing mtho ba rnams kyang 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// bram ze'i rigs che zhing mtho ba rnams kyang 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// khyim
312b7(nyi khri): bdag gi rigs che zhing mtho ba rnams kyang 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ / rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lha rnams dang / mtshe ma dang / dga'
313a1(nyi khri): ldan dang / 'phrul dga' dang / gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// tshangs ris dang / tshangs lha nye phan dang / tshangs pa kun 'khor dang / tshangs
313a2(nyi khri): chen dang / snang ba dang / chung snang dang / tshad med snang ba dang / kun snang dang ba dang / dge ba dang / chung dge dang / tshad med dag pa dang / dge rgyas dang / che ba dang / chung che dang / tshad med che ba dang / 'bras bu che
313a3(nyi khri): pab dang / mi che ba dang / mi gdung ba dang / shin tu mthong ba dang / gya nom snang ba dang / 'og min gyi lha rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched dang / rnam shes mtha'
313a4(nyi khri): yas skye mched dang / cung zad med pa'i skye mched dang / 'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched kyi lha rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur/
313a5(nyi khri): ro// tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu
313a6(nyi khri): phyir pa 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ / nang stong pa nyid 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi bar du 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos
313a7(nyi khri): sum cu rtsa bdun dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams dang / bsam gtan rnams dang / tshad med pa rnams dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad
313b1(nyi khri): dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo gsum dang / mngon par shes pa rnams dang / ting nge 'dzin rnams dang / gzungs kyi sgo rnams 'jig
313b2(nyi khri): du 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ / de ga glegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / byams pa chen po dang / snying rjes chen po dang / sangs rgyas kyi
313b3(nyi khri): chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ / nyan thos kyi theg pa 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// theg pa chen
313b4(nyi khri): po 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag nyi shu lnga pa las/ brgya byin gyi le'u zhes bya ste nyi shu gsum pa'o// / de nas byang chub
313b5(nyi khri): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pas/ gnas brtan rab 'byor la smras pa/ btsun pa rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i rjes su yi rang ba dang ldan pa'i bsod nams
313b6(nyi khri): bya ba'i dngos po gang yin pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bsod nams bya ba'i dngos po sems can thams cad dang thun mong du byas te/ de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis bla na med
313b7(nyi khri): pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su sngo ba gang yin pa dang / sems can thams cad kyi rjes su yi rang ba dang ldan pa'i bsod nams bya ba'i dngos po dang / nyan thos kyi theg pa pa rnams dang /
314a1(nyi khri): rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa pa rnams kyi sbyin pa las byung ba'i bsod nams bya ba'i dngos po dang // tshul khrims las byung ba dang / bsgom pa las byung ba'i bsod nams bya ba'i/
314a2(nyi khri): dngos po gang yin pa de dag las/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i rjes su yi rang ba dang ldan pa'i bsod nams bya ba'i dngos po sems can thams cad dang thun mong du byas te/ bla na med pa
314a3(nyi khri): yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngos pa 'di nyid rab ces bya'o/ / dam pa zhes bya'o// gtso bo zhes bya'o// mchog ces bya'o// phul zhes bya'o// gya nom pa zhes bya'o// bla na med pa
314a4(nyi khri): zhes bya'o/ / gong na med pa zhes bya'o// mnyam pa med pa zhes bya'o// mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa zhes bya'o// // shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag nyi shu lA pa
314a5(nyi khri): bam po sum cu drug pa/ / // de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa pa rnams kyi sbyin pa las byung ba'i bsod nams bya ba'i dngos po dang / tshul khrims las
314a6(nyi khri): byung ba dang / bsgom pa las byung ba'i bsod nams bya ba'i dngos po ni bdag gdul ba dang / bdag zhi bar bya ba dang / bdag yongs su mya ngan las bsdu bar bya ba'i phyir nye bar gnas pa ste/ dran pa
314a7(nyi khri): nye bar gzhag pa rnams dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'i bar dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi dang / bsam gtan bzhi dang / tshad med pa bzhi dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par
314b1(nyi khri): 'jug pa bzhi dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / so so
314b2(nyi khri): yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / mngon par shes pa drug dag kyang / bdag gdul ba dang / bdag zhi bar bya ba dang / bdag yongs su mya ngan las bzla bar bya ba'i phyir nye bar gnas par zad kyi/
314b3(nyi khri): byang chub sems dpa' ni sems can thams cad gdul ba dang / zhi bar bya ba dang / yongs su mya ngan las bzla bar bya ba'i phyir/ rjes su yi rang ba dang ldan pa'i bsod nams bya ba'i dngos po sems
314b4(nyi khri): can thams cad dang thun mong du byas shing / mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngo'o// de nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis
314b5(nyi khri): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pa la 'di skad ces smras so/ / de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos/ shar phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams grangs med tshad med
314b6(nyi khri): dpag tu med pa dag gi 'jig rten gyi khams re rer yang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das tshad med grangs med dpag tu med pa yongs su mya ngan las 'das par gyur pa de dag dang / lho dang / nub
314b7(nyi khri): dang / byang dang / byang shar dang / shar lho dang / lho nub dang / nub byang dang / 'og dang / steng gi phyogs kyi phyogs re re zhing 'jig rten gyi khams tshad med grangs med dpag tu med pa dag
315a1(nyi khri): gi 'jig rten gyi khams re rer yang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das tshad med grangs med pa yongs su mya ngan las 'das par gyur pa de dag thugs dang po bskyed nas/ bla ma med/
315a2(nyi khri): ba yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa'i bar dang / phung po ma lus pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings su yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa'i bar gyi dam pa'i chos
315a3(nyi khri): ma nub kyi bar du/ dge ba'i chos pha rol tu phyin pa drug dang ldan pa gang ji snyed cig yod pa dang / nyan thos kyi theg pa la yang dag par zhugs pa de dag gi sbyin pa las byung ba'i bsod nams bya ba'i dngos po
315a4(nyi khri): dang / tshul khrims las byung ba dang / bsgom pa las byung ba'i bsod nams bya ba'i dngos po dang / slob pa de dag gi dge ba'i rtsa ba zag pa dang bcas pa dang / zag pa med pa dag dang / mi slob pa de
315a5(nyi khri): ngag gi dge ba'i rtsa ba zag pa med pa dag dang / de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de dag gi tshul khrims kyi phung po dang / ting nge 'dzin gyi phung po dang / shes
315a6(nyi khri): rab kyi phung po dang / rnam par grol ba'i phung po dang / rnam par grol ba'i ye shes gzigs pa'i phung po dang / phan par bzhed pa dang / thugs rje chen po dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos grangs med tshad
315a7(nyi khri): med pa dang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gis chos gang bstan pa dang / chos bstan pa de la bslabs shing / rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu thob pa dang / lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras
315b1(nyi khri): ga/ bu thob pa dang / phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu thob pa dang / dgra bcom pa nyid thob pa dang / rang byang chub thob pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i skyon med par 'jug pa de dag gi dge ba'i rtsa ba gang ji
315b2(nyi khri): snyed pa dang / gang gis de bzhin gshegs pa de dag bzhugs kyang rung / yongs su mya ngan las 'das kyang rung ste/ de dag la dge ba'i rtsa ba gang ji snyed cig bskyed pa de dag thams cad gcig tu bsdus
315b3(nyi khri): te/ rjes su yi rang ba'i rab mchog/ gtso bo// dam pa/ rab/ phul/ gya nom pa/ bla na med pa/ gong na med pa/ mnyam pa med pa// mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'i rjes su yi rang ste/ de ltar rjes su yi rang nas/
315b4(nyi khri): rjes su yi rang ba dang ldan pa'i bsod nams bya ba'i dngos po de sems can thams cad dang thun mong du byas te/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub bsgrub par gyur cig ces bla na med pa yang dag
315b5(nyi khri): par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngos na/ de ltar byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa la yang dag par zhugs pa des de skad du smras te/ sems kyi rnam par de lta bus yongs su bsngos na/
315b6(nyi khri): dmigs pa gang dag dang / dngos po gang dag gis sems de lta bu skyes par gyur pa'i dngos po de dag dang / dmigs pa de dag rigs kyi bu de dag gis ji ltar mtshan mar byas pa de bzhin du dmigs su
315b7(nyi khri): yod pa yin nam/ byams pas smras pa/ byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu de dag gis ji ltar mtshan par byas te/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs
316a1(nyi khri): su bsngos pa de bzhin du dngos po de dag dang / dmigs pa de dag dmigs su yod pa ma yin no// rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ gal te de ltar dngos po de dag dmigs su med na
316a2(nyi khri): sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams na bzhugs pa de dag dang / de dag gis thugs dang po bskyed pa ras dam pa'i chos gnas pa'i bar gyi dge ba'i rtsa ba ji snyed pa dang / nyan thos dang rang sangs
316a3(nyi khri): rgyas kyi theg pa la gnas pa'i rigs kyi bu dang / rigs kyi bu mo de dag gi dge ba'i rtsa ba gang snyed pa dang / slob pa rnams kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba gang ji snyed pa dang / mi slob pa rnams kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba gang ji
316a4(nyi khri): snyed pa de dag thams cad gcig tu bsdus bsogs te/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mtshan ma'i tshul gyis yongs su bsngos na/ ji ltar mi rtag pa la rtag go zhes bya bar 'du shes
316a5(nyi khri): phyin ci log dang / sems phyin rtsi log dang / lta ba phyin ci log tu gyur pa dang / sdug bsngal la bde zhes bya ba dang / bdag med pa la bdag ces bya ba dang / mi gtsang ba la gtsang zhes bya bar 'du shes
316a6(nyi khri): phyin ci log dang / sems phyin ci log dang / lta ba phyin ci log tu gyur pa de ltar de'i 'du shes phyin ci log tu ma gyur tam/ de lta yin yang / thams cad dngos po ji lta ba dang / dmigs pa ji lta bar byang
316a7(nyi khri): chub kyang de bzhin/ sems kyang de bzhin/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam
316b1(nyi khri): gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'ang de bzhin/ gzugs dang / tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa'ang de bzhin/ mig dang / rna ba dang / sna dang // /
316b2(nyi khri): lce dang / lus dang / yid kyang de bzhin/ gzugs dang / sgra dang / dri dang / ro dang / reg dang / chos kyang de bzhin/ khams dang / skye mched dang / rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba'ang de bzhin/ nang stong
316b3(nyi khri): pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar yang de bzhin/ dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'i bar yang de bzhin 'phags pa'i bden pa
316b4(nyi khri): rnams dang / bsam gtan rnams dang / tshad med pa rnams dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad dang / mthar gyis
316b5(nyi khri): gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smor pa med pa dang / mngon par shes pa rnams dang
316b6(nyi khri): ting nge 'dzin rnams dang / gzungs kyi sgo rnams dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang
316b7(nyi khri): sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyang de bzhin te/ gal te de ltar dngos po ji lta ba dang / dmigs pa ji lta bar byang chub kyang de bzhin/ sems kyang de bzhin/ sbyin pa'i pha/
317a1(nyi khri): / rol tu phyin pa'ang de bzhin/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi ba
317a2(nyi khri): rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'ang de bzhin/ nang stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar yang de bzhin/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams dang
317a3(nyi khri): yang dag par spong ba rnams dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams dang / dbang po rnams dang / stobs rnams dang / byang chub kyi yan lag rnams dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa
317a4(nyi khri): dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams dang / bsam gtan rnams dang / tshad med pa rnams dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad dang / mthar gyis gnas
317a5(nyi khri): pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo gsum dang / mngon par shes pa rnams dang / ting nge 'dzin rnams dang / gzungs kyi sgo rnams dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs
317a6(nyi khri): pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyang de bzhin na/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su sngo ba'i dngos po de ni gang zhig yin
317a7(nyi khri): dmigs pa de ni gang zhig yin/ byang chub de ni gang zhig yin/ sems can de ni gang zhig yin/ dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag ni gang zhig yin/ rjes su yi rang ba dang ldan pa'i bsod nams bya ba'i//
317b1(nyi khri): dngos po de ni gang zhig yin/ byams pas smras pa/ gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po pha rol tu phyin pa drug la spyod spyod pa/ sangs rgyas mang po la bsnyen bkur
317b2(nyi khri): zhing / dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed par gyur pa dang / dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyis kyang yongs su zin pa dang / rang gi mtshan nyid kyis stong pa'i chos thams cad la bslabs pa de dag ni/ dngos po de
317b3(nyi khri): dag dang / dmigs pa de dag dang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag dang / rjes su yi rang ba dang ldan pa'i bsod nams bya ba'i dngos po de dag mtshan mar
317b4(nyi khri): byas shing / bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub yongs su mi sngo'i/ de dag ni 'di ltar yongs su sngo ste/ gnyis kyi tshul gyis ma yin no// gnyis su med pa'i tshul gyis ma yin no//
317b5(nyi khri): mtshan ma'i tshul gyis ma yin no// mtshan ma med pa'i tshul gyis ma yin no// dmigs pa'i tshul gyis ma yin no// dmigs pa med pa'i tshul gyis ma yin no// nyon mongs pa'i tshul gyis ma yin no// rnam
317b6(nyi khri): par byang ba'i tshul gyis ma yin no/ / skye ba'i tshul gyis ma yin no// 'gag pa'i tshul gyis ma yin no// gal te byang chub sems dpa' de dag pha rol tu phyin pa drug la spyod spyod pa'ang ma yin/
317b7(nyi khri): sangs rgyas mang po la bsnyen bkur byed byed pa'ang ma yin/ dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed par gyur pa'ang ma yin/ dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyis yongs su zin pa'ang ma yin/ rang gi mtshan nyid
318a1(nyi khri): kyis stong pa'i chos thams cad la bslabs par gyur pa'ang ma yin na/ de dag ni dngos po de dag dang / dmigs pa de dag dang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag dang
318a2(nyi khri): dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag dang / rjes su yi rang ba dang ldan pa'i sems bskyed pa de dag la mtshan mar byas shing / bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngos par gyur te/ btsun
318a3(nyi khri): pa rab 'byor shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa de ltar bstan pa ni theg pa la gsar du zhugs pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i mdun du mi bshad do/ / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol
318a4(nyi khri): tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa de ltar bstan pa ni theg pa la gsar du zhugs pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i mdun du mi
318a5(nyi khri): bshad do/ / nang stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar dang / dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams dang / yang dag par spong ba rnams dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams dang /
318a6(nyi khri): dbang po rnams dang / stobs rnams dang / byang chub kyi yan lag rnams dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa de ltar bstan pa ni theg pa la gsar du zhugs pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i
318a7(nyi khri): mdun du mi bshad do/ / 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams dang / bsam gtan rnams dang / tshad med pa rnams dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad dang / mthar
318b1(nyi khri): gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / mngon par shes pa rnams dang / ting nge 'dzin rnams dang / gzungs kyi sgo rnams dang
318b2(nyi khri): de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos pa 'dres pa bco brgyad de ltar bstan pa ni theg pa la gsar du zhugs pa'i
318b3(nyi khri): byang chub sems dpa'i mdun du mi bshad do/ / thams cad shes pa nyid dang / lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid de ltar bstan pa ni theg pa la gsar du zhugs pa'i byang chub
318b4(nyi khri): sems dpa'i mdun du mi bshad do/ / rang gi mtshan nyid kyis stong pa'i chos rnams de ltar bstan pa ni theg pa la gsar du zhugs pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i mdun du mi bshad do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/
318b5(nyi khri): de ni de la dad pa tsam mam/ dga' ba tsam mam/ mos pa tsam mam/ gus pa tsam zhig yod pa de'ang med par 'gyur ba'i phyir te/ phyir mi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i mdun
318b6(nyi khri): du bshad cing bstan to/ / dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyis yongs su zin pa dang / sngon gyi rgyal ba la bya ba byas pa dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa dang / sangs rgyas mang po la bsnyen bkur byed byed
318b7(nyi khri): pa'i mdun du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa de ltar bstan pa 'di bshad par bya'o/ / bstan par bya'o// bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol
319a1(nyi khri): tu phyin pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / sbyir pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa de ltar bstan pa bshad par bya'o// bstan par bya'o// nang stong pa nyid dang / dngos po me
319a2(nyi khri): pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar du de ltar bstan pa bshad par bya'o/ / bstan par bya'o// dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams dang / yang dag par spong ba rnams dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams dang
319a3(nyi khri): dbang po rnams dang / stobs rnams dang / byang chub kyi yan lag rnams dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams dang / bsam gtan rnams dang
319a4(nyi khri): tshad med pa rnams dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / stong pa nyid dang / mtshan
319a5(nyi khri): ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / mngon par shes pa rnams dang / ting nge 'dzin rnams dang / gzungs kyi sgo rnams dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa
319a6(nyi khri): bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad de ltar bstar pa bshad par bya'o// bstan par bya'o//
319a7(nyi khri): thams cad shes pa nyid dang / lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid de ltar bstan pa bshad par bya'o// bstan par bya'o// de'i mdun du rang gi mtshan
319b1(nyi khri): nyid kyis slong ba'i chos rnams bshad par bya'o/ / bstan par gyura'o// des ni de thos na mi 'jigs mi sdang skrag par mi 'gyur te/ rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' den pos ces
319b2(nyi khri): su mi rang ba dang ldan pa'i bsod nams bya ba'i dngos po'ang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu de ltar yongs su bsngo bar bya'o/ / rab 'byor gyis smras pa
319b3(nyi khri): b yams pa sems gang gis rjes su yi rang zhing dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngo bar bya ba'i sems de ni zad cing 'gags la med de rnam par grub
319b4(nyi khri): dngos po de dag dang / dmigs pa de dag dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag kyang zad cing 'gags la med de rnam par gyur na// rjes su yi rang ba dang ldan pa'i sems ni gang zhig/ dngos po de dag ni gang zhig
319b5(nyi khri): dmigs pa de dag ni gang zhig/ dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag ni gang zhig/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngo bar bya/ ci sems kyis sems yongs su sngo ba 'am/ de ltar sems
319b6(nyi khri): kyis sems yongs su sngon ni/ sems gnyis phrad par 'gyur ba med de/ sems kyi rang bzhin gang yin pa de'ang yongs su sngo bar mi nus so// gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
319b7(nyi khri): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni dngos po med pa'o// bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /
320a1(nyi khri): bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ni dngos po med pa'o// nang stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa
320a2(nyi khri): nyid kyi bar du ni dngos po med pa'o/ / dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams dang / yang dag par spong ba rnams dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams dang / dbang po rnams dang / stobs rnams/ byang chub kyi
320a3(nyi khri): yan lag rnams dang / 'phags pa'i lam yag lag brgyad pa ni dngos po med pa'o// 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams dang / bsam gtan rnams dang / tshad med pa rnams dang / gzugs med pa'i
320a4(nyi khri): snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dang / rnam par thar pa rnams dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dang / stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / mngon par
320a5(nyi khri): shes pa rnams ni dngos po med pa'o/ / ting nge 'dzin rnams dang / gzungs kyi sgo rnams dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang /
320a6(nyi khri): byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad ni dngos po med pa'o// rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu dang / lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / phyir mi
320a7(nyi khri): 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / dgra bcom pa nyid dang / rang byang chub dang / thams cad shes pa nyid dang / lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ni dngos po med pa'o/
320b1(nyi khri): / zhes bya bar shes na/ de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos rjes su yi rang ba dang ldan pa'i bsod nams bya ba'i dngos po bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngo bar
320b2(nyi khri): bya'o/ / gal te de ltar yongs su sngon bla ra med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngo bar 'gyur ro// de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis/ gnas brtan rab 'byor la smras
320b3(nyi khri): pa/ btsun pa rab 'byor theg pa la gsar du zhugs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bstan pa 'di thos na 'jigs shing sdang ba 'am/ skrag par mi 'gyur ram/ btsun pa rab 'byor
320b4(nyi khri): ji ltar theg pa la gsar du zhugs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngo bar bya/ ji ltar na rjes su yi
320b5(nyi khri): rang ba dang ldan pa'i bsod nams bya ba'i dngos po yongs su bzung zhing bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngos pa yin/ / de nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis
320b6(nyi khri): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pa la dmigs nas/ lha'i dbang po brgya byin la 'di skad ces smras so// ko'u shi ka gal te theg pa la gsar du zhugs pa'i byang chub sems dpa'
320b7(nyi khri): sems dpa' chen po de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa de'ang mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / mtshan ma med pa'i tshul gyis 'dzin par byed/ bsam gtan gyi pha
321a1(nyi khri): rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing /
321a2(nyi khri): sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa de'ang mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / mtshan ma med pa'i tshul gyis 'dzin par byed/ nang stong pa nyid la spyod cing / nang stong pa nyid de'ang mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / mtshan ma
321a3(nyi khri): med pa'i tshul gyis 'dzin par byed/ dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar la spyod cing / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid de'ang mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / mtshan ma med pa'i tshul gyis 'dzin
321a4(nyi khri): par byed/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams la spyod cing / dran pa nye bar gzhag pa de dag kyang mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / mtshan ma med pa'i tshul gyis 'dzin par byed/ yang dag par spong ba dang //
321a5(nyi khri): rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang / dbang po dang / stobs dang / byang chub kyi yan lag dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa la spyod cing / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa
321a6(nyi khri): de'ang mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / mtshan ma med pa'i tshul gyis 'dzin par byed// 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams dang / bsam gtan rnams dang / tshad med pa rnams dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms
321a7(nyi khri): par 'jug pa rnams dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / mngon par shes
321b1(nyi khri): pa rnams dang / ting nge 'dzin rnams dang / gzungs kyi sgo rnams dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / byams pa chen
321b2(nyi khri): po dang / snying rje chen po dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcwo brgyad la spyod cing / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad po de'ang mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / mtshan ma med pa'i tshul
321b3(nyi khri): gyis 'dzin par byed/ thams cad shes pa nyid dang / lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la spyod cing / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid de'ang mi gamigs pa'i
321b4(nyi khri): tshul dang / mtshan ma med pa'i tshul gyis 'dzin par byed na/ des shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mos pa mang ba dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang
321b5(nyi khri): bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la mos pa mang ba dang / nang stong pa nyid la mos pa mang ba dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa
321b6(nyi khri): nyid kyi bar la mos pa mang ba dang / byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun la mos pa yang ba dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams dang / bsam gtan rnams dang / tshad med pa rnams dang / gzugs
321b7(nyi khri): med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams la mos pa mang ba dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa
322a1(nyi khri): med pa la mos pa mang ba dang / mngon par shes pa rnams dang / ting nge 'dzin rnams dang / gzungs kyi sgo rnams dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams dang / mi 'jigs
322a2(nyi khri): pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad la mos pa mang ba dang / thams cad shes pa nyid dang // lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid dang / rnam pa thams
322a3(nyi khri): cad mkhyen pa nyid la mos pa mang bar 'gyur ro/ / dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyis yongs su zin par 'gyur ro// dge ba'i bshes gnyen de dag kyang pha rol tu phyin pa drug po 'di dag don dang ldan/ yi ge/
322a4(nyi khri): dang ldan par ston par 'gyur te/ de'ang byang chub sems dpa'i skyon med par chud kyi bar du/ ci nas kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang bral bar mi 'gyur ba de ltar ston to// gsam gtan gyi pha rol
322a5(nyi khri): tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang bral bar mi 'gyur ba de ltar ston to//
